GS40rajnighu:2645: kaiḍaryaḥ kaṭukas tiktaḥ kaṣāyaḥ śītalo laghuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2657: kumudā cogragandhaś ca bhadrā rañjanakas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:2658: kumbhī ca laghukāśmaryaḥ śrīparṇī ca tripañcadhā // Rajni_9.20
GS40rajnighu:2663: nādeyī vijayānantā nadī yāvat trayodaśa // Rajni_9.22
GS40rajnighu:2667: araṇir laghumanthaś ca tejovṛkṣas tanutvacā // Rajni_9.24
GS40rajnighu:2673: potavṛkṣaś ca ṭeṇṭūko bhūtasāro munidrumaḥ // Rajni_9.27
GS40rajnighu:2676: vātāriḥ pītakaḥ śoṇaḥ kuṭanaś ca virecanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2681: dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ hṛdyaṃ rucikṛl lavaṇāmlakam // Rajni_9.31
GS40rajnighu:2683: cakṣuṣyā tiktadugdhā ca putraśreṇī viṣāṇikā // Rajni_9.32
GS40rajnighu:2688: syāt kāśmaryaḥ kāśmarī kṛṣṇavṛntā hīrā bhadrā sarvatobhadrikā ca /
GS40rajnighu:2689: śrīparṇī syāt sindhuparṇī subhadrā kambhārī sā kaṭphalā bhadraparṇī // Rajni_9.35
GS40rajnighu:2690: kumudā ca gopabhadrā vidāriṇī kṣīriṇī mahābhadrā /
GS40rajnighu:2691: madhuparṇī svabhadrā kṛṣṇā śvetā ca rohiṇī gṛṣṭiḥ // Rajni_9.36
GS40rajnighu:2693: sudṛḍhatvacā ca kathitā vijñeyonatriṃśatir nāmnām // Rajni_9.37
GS40rajnighu:2697: ślakṣṇatvak pīlupattraś ca smṛto yamalapattrakaḥ // Rajni_9.39
GS40rajnighu:2700: aśmantakaḥ syān madhuraḥ kaṣāyaḥ suśītalaḥ pittaharaḥ pramehajit /
GS40rajnighu:2702: atha bhavati karṇikāro rājataruḥ pragrahaś ca kṛtamālaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2703: suphalaś ca parivyādho vyādhiripuḥ paṅktibījako vasusaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_9.42
GS40rajnighu:2709: arujaḥ svarṇapuṣpaś ca svarṇadruḥ kuṣṭhasūdanaḥ // Rajni_9.45
GS40rajnighu:2711: karṇikāro mahādiḥ syāt proktaś caikonaviṃśatiḥ // Rajni_9.46
GS40rajnighu:2715: uṣṭrikāpy aliparṇī ca dakṣiṇāvarttakī tathā // Rajni_9.48
GS40rajnighu:2717: karabhā bhūridugdhā ca karkaśā cāmarā ca sā // Rajni_9.49
GS40rajnighu:2735: śukeṣṭo barhipuṣpaś ca viṣahantā supuṣpakaḥ // Rajni_9.58
GS40rajnighu:2742: pūtiparṇo vṛddhaphalo rocanaś ca prakīryakaḥ // Rajni_9.61
GS40rajnighu:2743: karañjaḥ kaṭur uṣṇaś ca cakṣuṣyo vātanāśanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2744: tasya sneho 'tisnigdhaś ca vātaghnaḥ sthiradīptidaḥ // Rajni_9.62
GS40rajnighu:2746: snigdhapatras tapasvī ca viṣāriś ca virocanaḥ // Rajni_9.63
GS40rajnighu:2753: sumanāḥ kākabhāṇḍī ca madamattaś ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_9.66
GS40rajnighu:2757: pūtikarañjaḥ kaiḍaryaḥ kalimālaś ca saptadhā // Rajni_9.68
GS40rajnighu:2759: gucchī ca mātṛnandī sānando dantadhāvano vasavaḥ // Rajni_9.69
GS40rajnighu:2764: prakīryaḥ somavalkaś ca phenilo rudrasaṃjñakaḥ // Rajni_9.71
GS40rajnighu:2765: rīṭhākarañjas tiktoṣṇaḥ kaṭuḥ snigdhaś ca vātajit /
GS40rajnighu:2770: kolaḥ kolambakarṇaś ca gandhapuṣpaś ca rocanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2774: nīlas tu nīlavṛkṣo vātāriḥ śophanāśano nakhanāmā /
GS40rajnighu:2775: nakhavṛkṣaś ca nakhālur nakhapriyo diggajendramitasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_9.76
GS40rajnighu:2776: nīlavṛkṣas tu kaṭukaḥ kaṣāyoṣṇo laghus tathā /
GS40rajnighu:2786: dhanyaś ca dīrghaparṇaḥ kuśikataruḥ kauśikaś cāpi // Rajni_9.81
GS40rajnighu:2792: dīrghapatro gucchapatro 'py āsavadruś ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_9.84
GS40rajnighu:2794: saraś ca kaphapittaghno madakṛd dāhaśoṣanut // Rajni_9.85
GS40rajnighu:2799: pittajit kaphakārī ca vātam īṣat prakopayet // Rajni_9.87
GS40rajnighu:2807: madyadrumo mohakārī madadrur ṛjur aṅkadhā // Rajni_9.91
GS40rajnighu:2808: māḍas tu śiśiro rucyaḥ kaṣāyaḥ pittadāhakṛt /
GS40rajnighu:2810: tūlaṃ tūdaṃ brahmakāṣṭhaṃ brāhmaṇeṣṭaṃ ca yūpakam /
GS40rajnighu:2812: kramukaṃ viprakāṣṭhaṃ ca mṛdusāraṃ dvibhūmitam // Rajni_9.93
GS40rajnighu:2813: tūlaṃ tu madhurāmlaṃ syāt vātapittaharaṃ saram /
GS40rajnighu:2816: nīladhvajaś ca tāpiñchaḥ kālatālo mahābalaḥ // Rajni_9.95
GS40rajnighu:2817: tamālo madhuro balyo vṛṣyaś ca śiśiro guruḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2830: kaṣāyāḥ pittalās tiktā vīryavṛddhikarāḥ parāḥ // Rajni_9.102
GS40rajnighu:2836: kumbhī kaṭuḥ kaṣāyoṣṇo grāhī vātakaphāpahaḥ // Rajni_9.105
GS40rajnighu:2841: raktapittodbhavaṃ rogaṃ kuṣṭhadoṣaṃ ca nāśayet // Rajni_9.107
GS40rajnighu:2843: śuklavṛkṣaḥ pāṇḍutarur dhavalaḥ pāṇḍuro nava // Rajni_9.108
GS40rajnighu:2845: pittaprakopaṇo rucyo vijñeyo dīpanaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_9.109
GS40rajnighu:2847: rujāpahaḥ picchalako rūkṣaḥ svāduphalaś ca saḥ // Rajni_9.110
GS40rajnighu:2852: bhūtaghno mṛdupatraś ca śailendrastho dvibhūmitaḥ // Rajni_9.112
GS40rajnighu:2855: tiniśaḥ syandanaś cakrī śatāṅgaḥ śakaṭo rathaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2856: rathiko bhasmagarbhaś ca meṣī jaladharo daśa // Rajni_9.114
GS40rajnighu:2860: vairāntakaḥ kirīṭī ca gāṇḍīvī śivamallakaḥ // Rajni_9.116
GS40rajnighu:2863: pṛthājaḥ phālguno dhanvī kakubhaś caikaviṃśatiḥ // Rajni_9.117
GS40rajnighu:2866: haridruḥ pītadāruḥ syāt pītakāṣṭhaś ca pītakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2867: kadambakaḥ supuṣpaś ca surāhvaḥ pītakadrumaḥ // Rajni_9.119
GS40rajnighu:2870: dagdhā dagdharuhā proktā dagdhikā ca sthaleruhā /
GS40rajnighu:2874: śākhoṭaḥ syād bhūtavṛkṣo gavākṣī yūkāvāso bhūrjapatraś ca pītaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2875: kauśikyo 'jakṣīranāśaś ca sūktas tiktoṣṇo 'yaṃ pittakṛd vātahārī // Rajni_9.123
GS40rajnighu:2879: kaphaghnaṃ madhuraṃ rucyaṃ kaṣāyaṃ śākavalkalam // Rajni_9.125
GS40rajnighu:2880: śiṃśapā tu mahāśyāmā kṛṣṇasārā ca dhūmrikā /
GS40rajnighu:2881: tīkṣṇasārā ca dhīrā ca kapilā kṛṣṇaśiṃśapā // Rajni_9.126
GS40rajnighu:2887: sāriṇī kapilākṣī ca bhasmagarbhā kuśiṃśapā // Rajni_9.129
GS40rajnighu:2893: priyako bījavṛkṣaś ca nīlakaḥ priyaśālakaḥ // Rajni_9.132
GS40rajnighu:2894: asanaḥ kaṭur uṣṇaś ca tikto vātārtidoṣanut /
GS40rajnighu:2899: sārakau kaṇḍudadrughnau śreṣṭhas tatrāsitas tayoḥ // Rajni_9.135
GS40rajnighu:2902: varuṇaḥ kaṭur uṣṇaś ca raktadoṣaharaḥ paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2909: karahāṭaḥ kṣuraś caiva śastrakośataruḥ saraḥ // Rajni_9.140
GS40rajnighu:2916: kaṭabhī nābhikā śauṇḍī pāṭalī kiṇihī tathā /
GS40rajnighu:2917: madhureṇuḥ kṣudraśāmā kaiḍaryaḥ śyāmalā nava // Rajni_9.144
GS40rajnighu:2922: vātakaphājīrṇarujāśamanī śvetā ca tatra guṇayuktā // Rajni_9.146
GS40rajnighu:2923: kṣavakaḥ kṣurakas tīkṣṇaḥ krūro bhūtāṅkuśaḥ kṣavaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2929: sarṣapo nirjarādiḥ syāt kurarāṅghrir navābhidhaḥ // Rajni_9.149
GS40rajnighu:2933: ḍahuḥ kārśyaś ca śūraś ca sthūlaskandho navāhvayaḥ // Rajni_9.151
GS40rajnighu:2934: lakucaḥ svarase tiktaḥ kaṣāyoṣṇo laghus tathā /
GS40rajnighu:2939: piṇḍarohiṇakaḥ pūtaḥ kiṅkiṇī ca tripañcadhā // Rajni_9.154
GS40rajnighu:2943: vaidyo vai dyatu vargam enam akhilaṃ vijñāya vaijñānikaḥ prajñālokavijṛmbhaṇena sahasā svairaṃ gadānāṃ gaṇam // Rajni_9.156
GS40rajnighu:2944: ye vṛścanti nṛṇāṃ gadān gurutarān ākramya vīryāsinā ye sthitvāpi vane guṇena sarujāṃ svenāvanaṃ tanvate /
GS40rajnighu:2945: teṣām eṣa mahān asīmamahimā vanyātmanāṃ vāsabhūr vṛkṣāṇāṃ bhaṇito bhiṣagbhir asamo yo vṛkṣavargākhyayā // Rajni_9.157
GS40rajnighu:2947: tasyāyaṃ navamaḥ kṛtau naraharer vargaḥ prabhadrādiko bhadrātmany abhidhānaśekharaśikhācūḍāmaṇau saṃsthitaḥ // Rajni_9.158
GS40rajnighu:2951: kovidāro 'bdhir arkaḥ syān nameruḥ kiṃśukas tathā // Rajni_10.1
GS40rajnighu:2952: punnāgas tilako 'gastyaḥ pāṭalyau ca dvidhā smṛte /
GS40rajnighu:2953: aśokaś campako dhanvī ketakī dvividhā tathā // Rajni_10.2
GS40rajnighu:2954: sindūrī ca tathā jātī mudgaraḥ śatapatrikā /
GS40rajnighu:2955: mallikā ca caturdhā syād vāsantī navamallikā // Rajni_10.3
GS40rajnighu:2957: karuṇī mādhavī cātha gaṇikārī ca kundakaḥ // Rajni_10.4
GS40rajnighu:2959: proktā bhramaramārī ca taruṇy amlānakas tathā // Rajni_10.5
GS40rajnighu:2961: tagaraṃ damanadvandvaṃ tulasī maruvo dvidhā // Rajni_10.6
GS40rajnighu:2962: arjakaś ca caturgaṅgā patrī pācī ca bālakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2965: padmākṣaṃ ca mṛṇālaṃ tatkandaḥ kesaraś ca tathā // Rajni_10.8
GS40rajnighu:2977: caṇḍīkusumaḥ krūro bhūtadrāvī ravipriyo munibhiḥ // Rajni_10.14
GS40rajnighu:2978: raktas tu karavīraḥ syāt kaṭustīkṣṇo viśodhakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2981: kṛṣṇas tu kṛṣṇakusumaś caturvidho 'yaṃ guṇe tulyaḥ // Rajni_10.16
GS40rajnighu:2983: śaṭho mātulakaḥ śyāmo madanaḥ śivaśekharaḥ // Rajni_10.17
GS40rajnighu:2986: dhattūraḥ kaṭur uṣṇaś ca kāntikārī vraṇārtinut /
GS40rajnighu:2989: kṛṣṇapuṣpo viṣārātiḥ krūradhūrtaś ca kīrtitaḥ // Rajni_10.20
GS40rajnighu:2993: sāmānyaguṇopetās teṣu guṇāḍhyas tu kṛṣṇakusumaḥ syāt // Rajni_10.22
GS40rajnighu:2995: kāntapuṣpaś ca karakaḥ kāntāro yamalacchadaḥ // Rajni_10.23
GS40rajnighu:3001: vikṣīro bhāskaraḥ kṣīrī kharjūghnaḥ śivapuṣpakaḥ // Rajni_10.26
GS40rajnighu:3002: bhañjanaḥ kṣīraparṇī syāt savitā ca vikīraṇaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3003: sūryāhvaś ca sadāpuṣpo ravir āsphoṭakas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3004: tūlaphalaḥ śukaphalo viṃśatiś ca samāhvayaḥ // Rajni_10.27
GS40rajnighu:3005: arkas tu kaṭur uṣṇaś ca vātajid dīpanīyakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3007: śuklārkas tapanaḥ śvetaḥ pratāpaś ca sitārkakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3008: supuṣpaḥ śaṅkarādiḥ syād atyarko vṛttamallikā // Rajni_10.29
GS40rajnighu:3012: kāṣṭhīlaś ca sadāpuṣpo jñeyo 'tra saptasaṃmitaḥ // Rajni_10.31
GS40rajnighu:3015: śvetamandārakas tv anyaḥ pṛthvī kuravakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3026: tasya puṣpaṃ ca soṣṇaṃ ca kaṇḍūkuṣṭhārttināśanam /
GS40rajnighu:3027: raktaḥ pītaḥ sito nīlaḥ kusumais tu vibhajyate // Rajni_10.38
GS40rajnighu:3028: kiṃśukair guṇasāmye 'pi sito vijñānadaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_10.39
GS40rajnighu:3029: punnāgaḥ puruṣas tuṅgaḥ punnāmā pāṭalaḥ pumān /
GS40rajnighu:3033: tilako viśeṣakaḥ syān mukhamaṇḍanakaś ca puṇḍrakaḥ puṇḍraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3034: sthirapuṣpaḥ chinnaruho dagdharuho recakaś ca mṛtajīvī // Rajni_10.42
GS40rajnighu:3041: agastyaḥ śīghrapuṣpaḥ syāt agastis tu munidrumaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3050: pāṭalī tu rase tiktā kaṭūṣṇā kaphavātajit /
GS40rajnighu:3054: pāṭalī dhavalā proktā jñeyā vasumitāhvayā // Rajni_10.51
GS40rajnighu:3058: madhupuṣpo 'paśokaś ca kaṅkeliḥ kelikas tathā // Rajni_10.53
GS40rajnighu:3062: piṇḍīpuṣpo naṭaś caiva pallavadrur dviviṃśatiḥ // Rajni_10.55
GS40rajnighu:3066: subhago bhṛṅgamohī ca śītalo bhramarātithiḥ // Rajni_10.57
GS40rajnighu:3070: tatkalikā gandhaphalī bahugandhā gandhamodinī tredhā // Rajni_10.59
GS40rajnighu:3073: kṣudrādicampakas tv anyaḥ sa jñeyo nāgacampakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3076: cakṣuṣyo vraṇaropī vahnistambhaṃ karoti yogaguṇāt // Rajni_10.62
GS40rajnighu:3077: bakulas tu sīdhugandhaḥ strīmukhamadhudohalaś ca madhupuṣpaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3078: surabhir bhramarānandaḥ sthirakusumaḥ kesaraś ca śāradikaḥ // Rajni_10.63
GS40rajnighu:3079: karakaḥ sīdhusaṃjñas tu viśārado gūḍhapuṣpako dhanvī /
GS40rajnighu:3080: madano madyāmodaś cirapuṣpaś ceti saptadaśasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_10.64
GS40rajnighu:3082: madhuraś ca kaṣāyaś ca madāḍhyo haryadāyakaḥ // Rajni_10.65
GS40rajnighu:3083: bakulakusumaṃ ca rucyaṃ kṣīrāḍhyaṃ surabhi śītalaṃ madhuram /
GS40rajnighu:3086: medhyā kaṇṭadalā caiva śivadviṣṭā nṛpapriyā // Rajni_10.67
GS40rajnighu:3087: krakacā dīrghapatrā ca sthiragandhā tu pāṃśulā /
GS40rajnighu:3089: svarṇādiketakī tv anyā jñeyā sā hemaketakī /
GS40rajnighu:3091: viṣṭaruhā svarṇapuṣpī kāmakhaḍgadalā ca sā // Rajni_10.69
GS40rajnighu:3100: jātī surabhigandhā syāt sumanā tu surapriyā /
GS40rajnighu:3101: cetakī sukumārā tu sandhyāpuṣpī manoharā // Rajni_10.74
GS40rajnighu:3103: janeṣṭā hṛdyagandhā ca nāmāny asyāś caturdaśa /
GS40rajnighu:3106: mudgaro gandhasāras tu saptapatraś ca kardamī /
GS40rajnighu:3108: geyapriyo janeṣṭaś ca mṛgeṣṭo rudrasammitaḥ // Rajni_10.76
GS40rajnighu:3115: mallikā bhadravallī tu gaurī ca vanacandrikā /
GS40rajnighu:3116: śītabhīruḥ priyā saumyā nārīṣṭā girijā sitā /
GS40rajnighu:3117: mallī ca damayantī ca candrikā modinī manuḥ // Rajni_10.80
GS40rajnighu:3123: vraṇaghnī gandhabahalā dārayaty āsyajān gadān // Rajni_10.83
GS40rajnighu:3124: vārṣikā tripuṭā tryasrā surūpā sulabhā priyā /
GS40rajnighu:3129: mṛgamadavāsā tv anyā kastūrīmallikā jñeyā // Rajni_10.86
GS40rajnighu:3131: vanamallikā nu sā syād āsphotā kintu samaguṇopetā // Rajni_10.87
GS40rajnighu:3133: śītasahā madhubahalā vasantadūtī ca vasunāmnī // Rajni_10.88
GS40rajnighu:3138: sugandhā śikhariṇī syān nevālī cendubhūhvayā // Rajni_10.90
GS40rajnighu:3141: madanī bhramarānandā kāmakāntā ca pañcākhyā // Rajni_10.92
GS40rajnighu:3145: modanī bahugandhā ca bhṛṅgānandā gajāhvayā // Rajni_10.94
GS40rajnighu:3149: manoharā ca gandhāḍhyā proktā trayodaśāhvayā // Rajni_10.96
GS40rajnighu:3155: surūpaṃ tu sugandhāḍhyaṃ svarṇayūthyā viśeṣataḥ // Rajni_10.99
GS40rajnighu:3159: puṣpaṃ tu śītalaṃ varṇyaṃ dāhaghnaṃ vātapittajit // Rajni_10.101
GS40rajnighu:3160: mucakundo bahupatraḥ sudalo harivallabhaḥ supuṣpaś ca /
GS40rajnighu:3161: arghyārho lakṣmaṇako raktaprasavaś ca vasunāmā // Rajni_10.102
GS40rajnighu:3164: karuṇī grīṣmapuṣpī syād raktapuṣpī ca vāruṇī /
GS40rajnighu:3165: rājapriyā rājapuṣpī sūkṣmā ca brahmacāriṇī // Rajni_10.104
GS40rajnighu:3176: kundas tu makarandaś ca mahāmodo manoharaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3178: damano vanahāsaś ca manojño rudrasammitaḥ // Rajni_10.111
GS40rajnighu:3181: bakaḥ pāśupataḥ śaivaḥ śivapiṇḍaś ca suvrataḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3182: vasukaś ca śivāṅkaś ca śiveṣṭaḥ kramapūrakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3193: jvarahārī vividhagrahapiśācaśamanaḥ prasādanaḥ savituḥ syāt // Rajni_10.118
GS40rajnighu:3195: trisandhyakusumā kāntā sukumārā ca sandhijā // Rajni_10.119
GS40rajnighu:3196: trisandhis trividhā jñeyā raktā cānyā sitāsitā /
GS40rajnighu:3198: japākhyā oḍrakākhyā ca raktapuṣpī javā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3200: japā tu kaṭur uṣṇā syād indraluptakanāśakṛt /
GS40rajnighu:3203: kuṣṭhārir bhramarī caiva jñeyā yaṣṭilatā muniḥ // Rajni_10.123
GS40rajnighu:3206: taruṇī sahā kumārī gandhāḍhyā cārukesarā bhṛṅgeṣṭā /
GS40rajnighu:3207: rāmataruṇī tu sudalā bahupatrā bhṛṅgavallabhā ca daśāhvā // Rajni_10.125
GS40rajnighu:3211: amilātakaḥ supuṣpaḥ suvarṇapuṣpaś ca saptāhvaḥ // Rajni_10.127
GS40rajnighu:3213: cakṣuṣyā harṣadā hṛdyā surabhiḥ suravallabhā // Rajni_10.128
GS40rajnighu:3214: atha raktāmlānaḥ syād raktasahākhyaḥ sa cāparimlānaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3215: raktāmalāntako 'pi ca raktaprasavaś ca kuravakaś caiva // Rajni_10.129
GS40rajnighu:3217: subhago bhramarānandaḥ syād ity ayaṃ pakṣacandramitaḥ // Rajni_10.130
GS40rajnighu:3220: pītaḥ sa kiṅkirātaḥ pītāmlānaḥ kuraṇṭakaḥ kanakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3221: pītakuravaḥ supītaḥ sa pītakusumaś ca saptasaṃjñakaḥ syāt // Rajni_10.132
GS40rajnighu:3224: nīlapuṣpā tu sā dāsī nīlāmlānas tu chādanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3225: bālā cārttagalā caiva nīlapuṣpā ca ṣaḍvidhā // Rajni_10.134
GS40rajnighu:3228: kaṇṭakaraṇṭo jhiṇṭī sā vanyasahacarī tu sā pītā /
GS40rajnighu:3229: śoṇī kuravakanāmnī kaṇṭakinī śoṇajhiṇṭikā caiva // Rajni_10.136
GS40rajnighu:3230: sānyā tu nīlajhiṇṭī nīlakuraṇṭaś ca nīlakusumā ca /
GS40rajnighu:3231: bāṇo bāṇā dāsī kaṇṭārttagalā ca saptasaṃjñā syāt // Rajni_10.137
GS40rajnighu:3232: jhiṇṭikāḥ kaṭukās tiktā dantāmayaśāntidāś ca śūlaghnāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3235: raktā lohitapuṣpī ca varṇapuṣpī ṣaḍāhvayā // Rajni_10.139
GS40rajnighu:3237: tadbījaṃ madhuraṃ śītaṃ vṛṣyaṃ santarpaṇaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_10.140
GS40rajnighu:3238: tagaraṃ kuṭilaṃ vakraṃ vinamraṃ kuñcitaṃ natam /
GS40rajnighu:3239: śaṭhaṃ ca nahuṣākhyaṃ ca dadruhastaṃ ca barhaṇam // Rajni_10.141
GS40rajnighu:3241: kālānusārakaṃ kṣatraṃ dīnaṃ jihmaṃ munīndudhā // Rajni_10.142
GS40rajnighu:3244: atha damanakas tu damano dānto gandhotkaṭo munir jaṭilaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3245: daṇḍī ca pāṇḍurāgo brahmajaṭā puṇḍarīkaś ca // Rajni_10.144
GS40rajnighu:3247: kulapatraś ca vinītastapasvipatraś ca saptadhātrīkaḥ // Rajni_10.145
GS40rajnighu:3250: anyaś ca vanyadamano vanādināmā ca damanaparyāyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3253: surejyā surasā jñeyā kāyasthā suradundubhī // Rajni_10.148
GS40rajnighu:3254: surabhir bahupatrī ca mañjarī sā haripriyā /
GS40rajnighu:3256: bhūtaghnī pūtapatrī ca jñeyā caikonaviṃśatiḥ // Rajni_10.149
GS40rajnighu:3259: kṛṣṇā tu kṛṣṇatulasī śvetā lakṣmīḥ sitāhvayā /
GS40rajnighu:3262: bahuvīryaḥ śītalakaḥ surāhvaś ca samīraṇaḥ // Rajni_10.152
GS40rajnighu:3265: dvidhā maruvakaḥ proktaḥ śvetaś caiva sitetaraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3266: śveto bheṣajakārye syād aparaḥ śivapūjane // Rajni_10.154
GS40rajnighu:3270: ugragandhaś ca jambīraḥ kuṭheraś ca kaṭhiñjaraḥ // Rajni_10.156
GS40rajnighu:3274: syāt kṛṣṇamallikā proktā garaghno vanabarbaraḥ // Rajni_10.158
GS40rajnighu:3279: nidrāluḥ śophahārī ca suvaktraś ca daśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_10.160
GS40rajnighu:3280: vanabarbarikā coṣṇā sugandhā kaṭukā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3282: gaṅgāpatrī tu patrī syāt sugandhā gandhapatrikā /
GS40rajnighu:3283: gaṅgāpatrī kaṭūṣṇā ca vātajid vraṇaropaṇī // Rajni_10.162
GS40rajnighu:3289: keśyaṃ vajram udīcyaṃ ca piṅgaṃ ca lalanāpriyam /
GS40rajnighu:3290: bālaṃ ca kuntalośīraṃ kacāmodaṃ śaśīndudhā // Rajni_10.165
GS40rajnighu:3300: dīpanaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ varṇyaṃ bālahitaṃ tathā // Rajni_10.170
GS40rajnighu:3305: pāthojaṃ kamalaṃ nabhaṃ ca nalināmbhojāmbujanmāmbujaṃ śrīpadmāmburuhābjapadmajalajāny ambhoruhaṃ sārasam /
GS40rajnighu:3306: paṅkejaṃ sarasīruhaṃ ca kuṭapaṃ pāthoruhaṃ puṣkaraṃ vārjaṃ tāmarasaṃ kuśeśayakaje kañjāravinde tathā // Rajni_10.173
GS40rajnighu:3315: kokanadam aruṇakamalaṃ raktāmbhojaṃ ca śoṇapadmaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3316: raktotpalam aravindaṃ ravipriyaṃ raktavārijaṃ vasavaḥ // Rajni_10.178
GS40rajnighu:3317: kokanadaṃ kaṭutiktaṃ madhuraṃ śiśiraṃ ca raktadoṣaharam /
GS40rajnighu:3322: rucyaṃ rasāyane śreṣṭhaṃ keśyaṃ ca dehadārḍhyadam // Rajni_10.181
GS40rajnighu:3323: īṣat śvetaṃ padmaṃ nalinaṃ ca tad uktam īṣad āraktam /
GS40rajnighu:3324: utpalam īṣan nīlaṃ trividham itīdaṃ bhavet kamalam // Rajni_10.182
GS40rajnighu:3327: padminī nalinī proktā kūṭapiny abjinī tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3329: padminī madhurā tiktā kaṣāyā śiśirā parā /
GS40rajnighu:3331: padmabījaṃ tu padmākṣaṃ gāloḍyaṃ kandalī ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3332: bheḍā krauñcādanī krauñcā śyāmā syāt padmakarkaṭī // Rajni_10.186
GS40rajnighu:3335: mṛṇālaṃ padmanālaṃ ca mṛṇālī ca mṛṇālinī /
GS40rajnighu:3336: bisaṃ ca padmatantuś ca bisinī nalinīruham // Rajni_10.188
GS40rajnighu:3340: śālīnaṃ ca jalālūkaṃ syād ity evaṃ ṣaḍāhvayam // Rajni_10.190
GS40rajnighu:3341: śālūkaṃ kaṭu viṣṭambhi rūkṣaṃ rucyaṃ kaphāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:3344: kiñjaṃ pītaṃ parāgaṃ ca tuṅgaṃ cāmpeyakaṃ nava // Rajni_10.192
GS40rajnighu:3348: himābjaṃ śītajalajaṃ niśāphullaṃ ca saptadhā // Rajni_10.194
GS40rajnighu:3351: dhavalotpalaṃ tu kumudaṃ kahlāraṃ kairavaṃ ca śītalakam /
GS40rajnighu:3352: śaśikāntam indukamalaṃ candrābjaṃ candrikāmbujaṃ ca nava // Rajni_10.196
GS40rajnighu:3353: kumudaṃ śītalaṃ svādu pāke tiktaṃ kaphāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:3355: nīlotpalam utpalakaṃ kuvalayam indīvaraṃ ca kandottham /
GS40rajnighu:3356: saugandhikaṃ sugandhaṃ kuḍmalakaṃ cāsitotpalaṃ navadhā // Rajni_10.198
GS40rajnighu:3358: pāke tu tiktam atyantaṃ raktapittāpahārakam // Rajni_10.199
GS40rajnighu:3359: utpalinī kairaviṇī kumudvatī kumudinī ca candreṣṭā /
GS40rajnighu:3366: tṛṣṇārtipittakaphadoṣaharaḥ saraś ca santarpaṇaś ciram arocakahārakaś ca // Rajni_10.203
GS40rajnighu:3367: jātī bhāti mṛdur manojñamadhurāmodā muhūrtadvayaṃ dvaiguṇyena ca mallikā madakarī gandhādhikā yūthikā /
GS40rajnighu:3368: ekāhaṃ navamālikā madakaraṃ cāhnāṃ trayaṃ campakaṃ tīvrāmodam athāṣṭavāsaramitāmodānvitā ketakī // Rajni_10.204
GS40rajnighu:3370: vācoyuktisthiraparimalaṃ vargam enaṃ paṭhitvā nityāmodair mukhasarasijaṃ vāsayatv āśu vaidyaḥ // Rajni_10.205
GS40rajnighu:3371: sthairye śailaśilopamāny api śanair āsādya tadbhāvanāṃ bhedyatvaṃ yamināṃ manāṃsy api yayuḥ puṣpāśugasyāśugaiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3372: teṣāṃ bhūṣayatāṃ surādikaśiraḥ patraprasūnātmanāṃ vargo 'yaṃ vasatir matā sumanasām uttaṃsavargākhyayā // Rajni_10.206
GS40rajnighu:3373: lokān sparśanayogataḥ prasṛmarāṇy āmodayanty añjasā protphullāni ca yad yaśāṃsi viśadāny uttaṃsayante diśaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3374: tasyāyaṃ daśamaḥ kṛtau sthitim agād vargo nṛsiṃheśituḥ sūrīndoḥ karavīrakādir abhidhāsambhāracūḍāmaṇau // Rajni_10.207
GS40rajnighu:3377: āmrāḥ pañcavidhāḥ proktā jambūś caiva caturvidhā /
GS40rajnighu:3378: panasaḥ kadalī cābdhiḥ nārikeladvayaṃ tathā // Rajni_11.1
GS40rajnighu:3380: dāḍimaṃ tindukau cātho akṣoṭaḥ pīluko dvidhā // Rajni_11.2
GS40rajnighu:3381: pārevate madhūkaṃ tu dvidhā bhavyāruke kramāt /
GS40rajnighu:3382: drākṣā tridhātha karmāraḥ paruṣaḥ pippalo vaṭaḥ // Rajni_11.3
GS40rajnighu:3383: vaṭī cāśvatthikā plakṣas tathā codumbaras tridhā /
GS40rajnighu:3384: tattvacā badaraṃ cābdhi bījapūraṃ tridhā matam // Rajni_11.4
GS40rajnighu:3385: āmalakyau dvidhā caiva ciñcā ciñcārasas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3388: katakaḥ karkaṭaś caiva dvidhā śleṣmātakas tathā // Rajni_11.6
GS40rajnighu:3389: muṣkakaḥ karamardaś ca tathā tejaḥphalas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3390: vikaṇṭakaḥ śivā saptāpy akṣaḥ pūgo 'ṣṭadhā smṛtaḥ // Rajni_11.7
GS40rajnighu:3391: saptadhā nāgavallī syāc cūrṇaṃ caivāṣṭadhā smṛtam /
GS40rajnighu:3394: kāmāṅgaḥ sahakāraś ca kīreṣṭo mādhavadrumaḥ // Rajni_11.9
GS40rajnighu:3398: priyāmbuḥ kokilāvāsaḥ sa proktas trikarāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.11
GS40rajnighu:3399: āmraḥ kaṣāyāmlarasaḥ sugandhiḥ kaṇṭhāmayaghno 'gnikaraś ca bālaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3401: bālaṃ pittānilakaphakaraṃ tac ca baddhāsthi tādṛk pakvaṃ doṣatritayaśamanaṃ svādu puṣṭiṃ guruṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3402: datte dhātupracayam adhikaṃ tarpaṇaṃ kāntikāri khyātaṃ tṛṣṇāśramaśamakṛtau cūtajātaṃ phalaṃ syāt // Rajni_11.13
GS40rajnighu:3404: kṣudrāmraś ceti raktāmro lākṣāvṛkṣaḥ suraktakaḥ // Rajni_11.14
GS40rajnighu:3405: kośāmram amlam anilāpaharaṃ kaphārttipittapradaṃ guru vidāhaviśophakāri /
GS40rajnighu:3406: pakvaṃ bhaven madhuram īṣad apāram amlaṃ paṭvādiyuktarucidīpanapuṣṭibalyam // Rajni_11.15
GS40rajnighu:3418: rājāmreṣu triṣu proktaṃ sāmyam eva rasādhikam /
GS40rajnighu:3419: guṇādhikaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ paryāyād uttarottaram // Rajni_11.21
GS40rajnighu:3420: bālaṃ rājaphalaṃ kaphāsrapavanaśvāsārtipittapradaṃ madhyaṃ tādṛśam eva doṣabahulaṃ bhūyaḥ kaṣāyāmlakam /
GS40rajnighu:3421: pakvaṃ cen madhuraṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ tṛṣṇāvidāhaśramaśvāsārocakamocakaṃ guru himaṃ vṛṣyāticūtāhvayam // Rajni_11.22
GS40rajnighu:3422: āmratvacā kaṣāyā ca mūlaṃ saugandhi tādṛśam /
GS40rajnighu:3423: rucyaṃ saṃgrāhi śiśiraṃ puṣpaṃ tu rucidīpanam // Rajni_11.23
GS40rajnighu:3424: jambūs tu surabhipatrā nīlaphalā śyāmalā mahāskandhā /
GS40rajnighu:3425: rājārhā rājaphalā śukapriyā meghamodinī navāhvā // Rajni_11.24
GS40rajnighu:3427: śvāsātisārakaphakāsavināśanī ca viṣṭambhinī bhavati rocanapācanī ca // Rajni_11.25
GS40rajnighu:3430: mahājambūr uṣṇā samadhurakaṣāyā śramaharā nirasyaty āsyasthaṃ jhaṭiti jaḍimānaṃ svarakarī /
GS40rajnighu:3431: vidhatte viṣṭambhaṃ śamayati ca śoṣaṃ vitanute śramātīsārārttiśvasitakaphakāsapraśamanam // Rajni_11.27
GS40rajnighu:3433: bhṛṅgeṣṭā kākanīlā ca dhvāṅkṣajambūr dhanapriyā // Rajni_11.28
GS40rajnighu:3434: kākajambūḥ kaṣāyāmlā pāke tu madhurā guruḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3436: anyā ca bhūmijambūr hrasvaphalā bhṛṅgavallabhā hrasvā /
GS40rajnighu:3437: bhūjambūr bhramareṣṭā pikabhakṣā kāṣṭhajambūś ca // Rajni_11.30
GS40rajnighu:3441: sthūlaḥ kaṇṭaphalaś caiva syān mūlaphaladaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3442: apuṣpaphaladaḥ pūtaphalo hy aṅkamitas tathā // Rajni_11.32
GS40rajnighu:3443: panasaṃ madhuraṃ supicchilaṃ guru hṛdyaṃ balavīryavṛddhidam /
GS40rajnighu:3444: śramadāhaviśoṣanāśanaṃ rucikṛd grāhi ca durjaraṃ param // Rajni_11.33
GS40rajnighu:3445: īṣat kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ tadbījaṃ vātalaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:3447: bālaṃ tu nīrasaṃ hṛdyaṃ madhyapakvaṃ tu dīpanam /
GS40rajnighu:3448: rucidaṃ lavaṇādy uktaṃ panasasya phalaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_11.35
GS40rajnighu:3452: ūrustambhā bhānuphalā vanalakṣmīś ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_11.37
GS40rajnighu:3453: bālaṃ phalaṃ madhuram alpatayā kaṣāyaṃ pittāpahaṃ śiśirarucyam athāpi nālam /
GS40rajnighu:3454: puṣpaṃ tad apy anuguṇaṃ krimihāri kandaṃ parṇaṃ ca śūlaśamakaṃ kadalībhavaṃ syāt // Rajni_11.38
GS40rajnighu:3455: rambhāpakvaphalaṃ kaṣāyamadhuraṃ balyaṃ ca śītaṃ tathā pittaṃ cāsravimardanaṃ gurutaraṃ pathyaṃ na mandānale /
GS40rajnighu:3456: sadyaḥ śukravivṛddhidaṃ klamaharaṃ tṛṣṇāpahaṃ kāntidaṃ dīptāgnau sukhadaṃ kaphāmayakaraṃ santarpaṇaṃ durjaram // Rajni_11.39
GS40rajnighu:3458: dārukadalī phalāḍhyā vanamocā cāśmakadalī ca // Rajni_11.40
GS40rajnighu:3460: gurur mandāgnijananī durjarā madhurā parā // Rajni_11.41
GS40rajnighu:3464: tṛṭpittadāhaśoṣapraśamanakartrī ca durjarā ca guruḥ // Rajni_11.43
GS40rajnighu:3465: anyā suvarṇakadalī suvarṇarambhā ca kanakarambhā ca /
GS40rajnighu:3466: pītā suvarṇamocā campakarambhā surambhikā subhagā // Rajni_11.44
GS40rajnighu:3467: hemaphalā svarṇaphalā kanakastambhā ca pītarambhā ca /
GS40rajnighu:3468: gaurā ca gaurarambhā kāñcanakadalī surapriyā ṣaḍbhūḥ // Rajni_11.45
GS40rajnighu:3469: suvarṇamocā madhurā himā ca svalpāśane dīpanakāriṇī ca /
GS40rajnighu:3470: tṛṣṇāpahā dāhavimocanī ca kaphāvahā vṛṣyakarī guruś ca // Rajni_11.46
GS40rajnighu:3477: nārikelasalilaṃ laghu balyaṃ śītalaṃ ca madhuraṃ guru pāke pittapīnasatṛṣāśramadāhaśānti śoṣaśamanaṃ sukhadāyi /
GS40rajnighu:3478: pakvam etad api kiṃcid ihoktaṃ pittakāri rucidaṃ madhuraṃ ca dīpanaṃ balakaraṃ guru vṛṣyaṃ vīryavardhanam idaṃ tu vadanti // Rajni_11.50
GS40rajnighu:3479: khubaraṃ nārikelasya snigdhaṃ guru ca durjaram /
GS40rajnighu:3482: mākṣikaphalo mṛduphalo bahukūrco hrasvaphalaś ca vasugaṇitāhvaḥ // Rajni_11.52
GS40rajnighu:3484: balapuṣṭikaraṃ ca kāntim agryaṃ kurute vīryavivardhanaṃ ca rucyam // Rajni_11.53
GS40rajnighu:3485: mādhvīkaṃ nārikelaṃ phalam atimadhuraṃ durjaraṃ jantukāri snigdhaṃ vātātisāraśramaśamanam atha dhvaṃsanaṃ vahnidīpteḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3486: āmaśleṣmaprakopaṃ janayati kurute cārukāntiṃ balaṃ ca sthairyaṃ dehasya dhatte ghanamadanakalāvardhanaṃ pittanāśam // Rajni_11.54
GS40rajnighu:3488: niḥśreṇī ca kaṣāyā ca yavaneṣṭā haripriyā // Rajni_11.55
GS40rajnighu:3489: kharjūrī tu kaṣāyā ca pakvā gaulyakaṣāyakā /
GS40rajnighu:3490: pittaghnī kaphadā caiva krimikṛd vṛṣyabṛṃhaṇī // Rajni_11.56
GS40rajnighu:3491: madhukharjūrī tv anyā madhukarkaṭikā ca kolakarkaṭikā /
GS40rajnighu:3492: kaṇṭakinī madhuphalikā mādhvī madhurā ca madhurakharjūrī // Rajni_11.57
GS40rajnighu:3494: śiśirā ca jantukarī bahuvīryavivardhanaṃ tanute // Rajni_11.58
GS40rajnighu:3496: bhūkharjūrī madhurā śiśirā ca vidāhapittaharā // Rajni_11.59
GS40rajnighu:3503: dāhaghnī madhurāsrapittaśamanī tṛṣṇārtidoṣāpahā śītā śvāsakaphaśramodayaharā santarpaṇī puṣṭidā /
GS40rajnighu:3504: vahner māndyakarī gurur viṣaharā hṛdyā ca datte balaṃ snigdhā vīryavivardhanī ca kathitā piṇḍākhyakharjūrikā // Rajni_11.63
GS40rajnighu:3505: cāraḥ khadruḥ kharaskandho lalanaś cārakas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3508: cārasya ca phalaṃ pakvaṃ vṛṣyaṃ gaulyāmlakaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:3511: krimighnas tailabījaś ca vātāriḥ sphoṭabījakaḥ // Rajni_11.66
GS40rajnighu:3513: vahnir varataruś ceti vijñeyaḥ ṣoḍaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.67
GS40rajnighu:3514: bhallātakaḥ kaṭus tiktaḥ kaṣāyoṣṇaḥ krimīñ jayet /
GS40rajnighu:3517: tanmajjā ca viśoṣadāhaśamanī pittāpahā tarpaṇī vātārocakahāridīptijananī pittāpahā tv añjasā // Rajni_11.69
GS40rajnighu:3523: vṛṣyā sthaulyakarī hṛdyā susnigdhā mehanāśakṛt // Rajni_11.72
GS40rajnighu:3525: karako raktabījaś ca suphalo dantabījakaḥ // Rajni_11.73
GS40rajnighu:3527: maṇibījas tathā valkaphalo vṛttaphalaś ca saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3528: sunīlo nīlapatraś ca jñeyaḥ saptadaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.74
GS40rajnighu:3530: grāhi dīpanakaraṃ ca laghūṣṇaṃ śītalaṃ śramaharaṃ rucidāyi // Rajni_11.75
GS40rajnighu:3531: dāḍimaṃ dvividham īritam āryair amlam ekam aparaṃ madhuraṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3532: tatra vātakaphahāri kilāmlaṃ tāpahāri madhuraṃ laghu pathyam // Rajni_11.76
GS40rajnighu:3534: sphūrjako rāmaṇaś caiva sphūrjanaḥ syandanāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.77
GS40rajnighu:3535: tindukas tu kaṣāyaḥ syāt saṃgrāhī vātakṛt paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3536: pakvas tu madhuraḥ snigdho durjaraḥ śleṣmalo guruḥ // Rajni_11.78
GS40rajnighu:3538: kākasphūrjaś ca kākenduḥ kākāhvaḥ kākabījakaḥ // Rajni_11.79
GS40rajnighu:3540: pakvas tu madhuraḥ kiṃcit kaphakṛt pittavāntihṛt // Rajni_11.80
GS40rajnighu:3542: kīreṣṭaḥ kandarālaś ca madhumajjā bṛhacchadaḥ // Rajni_11.81
GS40rajnighu:3545: pītuḥ śītaḥ sahasrāṃśī dhānī guḍaphalas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3548: saraḥ svāduś ca gulmārśaḥśamano dīpanaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_11.84
GS40rajnighu:3553: pārevataṃ tu raivatam ārevatakaṃ ca kiṃca raivatakam /
GS40rajnighu:3554: madhuphalam amṛtaphalākhyaṃ pārevatakaṃ ca saptāhvam // Rajni_11.87
GS40rajnighu:3555: pārevataṃ tu madhuraṃ krimivātahāri vṛṣyaṃ tṛṣājvaravidāhaharaṃ ca hṛdyam /
GS40rajnighu:3556: mūrchābhramaśramaviśoṣavināśakāri snigdhaṃ ca rucyam uditaṃ bahuvīryadāyi // Rajni_11.88
GS40rajnighu:3558: sāmrāṇijaṃ khārikaṃ ca raktaraivatakaṃ ca tat /
GS40rajnighu:3561: vṛṣyaṃ mūrchājvaraghnaṃ ca pūrvoktād adhikaṃ guṇaiḥ // Rajni_11.90
GS40rajnighu:3563: guḍapuṣpo lodhrapuṣpo vānaprasthaś ca mādhavaḥ // Rajni_11.91
GS40rajnighu:3567: kṣaudrapriyaḥ pataṅgaḥ kīreṣṭo gairikākṣaś ca // Rajni_11.93
GS40rajnighu:3569: vṛṣyo vāntiharaḥ śīto balakārī rasāyanaḥ // Rajni_11.94
GS40rajnighu:3570: madhūkapuṣpaṃ madhuraṃ ca vṛṣyaṃ hṛdyaṃ himaṃ pittavidāhahāri /
GS40rajnighu:3571: phalaṃ ca vātāmayapittanāśi jñeyaṃ madhūkadvayam evam etat // Rajni_11.95
GS40rajnighu:3572: bhavyaṃ bhavaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhāvanaṃ vaktraśodhanam /
GS40rajnighu:3573: tathā picchalabījaṃ ca tac ca lomaphalaṃ matam // Rajni_11.96
GS40rajnighu:3574: bhavyam amlaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca bālaṃ vātakaphāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:3575: pakvaṃ tu madhurāmlaṃ ca rucikṛt sāmaśūlahṛt // Rajni_11.97
GS40rajnighu:3576: ārukaṃ vīrasenaṃ ca vīraṃ vīrārukaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3578: ārukāṇi ca sarvāṇi madhurāṇi himāni ca /
GS40rajnighu:3581: gucchaphalā rasālā ca jñeyāmṛtaphalā ca sā // Rajni_11.100
GS40rajnighu:3583: mūtradoṣaharā rucyā vṛṣyā saṃtarpaṇī parā // Rajni_11.101
GS40rajnighu:3584: anyā kapiladrākṣā mṛdvīkā gostanī ca kapilaphalā /
GS40rajnighu:3585: amṛtarasā dīrghaphalā madhuvallī madhuphalā madhūlī ca // Rajni_11.102
GS40rajnighu:3586: haritā ca hārahūrā suphalā mṛdvī himottarāpathikā /
GS40rajnighu:3588: gostanī madhurā śītā hṛdyā ca madaharṣaṇī /
GS40rajnighu:3590: anyā sā kākalīdrākṣā jambukā ca phalottamā /
GS40rajnighu:3593: drākṣābālaphalaṃ kaṭūṣṇaviśadaṃ pittāsradoṣapradaṃ madhyaṃ cāmlarasaṃ rasāntaragate rucyātivahnipradam /
GS40rajnighu:3594: pakvaṃ cen madhuraṃ tathāmlasahitaṃ tṛṣṇāsrapittāpahaṃ pakvaṃ śuṣkatamaṃ śramārtiśamanaṃ santarpaṇaṃ puṣṭidam // Rajni_11.106
GS40rajnighu:3595: śītā pittāsradoṣaṃ damayati madhurā snigdhapākātirucyā cakṣuṣyā śvāsakāsaśramavamiśamanī śophatṛṣṇājvaraghnī /
GS40rajnighu:3596: dāhādhmānabhramādīn apanayati parā tarpaṇī pakvaśuṣkā drākṣā sukṣīṇavīryān api madanakalākelidakṣān vidhatte // Rajni_11.107
GS40rajnighu:3597: karmāraḥ karmarakaḥ pītaphalaḥ karmaraś ca mudgarakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3598: mudgaraphalaś ca dhārāphalakas tu karmārakaś caiva // Rajni_11.108
GS40rajnighu:3600: pakvas tu madhurāmlaḥ syād balapuṣṭirucipradaḥ // Rajni_11.109
GS40rajnighu:3602: nīlamaṇḍalam alpāsthi paruṣaṃ ca parus tathā // Rajni_11.110
GS40rajnighu:3603: parūṣam amlaṃ kaṭukaṃ kaphārtijid vātāpahaṃ tatphalam eva pittadam /
GS40rajnighu:3604: soṣṇaṃ ca pakvaṃ madhuraṃ rucipradaṃ pittāpahaṃ śophaharaṃ ca pītam // Rajni_11.111
GS40rajnighu:3606: śubhado bodhivṛkṣaś ca yājñiko gajabhakṣakaḥ // Rajni_11.112
GS40rajnighu:3607: śrīmān kṣīradrumo vipro maṅgalyaḥ śyāmalaś ca saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3608: pippalo guhyapuṣpaś ca sevyaḥ satyaḥ śucidrumaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3610: pippalaḥ sumadhuras tu kaṣāyaḥ śītalaś ca kaphapittavināśī /
GS40rajnighu:3611: raktadāhaśamanaḥ sa hi sadyo yonidoṣaharaṇaḥ kila pakvaḥ // Rajni_11.114
GS40rajnighu:3612: aśvatthavṛkṣasya phalāni pakvāny atīvahṛdyāni ca śītalāni /
GS40rajnighu:3614: syād atha vaṭo jaṭālo nyagrodho rohiṇo 'varohī ca /
GS40rajnighu:3615: viṭapī raktaphalaś ca skandharuho maṇḍalī mahācchāyaḥ // Rajni_11.116
GS40rajnighu:3617: kṣīrī śiphāruhaḥ syād bahupādaḥ sa tu vanaspatir navabhūḥ // Rajni_11.117
GS40rajnighu:3621: amarā saṅginī caiva kṣīrakāṣṭhā ca kīrtitā // Rajni_11.119
GS40rajnighu:3625: pippalikā vanasthā ca kṣudrā cāśvatthasaṃnibhā // Rajni_11.121
GS40rajnighu:3630: dṛḍhaprarohaḥ plavakaḥ plavaṅgaś ca mahābalaḥ // Rajni_11.123
GS40rajnighu:3632: puṇḍro mahāvarohaś ca hrasvaparṇas tu pimpariḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3639: saumyaḥ śītaphalaś ceti manusaṃjñaḥ samīritaḥ // Rajni_11.127
GS40rajnighu:3640: udumbaraṃ kaṣāyaṃ syāt pakvaṃ tu madhuraṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:3642: audumbaraṃ phalam atīva himaṃ supakvaṃ pittāpahaṃ ca madhuraṃ śramaśophahāri /
GS40rajnighu:3643: āmaṃ kaṣāyam atidīpanarocanaṃ ca māṃsasya vṛddhikaram asravikārakāri // Rajni_11.129
GS40rajnighu:3647: rasavīryavipākeṣu kiṃcin nyūnā ca pūrvataḥ // Rajni_11.131
GS40rajnighu:3649: udumbarī ca kaṭhinā kuṣṭhaghnī phalguvāṭikā // Rajni_11.132
GS40rajnighu:3659: subījaḥ suphalaḥ svacchaḥ surasaḥ smṛtisammitaḥ // Rajni_11.137
GS40rajnighu:3660: badaraṃ madhuraṃ kaṣāyam amlaṃ paripakvaṃ madhurāmlam uṣṇam etat /
GS40rajnighu:3665: pṛthukolas tanubījo madhuraphalo rājakolaś ca // Rajni_11.140
GS40rajnighu:3667: vṛṣyaś ca vīryavṛddhiṃ kurute śoṣaśramaṃ harati // Rajni_11.141
GS40rajnighu:3668: bhūbadarī kṣitibadarī vallībadarī ca badarivallī ca /
GS40rajnighu:3669: bahuphalikā laghubadarī badaraphalī sūkṣmabadarī ca // Rajni_11.142
GS40rajnighu:3673: madhuraḥ śambarāhāraḥ śikhipriyaś caiva nirdiṣṭaḥ // Rajni_11.144
GS40rajnighu:3675: snigdhaṃ tu jantukārakam īṣat pittārtidāhaśoṣaghnam // Rajni_11.145
GS40rajnighu:3677: bījakaḥ keśarāmlaś ca mātuluṅgaḥ supūrakaḥ // Rajni_11.146
GS40rajnighu:3681: kaṇṭhaśodhanaparaṃ laghu hṛdyaṃ dīpanaṃ ca rucikṛj jaraṇaṃ ca // Rajni_11.148
GS40rajnighu:3682: bālaṃ pittamarutkaphāsrakaraṇaṃ madhyaṃ ca tādṛgvidhaṃ pakvaṃ varṇakaraṃ ca hṛdyam atha tat puṣṇāti puṣṭiṃ balam /
GS40rajnighu:3683: śūlājīrṇavibandhamārutakaphaśvāsārtimandāgnijit kāsārocakaśophaśāntidam idaṃ syān mātuluṅgaṃ sadā // Rajni_11.149
GS40rajnighu:3684: tvak tiktā durjarā syāt kṛmikaphapavanadhvaṃsinī snigdham uṣṇaṃ madhyaṃ śūlārtipittapraśamanam akhilārocakaghnaṃ ca gaulyam /
GS40rajnighu:3685: vātārtighnaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ jaṭharagadaharaṃ kesaraṃ dīpyam amlaṃ bījaṃ tiktaṃ kaphārśaḥśvayathuśamakaraṃ bījapūrasya pathyam // Rajni_11.150
GS40rajnighu:3687: atyamlā gandhāḍhyā vanodbhavā devadūtī ca // Rajni_11.151
GS40rajnighu:3688: pītā ca devadāsī deveṣṭā mātuluṅgikā caiva /
GS40rajnighu:3689: pavanī mahāphalā ca syād iyam iti vedabhūmimitā // Rajni_11.152
GS40rajnighu:3690: amlaḥ kaṭūṣṇo vanabījapūro ruciprado vātavināśanaś ca /
GS40rajnighu:3691: syād amladoṣakṛmināśakārī kaphāpahaḥ śvāsaniṣūdanaś ca // Rajni_11.153
GS40rajnighu:3693: madhukarkaṭī madhuraphalā mahāphalā vardhamānā ca // Rajni_11.154
GS40rajnighu:3695: tridoṣaśamanī rucyā vṛṣyā ca gurudurjarā // Rajni_11.155
GS40rajnighu:3696: āmalakī vayaḥsthā ca śrīphalā dhātrikā tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3697: amṛtā ca śivā śāntā śītāmṛtaphalā tathā // Rajni_11.156
GS40rajnighu:3698: jātīphalā ca dhātreyī jñeyā dhātrīphalā tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3699: vṛṣyā vṛttaphalā caiva rocanī śarabhūhvayā // Rajni_11.157
GS40rajnighu:3702: kaṭu madhurakaṣāyaṃ kiṃcid amlaṃ kaphaghnaṃ rucikaram atiśītaṃ hanti pittāsratāpam /
GS40rajnighu:3707: śītaṃ pittāsradoṣaghnaṃ pūrvoktam adhikaṃ guṇaiḥ // Rajni_11.161
GS40rajnighu:3708: ciñcā tu cukrikā cukrā sāmlikā śākacukrikā /
GS40rajnighu:3709: amlī sutintiḍī cāmlā cukrikā ca navābhidhā // Rajni_11.162
GS40rajnighu:3710: ciñcātyamlā bhaved āmā pakvā tu madhurāmlikā /
GS40rajnighu:3712: amlikāyāḥ phalaṃ tv āmam atyamlaṃ laghu pittakṛt /
GS40rajnighu:3713: pakvaṃ tu madhurāmlaṃ syād bhedi viṣṭambhavātajit // Rajni_11.164
GS40rajnighu:3719: ciñcāmlam amlacūḍaś ca ciñcāraso 'pi saptadhā // Rajni_11.167
GS40rajnighu:3723: śṛṅgī kapirasāḍhyaś ca tanukṣīraḥ kapipriyaḥ // Rajni_11.169
GS40rajnighu:3725: pakvaṃ tu madhurāmlāḍhyaṃ snigdhaṃ pittakaphāpaham // Rajni_11.170
GS40rajnighu:3726: nāraṅgaḥ syān nāgaraṅgaḥ suraṅgas tvaggandhaś cairāvato vaktravāsaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3727: yogīraṅgo nāgaro yogaraṅgaḥ gandhāḍhyo 'yaṃ gandhapatro ravīṣṭaḥ // Rajni_11.171
GS40rajnighu:3728: nāraṅgaṃ madhuraṃ cāmlaṃ gurūṣṇaṃ caiva rocanam /
GS40rajnighu:3730: nimbūkaḥ syād amlajambīrakākhyo vahnir dīpyo vahnibījo 'mlasāraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3731: dantāghātaḥ śodhano jantumārī nimbūś ca syād rocano rudrasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_11.173
GS40rajnighu:3732: nimbūphalaṃ prathitam amlarasaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ gulmāmavātaharam agnivivṛddhikāri /
GS40rajnighu:3733: cakṣuṣyam etad atha kāsakaphārttikaṇṭhavicchardihāri paripakvam atīva rucyam // Rajni_11.174
GS40rajnighu:3735: rocanako mukhaśodhī jāḍyārir jantujin navadhā // Rajni_11.175
GS40rajnighu:3736: jambīrasya phalaṃ rase 'mlamadhuraṃ vātāpahaṃ pittakṛt pathyaṃ pācanarocanaṃ balakaraṃ vahner vivṛddhipradam /
GS40rajnighu:3737: pakvaṃ cen madhuraṃ kaphārttiśamanaṃ pittāsradoṣāpanut varṇyaṃ vīryavivarddhanaṃ ca rucikṛt puṣṭipradaṃ tarpaṇam // Rajni_11.176
GS40rajnighu:3739: śaṅkhadrāvī śarkarakaḥ pittadrāvī ca ṣaṭsaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_11.177
GS40rajnighu:3741: śoṣaghnas tarpaṇo vṛṣyaḥ śramaghnaḥ puṣṭikārakaḥ // Rajni_11.178
GS40rajnighu:3742: mālūras tu kapittho maṅgalyo nīlamallikā ca dadhi /
GS40rajnighu:3743: grāhiphalaś cirapākī granthiphalaḥ kucaphalo dadhiphalaś ca // Rajni_11.179
GS40rajnighu:3744: gandhaphalaś ca kapīṣṭo vṛttaphalaḥ karabhavallabhaś caiva /
GS40rajnighu:3745: dantaśaṭhaḥ kaṭhinaphalaḥ karaṇḍaphalakaś ca saptadaśasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_11.180
GS40rajnighu:3747: vṛṣyaḥ pittānilaṃ hanti saṃgrāhī vraṇanāśanaḥ // Rajni_11.181
GS40rajnighu:3748: āmaṃ kapittham amloṣṇāṃ kaphaghnaṃ grāhi vātalam /
GS40rajnighu:3750: āmaṃ kaṇṭharujaṃ kapittham adhikaṃ jihvājaḍatvāvahaṃ tad doṣatrayavardhanaṃ viṣaharaṃ saṃgrāhakaṃ rocakam /
GS40rajnighu:3751: pakvaṃ śvāsavamiśramaklamaharaṃ hikkāpanodakṣamaṃ sarvaṃ grāhi rucipradaṃ ca kathitaṃ sevyaṃ tataḥ sarvadā // Rajni_11.183
GS40rajnighu:3752: tumbaruḥ saurabhaḥ sauro vanajaḥ sānujo dvijaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3754: sphuṭaphalaḥ sugandhiś ca sa prokto dvādaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.184
GS40rajnighu:3757: rudrākṣaś ca śivākṣaś ca śarvākṣo bhūtanāśanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3758: pāvano nīlakaṇṭhākṣo harākṣaś ca śivapriyaḥ // Rajni_11.186
GS40rajnighu:3759: rudrākṣam amlam uṣṇaṃ ca vātaghnaṃ kaphanāśanam /
GS40rajnighu:3761: bilvaḥ śalyo hṛdyagandhaḥ śalāṭuḥ śāṇḍilyaḥ syāc chrīphalaḥ karkaṭāhvaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3762: śailūṣaḥ syāc chaivapatraḥ śiveṣṭaḥ patraśreṣṭho gandhapatras tripattraḥ // Rajni_11.188
GS40rajnighu:3763: lakṣmīphalo gandhaphalo durāruhas triśākapattras triśikhaḥ śivadrumaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3764: sadāphalaḥ satphaladaḥ subhūtikaḥ samīrasāraḥ śikhinetrasaṃjñitaḥ // Rajni_11.189
GS40rajnighu:3765: bilvas tu madhuro hṛdyaḥ kaṣāyaḥ pittajit guruḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3768: phalaṃ tu komalaṃ snigdhaṃ guru saṃgrāhi dīpanam // Rajni_11.191
GS40rajnighu:3769: tad eva pakvaṃ vijñeyaṃ madhuraṃ sarasaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:3772: surabhir gajabhakṣyā ca suvahā gajavallabhā // Rajni_11.193
GS40rajnighu:3774: hṛdyā kuṇṭarikā caiva proktā tryasraphalā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3779: rucyas tu chedanīyaś ca jñeyo guḍaphalaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3780: proktaḥ kataphalas tiktamarīcaś ca navāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.196
GS40rajnighu:3783: karkaṭaḥ kārkaṭaḥ karkaḥ kṣudradhātrī ca sa smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3784: kṣudrāmalakasaṃjñaś ca proktaḥ karkaphalaś ca ṣaṭ // Rajni_11.198
GS40rajnighu:3785: kārkaṭaṃ tu phalaṃ rucyaṃ kaṣāyaṃ dīpanaṃ param /
GS40rajnighu:3786: kaphapittaharaṃ grāhi cakṣuṣyaṃ laghu śītalam // Rajni_11.199
GS40rajnighu:3790: śleṣmātakaḥ kaṭuhimo madhuraḥ kaṣāyaḥ svāduś ca pācanakaraḥ krimiśūlahārī /
GS40rajnighu:3794: laghuśītaḥ sūkṣmaphalo laghubhūtadrumaś ca saḥ // Rajni_11.202
GS40rajnighu:3797: muṣkako mocako muṣko mokṣako muñcakas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3798: gauliko mehanaś caiva kṣāravṛkṣaś ca pāṭaliḥ // Rajni_11.204
GS40rajnighu:3800: śvetaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca sa dvedhā syāt trayodaśasaṃjñakaḥ // Rajni_11.205
GS40rajnighu:3801: muṣkakaḥ kaṭuko 'mlaś ca rocanaḥ pācanaḥ paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3804: avignaḥ pāṇimardaś ca kṛṣṇapākaphalo muniḥ // Rajni_11.207
GS40rajnighu:3810: tejaḥphalaḥ kaṭus tīkṣṇaḥ sugandhir dīpanaḥ paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3816: vikaṇṭakaḥ kaṣāyaḥ syāt kaṭū rūkṣo rucipradaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3818: harītakī hemavatī jayābhayā śivāvyathā cetanikā ca rohiṇī /
GS40rajnighu:3819: pathyā prapathyāpi pūtanāmṛtā jīvapriyā jīvanikā bhiṣagvarā // Rajni_11.214
GS40rajnighu:3820: jīvantī prāṇadā jīvyā kāyasthā śreyasī ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3821: devī divyā ca vijayā vahninetramitābhidhā // Rajni_11.215
GS40rajnighu:3822: harītakī pañcarasā ca recanī koṣṭhāmayaghnī lavaṇena varjitā /
GS40rajnighu:3823: rasāyanī netrarujāpahāriṇī tvagāmayaghnī kila yogavāhinī // Rajni_11.216
GS40rajnighu:3824: bījāsthitiktā madhurā tadantastvagbhāgataḥ sā kaṭur uṣṇavīryā /
GS40rajnighu:3825: māṃsāṃśataś cāmlakaṣāyayuktā harītakī pañcarasā smṛteyam // Rajni_11.217
GS40rajnighu:3827: tasyā nāmāni varṇāṃś ca vakṣyāmy atha yathākramam // Rajni_11.218
GS40rajnighu:3829: jīvantī cetakī ceti nāmnā saptavidhā matā // Rajni_11.219
GS40rajnighu:3831: svalpatvak pūtanā jñeyā sthūlamāṃsāmṛtā smṛtā // Rajni_11.220
GS40rajnighu:3833: tryasrāṃ tu cetakīṃ vidyād ity āsāṃ rūpalakṣaṇam // Rajni_11.221
GS40rajnighu:3834: vindhyādrau vijayā himācalabhavā syāc cetakī pūtanā sindhau syād atha rohiṇī tu vijayā jātā pratiṣṭhānake /
GS40rajnighu:3835: campāyām amṛtābhayā ca janitā deśe surāṣṭrāhvaye jīvantīti harītakī nigaditā saptaprabhedā budhaiḥ // Rajni_11.222
GS40rajnighu:3836: sarvaprayoge vijayā ca rohiṇī kṣateṣu lepeṣu tu pūtanoditā /
GS40rajnighu:3837: virecane syād amṛtā guṇādhikā jīvantikā syād iha jīrṇarogajit // Rajni_11.223
GS40rajnighu:3838: syāc cetakī sarvarujāpahārikā netrāmayaghnīm abhayāṃ vadanti /
GS40rajnighu:3839: itthaṃ yathāyogam iyaṃ prayojitā jñeyā guṇāḍhyā na kadācid anyathā // Rajni_11.224
GS40rajnighu:3840: cetakī ca dhṛtā haste yāvat tiṣṭhati dehinaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3841: tāvad viricyate vegāt tatprabhāvān na saṃśayaḥ // Rajni_11.225
GS40rajnighu:3842: saptānām api jātīnāṃ pradhānaṃ vijayā smṛtā /
GS40rajnighu:3844: kṣiptāpsu nimajjati yā sā jñeyā guṇavatī bhiṣagvaryaiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3845: yasyā yasyā bhūyo nimajjanaṃ sā guṇāḍhyā syāt // Rajni_11.227
GS40rajnighu:3846: harate prasabhaṃ vyādhīn bhūyas tarati yad vapuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3847: harītakī tu sā proktā tatra kīrdīptivācakaḥ // Rajni_11.228
GS40rajnighu:3849: śoṣe navajvare jīrṇe gurviṇyāṃ naiva śasyate // Rajni_11.229
GS40rajnighu:3851: saṃvartakas tu vāsantaḥ kalkivṛkṣo vaheḍakaḥ // Rajni_11.230
GS40rajnighu:3853: bahuvīryaś ca kāsaghnaḥ sa proktaḥ ṣoḍaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.231
GS40rajnighu:3855: cakṣuṣyaḥ palitaghnaś ca vipāke madhuro laghuḥ // Rajni_11.232
GS40rajnighu:3856: pūgas tu pūgavṛkṣaś ca kramuko dīrghapādapaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3857: valkatarur dṛḍhavalkaś cikkaṇaś ca munir mataḥ // Rajni_11.233
GS40rajnighu:3860: pūgaṃ tu cikkaṇī cikkā cikkaṇaṃ ślakṣṇakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3861: udvegaṃ kramukaphalaṃ jñeyaṃ pūgaphalaṃ vasu // Rajni_11.235
GS40rajnighu:3862: serī ca madhurā rucyā kaṣāyāmlā kaṭus tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3863: pathyā ca kaphavātaghnī sārikā mukhadoṣanut // Rajni_11.236
GS40rajnighu:3865: tridoṣaśamanaṃ dīpyaṃ rasālaṃ pācanaṃ samam // Rajni_11.237
GS40rajnighu:3866: gaulyaṃ guhāgaraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ kaṣāyaṃ kaṭu pācanam /
GS40rajnighu:3869: malaviṣṭambhaśamanī pittahṛd dīpanī ca sā // Rajni_11.239
GS40rajnighu:3870: pūgīphalaṃ ceulasaṃjñakaṃ yat tat koṅkaṇeṣu prathitaṃ sugandhi /
GS40rajnighu:3871: śleṣmāpahaṃ dīpanapācanaṃ ca balapradaṃ puṣṭikaraṃ rasāḍhyam // Rajni_11.240
GS40rajnighu:3872: yat koṅkaṇe valligulābhidhānakaṃ grāmodbhavaṃ pūgaphalaṃ tridoṣanut /
GS40rajnighu:3875: kaṭu svādu kaṣāyaṃ ca rucyaṃ dīpanapācanam /
GS40rajnighu:3877: vātajid vaktrajāḍyaghnam īṣad amlaṃ kaphāpaham // Rajni_11.242
GS40rajnighu:3878: pūgaṃ sammohakṛt sarvaṃ kaṣāyaṃ svādu recanam /
GS40rajnighu:3880: āmaṃ pūgaṃ kaṣāyaṃ mukhamalaśamanaṃ kaṇṭhaśuddhiṃ vidhatte raktāmaśleṣmapittapraśamanam udarādhmānahāraṃ saraṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3881: śuṣkaṃ kaṇṭhāmayaghnaṃ rucikaram uditaṃ pācanaṃ recanaṃ syāt tat parṇenāyutaṃ cet jhaṭiti vitanute pāṇḍuvātaṃ ca śoṣam // Rajni_11.244
GS40rajnighu:3882: atha bhavati nāgavallī tāmbūlī phaṇilatā ca saptaśirā /
GS40rajnighu:3883: parṇalatā phaṇivallī bhujagalatā bhakṣyapatrī ca // Rajni_11.245
GS40rajnighu:3885: kaphakāsaharā rucyā dāhakṛd dīpanī parā // Rajni_11.246
GS40rajnighu:3887: ekāpy eṣā deśamṛtsnāviśeṣān nānākāraṃ yāti kāye guṇe ca // Rajni_11.247
GS40rajnighu:3889: rasāḍhyā surasā rucyā vipāke śiśirā smṛtā // Rajni_11.248
GS40rajnighu:3890: syād amlavāṭī kaṭukāmlatiktā tīkṣṇā tathoṣṇā mukhapākakartrī /
GS40rajnighu:3891: vidāhapittāsravikopanī ca viṣṭambhadā vātanibarhaṇī ca // Rajni_11.249
GS40rajnighu:3892: satasā madhurā tīkṣṇā kaṭur uṣṇā ca pācanī /
GS40rajnighu:3895: sugandhi tīkṣṇā madhurātihṛdyā sandīpanī puṃstvakarātibalyā // Rajni_11.251
GS40rajnighu:3896: nāmnānyāmlasarā sutīkṣṇamadhurā rucyā himā dāhanut pittodrekaharā sudīpanakarī balyā mukhāmodinī /
GS40rajnighu:3897: strīsaubhāgyavivardhanī madakarī rājñāṃ sadā vallabhā gulmādhmānavibandhajic ca kathitā sā mālave tu sthitā // Rajni_11.252
GS40rajnighu:3898: andhre paṭulikā nāma kaṣāyoṣṇā kaṭus tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3900: hvesaṇīyā kaṭus tīkṣṇā hṛdyā dīrghadalā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3902: sadyas troṭitabhakṣitaṃ mukharujājāḍyāvahaṃ doṣakṛt dāhārocakaraktadāyi malakṛd viṣṭambhi vāntipradam /
GS40rajnighu:3903: yad bhūyo jalapānapoṣitarasaṃ tac cec cirāt troṭitaṃ tāmbūlīdalam uttamaṃ ca rucikṛd varṇyaṃ tridoṣārtinut // Rajni_11.255
GS40rajnighu:3904: kṛṣṇaṃ parṇaṃ tiktam uṣṇaṃ kaṣāyaṃ dhatte dāhaṃ vaktrajādyaṃ malaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3905: śubhraṃ parṇaṃ śleṣmavātāmayaghnaṃ pathyaṃ rucyaṃ dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ ca // Rajni_11.256
GS40rajnighu:3906: śirā parṇasya śaithilyaṃ kuryāt tasyāsrahṛd rasaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3907: śīrṇaṃ tvagdoṣadaṃ tasya bhakṣite ca śitaṃ sadā // Rajni_11.257
GS40rajnighu:3908: anidhāya mukhe parṇaṃ pūgaṃ khādāta yo naraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3909: matibhraṃśo daridraḥ syād ante smarati no harim // Rajni_11.258
GS40rajnighu:3910: parṇādhikye dīpanī raṅgadātrī pūgādhikye rūkṣadā kṛcchradātrī /
GS40rajnighu:3911: sārādhikye khādire śoṣadātrī cūrṇādhikye pittakṛt pūtigandhā // Rajni_11.259
GS40rajnighu:3912: cūrṇaṃ cārjunavṛkṣajaṃ kaphaharaṃ gulmaghnam arkāhvayaṃ śophaghnaṃ kuṭajaṃ karañjajanitaṃ vātāpahaṃ rucyadam /
GS40rajnighu:3913: pittaghnaṃ jalajaṃ balāgnirucidaṃ śailāhvayaṃ pittadaṃ sphāṭikyaṃ dṛḍhadantapaṅktijananaṃ śuktyādijaṃ rūkṣadam // Rajni_11.260
GS40rajnighu:3915: vargaṃ vaktrāmburuhavalabhīlāsyalīlārasālaṃ vidyāvaidyaḥ khalu saphalayed etam āmnāyabhūmnā // Rajni_11.261
GS40rajnighu:3916: yāny upabhuñjānānāṃ sa bhavati saṃsārapādapaḥ saphalaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3917: teṣām eṣa phalānāṃ vargaḥ phalavarga iti kathitaḥ // Rajni_11.262
GS40rajnighu:3918: yasyājasravikasvarāmalayaśaḥprāgbhārapuṣpodgamaḥ sāścaryaṃ vibudhepsitāni phalati śrīmān karaḥ svardrumaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3922: barbaraṃ harigandhaṃ ca candanaṃ saptadhā smṛtam // Rajni_12.1
GS40rajnighu:3923: devadāru dvidhā proktaṃ cīḍā saptacchadas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3924: saralaḥ kuṅkume kaṅguḥ kastūrī rocanā tathā // Rajni_12.2
GS40rajnighu:3925: karpūrau syāj javādis tu nandī ca jātipatrikā /
GS40rajnighu:3926: jātīphalaṃ ca kakkolaṃ lavaṅgaṃ svādur ucyate // Rajni_12.3
GS40rajnighu:3927: agarvyaś ca tridhā māṃsī turuṣko guggulus tridhā /
GS40rajnighu:3928: rālaḥ kundurukaḥ kuṣṭhaṃ sārivā tu dvidhā nakhau // Rajni_12.4
GS40rajnighu:3933: gośīrṣaṃ tilaparṇaṃ ca maṅgalyaṃ malayodbhavam // Rajni_12.6
GS40rajnighu:3934: gandharājaṃ sugandhaṃ ca sarpāvāsaṃ ca śītalam /
GS40rajnighu:3938: vṛṣyaṃ vaktrarujāpahaṃ pratanute kāntiṃ tanor dehināṃ liptaṃ suptamanojasindhuramadārambhādisaṃrambhadam // Rajni_12.8
GS40rajnighu:3939: śreṣṭhaṃ koṭarakarparopakalitaṃ sugranthi sadgauravaṃ chede raktamayaṃ tathā ca vimalaṃ pītaṃ ca yad dharṣaṇe /
GS40rajnighu:3940: svāde tiktakaṭuḥ sugandhabahulaṃ śītaṃ yad alpaṃ guṇe kṣīṇaṃ cārdhaguṇānvitaṃ tu kathitaṃ tac candanaṃ madhyamam // Rajni_12.9
GS40rajnighu:3942: beṭṭaṃ tu sārdravicchedaṃ svayaṃ śuṣkaṃ tu sukvaḍi // Rajni_12.10
GS40rajnighu:3944: tajjātaṃ candanaṃ yat tu beṭṭavācyaṃ kvacin mate // Rajni_12.11
GS40rajnighu:3948: śaityasugandhadaṃ cārdraṃ śuṣkaṃ lepe tadanyathā // Rajni_12.13
GS40rajnighu:3950: vanyaṃ ca gandhakāṣṭhaṃ kirātakāntaṃ ca śailagandhaṃ ca // Rajni_12.14
GS40rajnighu:3951: kairātam uṣṇaṃ kaṭuśītalaṃ ca śleṣmānilaghnaṃ śramapittahāri /
GS40rajnighu:3958: patrāḍhyaṃ paṭṭarāgaṃ ca bhāryāvṛkṣaś ca raktakaḥ // Rajni_12.18
GS40rajnighu:3960: paṭṭarañjanakaṃ caiva suraṅgaṃ ca caturdaśa // Rajni_12.19
GS40rajnighu:3961: patrāṅgaṃ kaṭukaṃ rūkṣam amlaṃ śītaṃ tu gaulyakam /
GS40rajnighu:3963: raktacandanam idaṃ ca lohitaṃ śoṇitaṃ ca haricandanaṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:3964: raktasāram atha tāmrasārakaṃ kṣudracandanam athārkacandanam // Rajni_12.21
GS40rajnighu:3968: śītaṃ sugandhi pittāri surabhi ceti saptadhā // Rajni_12.23
GS40rajnighu:3972: divijaṃ ca mahāgandhaṃ nandanajaṃ lohitaṃ ca navasaṃjñam // Rajni_12.25
GS40rajnighu:3973: haricandanaṃ tu divyaṃ tiktahimaṃ tad iha durlabhaṃ manujaiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3976: bhidyante kiṃtu gandhena tatrādyaṃ guṇavattaram // Rajni_12.27
GS40rajnighu:3977: devadāru suradāru dārukaṃ snigdhadārur amarādidāru ca /
GS40rajnighu:3978: bhadradāru śivadāru śāmbhavaṃ bhūtahāri bhavadāru rudravat // Rajni_12.28
GS40rajnighu:3984: bhūtadoṣāpahaṃ dhatte liptam aṅgeṣu kālikam // Rajni_12.31
GS40rajnighu:3986: dvitīyaṃ kāṣṭhadāru syād dvayor nāmāny abhedataḥ // Rajni_12.32
GS40rajnighu:3987: cīḍā ca dārugandhā gandhavadhūr gandhamādanī taruṇī /
GS40rajnighu:3988: tārā ca bhūtamārī maṅgalyā tu kapāṭinī grahabhītijit /
GS40rajnighu:3989: cīḍā kaṭūṣṇā kāsaghnī kaphajid dīpanī parā /
GS40rajnighu:3997: saralas tu pūtikāṣṭhaṃ tumbī pītadrur utthito dīpataruḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3998: sa snigdhadārusaṃjñaḥ snigdho mārīcapatrako navadhā // Rajni_12.37
GS40rajnighu:4001: jñeyaṃ kuṅkumam agnisekharam asṛk kāśmīrajaṃ pītakaṃ kāśmīraṃ rudhiraṃ varaṃ ca piśunaṃ raktaṃ śaṭhaṃ śoṇitam /
GS40rajnighu:4002: vāhlīkaṃ ghusṛṇaṃ vareṇyam aruṇaṃ kāleyakaṃ jāguḍaṃ kāntaṃ vahniśikhaṃ ca kesaravaraṃ gauraṃ karākṣīritam // Rajni_12.39
GS40rajnighu:4005: tṛṇakuṅkumaṃ tṛṇāsraṃ gandhitṛṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ ca tṛṇapuṣpam /
GS40rajnighu:4006: gandhādhikaṃ tṛṇotthaṃ tṛṇagauraṃ lohitaṃ ca navasaṃjñam // Rajni_12.41
GS40rajnighu:4010: gaurī govandanī vṛttā kārambhā kaṅgu kaṅgunī // Rajni_12.43
GS40rajnighu:4012: śubhā pītā ca maṅgalyā śreyasī cāṅkabhūmitā // Rajni_12.44
GS40rajnighu:4016: vedhamukhyā ca mārjārī subhagā bahugandhadā // Rajni_12.46
GS40rajnighu:4022: kapilā piṅgalā kṛṣṇā kastūrī trividhā kramāt /
GS40rajnighu:4023: nepāle 'pi ca kāśmīre kāmarūpe ca jāyate // Rajni_12.49
GS40rajnighu:4024: sāpy ekā kharikā tataś ca tilakā jñeyā kulitthāparā piṇḍānyāpi ca nāyiketi ca parā yā pañcabhedābhidhā /
GS40rajnighu:4025: sā śuddhā mṛganābhitaḥ kramavaśād eṣā kṣitīśocitā pakṣatyādidinatrayeṣu janitā kastūrikā stūyate // Rajni_12.50
GS40rajnighu:4026: cūrṇākṛtis tu kharikā tilakā tilābhā kaulatthabījasadṛśī ca kulitthakā ca /
GS40rajnighu:4027: sthūlā tataḥ kiyad iyaṃ kila piṇḍikākhyā tasyāś ca kiṃcid adhikā yadi nāyikā sā // Rajni_12.51
GS40rajnighu:4028: svāde tiktā piñjarā ketakīnāṃ gandhaṃ dhatte lāghavaṃ tolane ca /
GS40rajnighu:4029: yāpsu nyastā naiva vaivarṇyam īyāt kastūrī sā rājabhogyāpraśastā // Rajni_12.52
GS40rajnighu:4030: yā gandhaṃ ketakīnām apaharati madaṃ sindhurāṇāṃ ca varṇe svāde tiktā kaṭur vā laghur atha tulitā marditā cikkaṇā syāt /
GS40rajnighu:4031: dāhaṃ yā naiti vahnau śimiśimiti ciraṃ carmagandhā hutāśe sā kastūrī praśastā varamṛgatanujā rājate rājabhogyā // Rajni_12.53
GS40rajnighu:4032: bāle jarati ca hariṇe kṣīṇe rogiṇi ca mandagandhayutā /
GS40rajnighu:4033: kāmāture ca taruṇe kastūrī bahulaparimalā bhavati // Rajni_12.54
GS40rajnighu:4034: yā snigdhā dhūmagandhā vahati vinihitā pītatāṃ pāthaso 'ntar niḥśeṣaṃ yā niviṣṭā bhavati hutavahe bhasmasād eva sadyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4035: yā ca nyastā tulāyāṃ kalayati gurutāṃ marditā rūkṣatāṃ ca jñeyā kastūrikeyaṃ khalu kṛtamatibhiḥ kṛtrimā naiva sevyā // Rajni_12.55
GS40rajnighu:4036: śuddho vā malino 'stu vā mṛgamadaḥ kiṃ jātam etāvatā ko 'py asyānavadhiś camatkṛtinidhiḥ saurabhyam eko guṇaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4037: yenāsau smaramaṇḍanaikavasatir bhāle kapole gale dormūle kucamaṇḍale ca kurute saṅgaṃ kuraṅgīdṛśām // Rajni_12.56
GS40rajnighu:4038: gorocanā ruciḥ śobhā rucirā śobhanā śubhā /
GS40rajnighu:4039: gaurī ca rocanā piṅgā maṅgalyā piṅgalā śivā // Rajni_12.57
GS40rajnighu:4040: pītā ca gautamī gavyā vandanīyā ca kāñcanī /
GS40rajnighu:4041: medhyā manoramā śyāmā rāmā bhūmikarāhvayā // Rajni_12.58
GS40rajnighu:4042: gorocanā ca śiśirā viṣadoṣahantrī rucyā ca pācanakarī krimikuṣṭhahantrī /
GS40rajnighu:4043: bhūtagrahopaśamanaṃ kurute ca pathyā śṛṅgāramaṅgalakarī janamohinī ca // Rajni_12.59
GS40rajnighu:4044: karpūro ghanasārakaḥ sitakaraḥ śītaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ śilā śītāṃśur himavālukā himakaraḥ śītaprabhaḥ śāmbhavaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4046: potāso bhīmasenas tadanu sitakaraḥ śaṃkarāvāsasaṃjñaḥ prāṃśuḥ piñjo 'bdasāras tadanu himayutā vālukā jūṭikā ca /
GS40rajnighu:4047: paścād asyās tuṣāras tadupari sahimaḥ śītalaḥ pakvikānyā karpūrasyeti bhedā guṇarasamahasāṃ vaidyadṛśyena dṛśyāḥ // Rajni_12.61
GS40rajnighu:4049: cirastho dāhadoṣaghnaḥ sa dhautaḥ śubhakṛt paraḥ // Rajni_12.62
GS40rajnighu:4050: śiro madhyaṃ talaṃ ceti karpūras trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4051: śiraḥ stambhāgrasaṃjātaṃ madhyaṃ parṇatale talam // Rajni_12.63
GS40rajnighu:4053: sāmānyapulakaṃ svacchaṃ tale cūrṇaṃ tu gaurakam // Rajni_12.64
GS40rajnighu:4055: svaccham īṣat haridrābhaṃ śubhraṃ tan madhyamaṃ smṛtam sudṛḍhaṃ śubhrarūkṣaṃ ca pulakaṃ bāhyajaṃ vadet // Rajni_12.65
GS40rajnighu:4056: svacchaṃ bhṛṅgārapattraṃ laghutaraviśadaṃ tolane tiktakaṃ cet svāde śaityaṃ suhṛdyaṃ bahalaparimalāmodasaurabhyadāyi /
GS40rajnighu:4057: niḥsnehaṃ dārḍhyapattraṃ śubhataram iti cet rājayogyaṃ praśastaṃ karpūraṃ cānyathā ced bahutaram aśane sphoṭadāyi vraṇāya // Rajni_12.66
GS40rajnighu:4059: meghasāras tuṣāraś ca dvīpakarpūrajaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_12.67
GS40rajnighu:4065: saugandhikaṃ javādi syāt snigdhaṃ coṣṇaṃ sukhāvaham /
GS40rajnighu:4066: vāte hitaṃ ca rājñāṃ ca mohanāhlādakāraṇam // Rajni_12.70
GS40rajnighu:4067: javādi nīlaṃ sasnigdham īṣat pītaṃ sugandhadam /
GS40rajnighu:4068: ātape bahulāmodaṃ rājñāṃ yogyaṃ na cānyathā // Rajni_12.71
GS40rajnighu:4069: tūṇīkas tūṇikas tūṇī pītakaḥ kacchapas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4070: nandī kurakaḥ kānto nandīvṛkṣo navāhvayaḥ // Rajni_12.72
GS40rajnighu:4078: majjāsāraṃ jātisāraṃ puṭaṃ ca sumanaḥphalam // Rajni_12.76
GS40rajnighu:4080: vātātisāramehaghnaṃ laghu vṛṣyaṃ ca dīpanam // Rajni_12.77
GS40rajnighu:4083: kaṅkolaṃ kaṭphalaṃ proktaṃ mārīcaṃ rudrasaṃmitam // Rajni_12.78
GS40rajnighu:4089: puṣpakaṃ candanādi syāt jñeyaṃ trayodaśāhvayam // Rajni_12.81
GS40rajnighu:4092: lavaṃgaṃ soṣṇakaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vipāke madhuraṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:4094: svādus tv agarusāraḥ syāt sudhūmyo gandhadhūmajaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4099: kṛṣṇāgaru kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca tiktaṃ lepe ca śītalam /
GS40rajnighu:4100: pāne pittaharaṃ kiṃcit tridoṣaghnam udāhṛtam // Rajni_12.86
GS40rajnighu:4102: anāryakam asāraṃ ca kṛmijagdhaṃ ca kāṣṭhakam // Rajni_12.87
GS40rajnighu:4103: kāṣṭhāgaru kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca lepe rūkṣaṃ kaphāpaham // Rajni_12.88
GS40rajnighu:4104: dāhāgaru dahanāgaru dāhakakāṣṭhaṃ ca vahnikāṣṭhaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4105: dhūpāgaru tailāgaru puraṃ ca puramathanavallabhaṃ caiva // Rajni_12.89
GS40rajnighu:4106: dāhāgaru kaṭukoṣṇaṃ keśānāṃ vardhanaṃ ca varṇyaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4107: apanayati keśadoṣān ātanute saṃtataṃ ca saugandhyam // Rajni_12.90
GS40rajnighu:4110: māṃsī tu jaṭilā peśī kravyādī piśitā miśī /
GS40rajnighu:4111: keśinī ca jaṭā hiṃsrā jaṭāmāṃsī ca māṃsinī // Rajni_12.92
GS40rajnighu:4113: mātā bhūtajaṭā caiva jananī ca jaṭāvatī /
GS40rajnighu:4117: dvitīyā gandhamāṃsī ca keśī bhūtajaṭā smṛtā /
GS40rajnighu:4118: piśācī pūtanā caiva bhūtakeśī ca lomaśā /
GS40rajnighu:4119: jaṭālā laghumāṃsī ca khyātā cāṅkamitāhvayā // Rajni_12.95
GS40rajnighu:4123: sevālī sūkṣmapattrī ca gaurī parvatavāsinī // Rajni_12.97
GS40rajnighu:4127: sihlakaḥ sihlasāraś ca pītasāraḥ kapis tathā // Rajni_12.99
GS40rajnighu:4130: turuṣkaḥ surabhis tiktaḥ kaṭusnigdhaś ca kuṣṭhajit /
GS40rajnighu:4133: jaṭālaḥ kālaniryāsaḥ pūro bhūtaharaḥ śivaḥ // Rajni_12.102
GS40rajnighu:4136: divyas tu mahiṣākṣaś ca nāmāny etāni viṃśatiḥ // Rajni_12.103
GS40rajnighu:4140: kanako vaṃśapotaś ca surasaś ca palaṃkaṣaḥ // Rajni_12.105
GS40rajnighu:4147: umāpriyaś ca bhūtaghno medhyaḥ saurabhyadaḥ sadā // Rajni_12.108
GS40rajnighu:4149: lalanaḥ śālaniryāso deveṣṭaḥ śītalas tathā // Rajni_12.109
GS40rajnighu:4152: kālaḥ kalalajaḥ prokto nāmnā saptadaśāṅkitaḥ // Rajni_12.110
GS40rajnighu:4153: rālas tu śiśiraḥ snigdhaḥ kaṣāyas tiktasaṃgrahaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4156: gopurako bahugandhaḥ pālindo bhīṣaṇaś ca daśasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_12.111
GS40rajnighu:4158: pāne lepe ca śiśiraḥ pradarāmayaśāntikṛt // Rajni_12.112
GS40rajnighu:4160: rāmaṃ vānīrajaṃ vāpyaṃ jñeyaṃ tvagdoṣam utpalam /
GS40rajnighu:4161: kutsaṃ ca pāṭavaṃ caiva padmakaṃ manusaṃjñakam // Rajni_12.113
GS40rajnighu:4167: bhadrā candanagopā tu candanā kṛṣṇavally api // Rajni_12.116
GS40rajnighu:4170: nakhaḥ kararuhaḥ śilpī śuktiḥ śaṅkhaḥ khuraḥ śaphaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4171: valaḥ kośī ca karajo hanur nāgahanus tathā // Rajni_12.118
GS40rajnighu:4174: nakhaḥ syād uṣṇakaṭuko viṣaṃ hanti prayojitaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4177: cakrī cakranakhas tryasraḥ kālo vyāghranakhaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_12.121
GS40rajnighu:4179: vyālāyudho vyālabalo vyālakhaḍgaś ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_12.122
GS40rajnighu:4181: kuṣṭhakaṇḍūvraṇaghnaś ca varṇyaḥ saugandhyadaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_12.123
GS40rajnighu:4182: spṛkkā ca devī piśunā vadhūś ca koṭir manur brāhmaṇikā sugandhā /
GS40rajnighu:4183: samudrakāntā kuṭilā tathā ca mālālikā bhūtalikā ca laghvī // Rajni_12.124
GS40rajnighu:4185: pañcaguptir asṛk proktā nakhapuṣpī ca viṃśatiḥ // Rajni_12.125
GS40rajnighu:4188: sthauṇeyakaṃ barhiśikhaṃ śukacchadaṃ mayūracūḍaṃ śukapucchakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4189: vikīrṇaromāpi ca kīravarṇakaṃ vikarṇasaṃjñaṃ haritaṃ navāhvayam // Rajni_12.127
GS40rajnighu:4193: surabhir bhūrigandhā ca kuṭī gandhakuṭī tathā // Rajni_12.129
GS40rajnighu:4194: murā tiktā kaṭuḥ śītā kaṣāyā kaphapittahṛt /
GS40rajnighu:4197: sthaviraṃ palitaṃ jīrṇaṃ tathā kālānusāryakam // Rajni_12.131
GS40rajnighu:4202: corakaḥ śaṅkitaś caṇḍā duṣpattraḥ kṣemako ripuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4203: capalaḥ kitavo dhūrtaḥ paṭur nīco niśācaraḥ // Rajni_12.134
GS40rajnighu:4209: padmakaṃ pītakaṃ pītaṃ mālayaṃ śītalaṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:4211: padmakāṣṭhaṃ padmavṛkṣaṃ proktaṃ syād dvādaśāhvayam // Rajni_12.137
GS40rajnighu:4215: pauṇḍaryaṃ ca supuṣpaṃ ca sānujaṃ cānujaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_12.139
GS40rajnighu:4218: lāmajjakaṃ sunālaṃ syād amṛṇālaṃ lavaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:4222: māṃsarohiṇy atiruhā vṛttā carmakaṣā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:4223: vikasā māṃsarohī ca jñeyā māṃsaruhā muniḥ // Rajni_12.143
GS40rajnighu:4232: śrīvāsaḥ śrīraso veṣṭo lakṣmīveṣṭas tu veṣṭakaḥ // Rajni_12.147
GS40rajnighu:4234: dhūpāṅgas tilaparṇaś ca saralāṅgo 'pi ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_12.148
GS40rajnighu:4238: mṛṇālam abhayaṃ vīraṃ vīraṇaṃ samagandhikam // Rajni_12.150
GS40rajnighu:4244: nalikā vidrumalatikā kapotabāṇā nalī ca nirmathyā /
GS40rajnighu:4245: suṣirā dhamanī stutyā raktadalā nartakī naṭī rudrāḥ // Rajni_12.153
GS40rajnighu:4246: nalikā tiktakaṭukā tīkṣṇā ca madhurā himā /
GS40rajnighu:4249: vargaṃ vaktrāmbhoruhamodārham adhīyāthainaṃ madhye saṃsad asau dīvyatu vaidyaḥ // Rajni_12.155
GS40rajnighu:4250: ye gandhayanti sakalāni ca bhūtalāni lokāṃś ca ye 'pi sukhayanti ca gandhalubdhān /
GS40rajnighu:4251: teṣām ayaṃ malayajādisugandhināmnāṃ bhūr gandhavarga iti viśrutim eti vargaḥ // Rajni_12.156
GS40rajnighu:4252: yasyoccaiś caritāni śītasurabhīṇy abhyasya satyātmano duścāritrajanā niṣaṅgajanitaṃ
GS40rajnighu:4253: drāg dauḥstham āsthan svakam tasyāyaṃ kṛtinaḥ kṛtau narahareḥ śrīcandanādiḥ sthitiṃ
GS40rajnighu:4258: kāṃsyāyo vartakaṃ kāntaṃ kiṭṭaṃ muṇḍaṃ ca tīkṣṇakam // Rajni_13.1
GS40rajnighu:4260: tuvarī haritālaṃ ca gandhakaṃ ca śilājatu // Rajni_13.2
GS40rajnighu:4263: sphaṭī ca kṣullakaḥ śaṅkhau kapardaḥ śuktikā dvidhā /
GS40rajnighu:4264: khaṭinī dugdhapāṣāṇo maṇiś ca karpūrādyakaḥ // Rajni_13.4
GS40rajnighu:4265: sikatā ca dvikaṅguṣṭhaṃ vimalā ca dvidhā matā /
GS40rajnighu:4267: atha ratnaṃ navaṃ vakṣye padmarāgādikaṃ kramāt // Rajni_13.5
GS40rajnighu:4269: vajraṃ ca nīlaṃ ca nava krameṇa gomedavaiḍūryayutāni tāni // Rajni_13.6
GS40rajnighu:4271: rājāvartaḥ perojaṃ syād ubhau bāṇāś ca saṃkhyayā // Rajni_13.7
GS40rajnighu:4278: svarṇaṃ snigdhakaṣāyatiktamadhuraṃ doṣatrayadhvaṃsanaṃ śītaṃ svādu rasāyanaṃ ca rucikṛc cakṣuṣyam āyuṣpradam /
GS40rajnighu:4279: prajñāvīryabalasmṛtisvarakaraṃ kāntiṃ vidhatte tanoḥ saṃdhatte duritakṣayaṃ śriyam idaṃ dhatte nṝṇāṃ dhāraṇāt // Rajni_13.11
GS40rajnighu:4280: dāhe ca raktam atha yac ca sitaṃ chidāyāṃ kāśmīrakānti ca vibhāti nikāṣapaṭṭe /
GS40rajnighu:4281: snigdhaṃ ca gauravam upaiti ca yat tulāyāṃ jātyā tad eva kanakaṃ mṛdu raktapītam // Rajni_13.12
GS40rajnighu:4282: tac caikaṃ rasavedhajaṃ tad aparaṃ jātaṃ svayaṃ bhūmijaṃ kiṃcānyad bahulohasaṃkarabhavaṃ ceti tridhā kāñcanam /
GS40rajnighu:4283: tatrādyaṃ kila pītaraktam aparaṃ raktaṃ tato 'nyat tathā mairālaṃ tad atikrameṇa tad idaṃ syāt pūrvapūrvottamam // Rajni_13.13
GS40rajnighu:4285: śvetakaṃ tu mahāśubhraṃ rajataṃ taptarūpakam // Rajni_13.14
GS40rajnighu:4287: kupyaṃ dhautaṃ tathā saudhaṃ candrahāsaṃ munīndukam // Rajni_13.15
GS40rajnighu:4288: raupyaṃ snigdhaṃ kaṣāyāmlaṃ vipāke madhuraṃ saram /
GS40rajnighu:4290: dāhacchedanikāṣeṣu sitaṃ snigdhaṃ ca yad guru /
GS40rajnighu:4291: sugharṣe 'pi ca varṇāḍhyam uttamaṃ tad udīritam // Rajni_13.17
GS40rajnighu:4294: raktaṃ nepālakaṃ caiva raktadhātuḥ karendudhā // Rajni_13.18
GS40rajnighu:4295: tāmraṃ supakvaṃ madhuraṃ kaṣāyaṃ tiktaṃ vipāke kaṭu śītalaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4299: trapu trapusamāṇḍūkaṃ vaṅgaṃ ca madhuraṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:4300: kurūpyaṃ piccaṭaṃ raṅgaṃ pūtigandhaṃ daśāhvayam // Rajni_13.21
GS40rajnighu:4301: trapusaṃ kaṭutiktahimaṃ kaṣāyalavaṇaṃ saraṃ ca mehaghnam /
GS40rajnighu:4302: krimidāhapāṇḍuśamanaṃ kāntikaraṃ tad rasāyanaṃ caiva // Rajni_13.22
GS40rajnighu:4303: śvetaṃ laghu mṛdu svacchaṃ snigdham uṣṇāpahaṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:4304: sūtapattrakaraṃ kāntaṃ trapu śreṣṭham udāhṛtam // Rajni_13.23
GS40rajnighu:4305: sīsakaṃ tu jaḍaṃ sīsaṃ yavaneṣṭaṃ bhujaṃgamam /
GS40rajnighu:4308: sirāvṛttaṃ ca vaṅgaṃ syāc cīnapiṣṭaṃ ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_13.25
GS40rajnighu:4310: uṣṇaṃ ca kaphavātaghnam arśoghnaṃ guru lekhanam // Rajni_13.26
GS40rajnighu:4311: svarṇe nīlaṃ mṛdu snigdhaṃ nirmalaṃ ca sugauratvam /
GS40rajnighu:4312: raupyasaṃśodhanaṃ kṣipraṃ sīsakaṃ ca tad uttamam // Rajni_13.27
GS40rajnighu:4313: rītiḥ kṣudrasuvarṇaṃ siṃhalakaṃ piṅgalaṃ ca pittalakam /
GS40rajnighu:4314: lauhitakam ārakuṭṭaṃ piṅgalalohaṃ ca pītakaṃ navadhā // Rajni_13.28
GS40rajnighu:4316: brāhmaṇī brahmarītiś ca kapilā piṅgalāpi ca // Rajni_13.29
GS40rajnighu:4319: śuddhā snigdhā mṛduḥ śītā suraṅgā sūtrapattriṇī /
GS40rajnighu:4320: hemopamā śubhā svacchā janyā rītiḥ prakīrtitā // Rajni_13.31
GS40rajnighu:4322: dīptaṃ lohaṃ ghorapuṣpaṃ dīptakaṃ sumanāhvayam // Rajni_13.32
GS40rajnighu:4323: kāṃsyaṃ tu tiktam uṣṇaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ vātakaphavikāraghnam /
GS40rajnighu:4324: rūkṣaṃ kaṣāyarucyaṃ laghu dīpanapācanaṃ pathyam // Rajni_13.33
GS40rajnighu:4325: śvetaṃ dīptaṃ mṛdu jyotiḥ śabdāḍhyaṃ snigdhanirmalam /
GS40rajnighu:4328: nīlikā nīlalohaṃ ca lohajaṃ vaṭṭalohakam // Rajni_13.35
GS40rajnighu:4329: idaṃ lohaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca tiktaṃ ca śiśiraṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4332: kāntāyasaṃ kṛṣṇalohaṃ mahālohaṃ ca saptadhā // Rajni_13.37
GS40rajnighu:4333: syād bhrāmakaṃ tadanu cumbakaromakākhyaṃ syāc chedakākhyam iti tac ca caturvidhaṃ syāt /
GS40rajnighu:4337: na sūtena vinā kāntaṃ na kāntena vinā rasaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4339: lohakiṭṭaṃ tu kiṭṭaṃ syāl lohacūrṇam ayomalam /
GS40rajnighu:4340: lohajaṃ kṛṣṇacūrṇaṃ ca kārṣṇyaṃ lohamalaṃ tathā // Rajni_13.41
GS40rajnighu:4344: aśmajaṃ kṛṣilohaṃ ca āraṃ kṛṣṇāyasaṃ nava // Rajni_13.43
GS40rajnighu:4345: tīkṣṇaṃ śastrāyasaṃ śastraṃ piṇḍaṃ piṇḍāyasaṃ śaṭham /
GS40rajnighu:4346: āyasaṃ niśitaṃ tīvraṃ lohakhaḍgaṃ ca muṇḍajam /
GS40rajnighu:4350: svarṇaṃ samyagaśodhitaṃ śramakaraṃ svedāvahaṃ duḥsahaṃ raupyaṃ jāṭharajāḍyamāndyajananaṃ tāmraṃ vamibhrāntidam /
GS40rajnighu:4351: nāgaṃ ca trapu cāṅgadoṣadam ayo gulmādidoṣapradaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śūlakaraṃ ca kāntam uditaṃ kārṣṇyāmayasphoṭadam // Rajni_13.46
GS40rajnighu:4353: kāṃsyāyasaṃ kledakatāpakārakaṃ rītyau ca sammohanaśoṣadāyike // Rajni_13.47
GS40rajnighu:4354: manaḥśilā syāt kunaṭī manojñā śilā manohvāpi ca nāgajihvā /
GS40rajnighu:4355: nepālikā syān manasaś ca guptā kalyāṇikā rogaśilā daśāhvā // Rajni_13.48
GS40rajnighu:4358: sindūraṃ nāgareṇuḥ syād raktaṃ sīmantakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4359: nāgajaṃ nāgagarbhaṃ ca śoṇaṃ vīrarajaḥ smṛtam // Rajni_13.50
GS40rajnighu:4361: saubhāgyam aruṇaṃ caiva maṅgalyaṃ manusaṃmitam // Rajni_13.51
GS40rajnighu:4364: suraṅgo 'gnisahaḥ sūkṣmaḥ snigdhaḥ svaccho gurur mṛduḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4367: kṣitijaḥ kṣitijantuś ca bhūmijo raktatuṇḍakaḥ // Rajni_13.54
GS40rajnighu:4369: rasasya jāraṇe tūktaṃ tat sattvaṃ tu rasāyanam // Rajni_13.55
GS40rajnighu:4370: hiṅgulaṃ barbaraṃ raktaṃ suraṅgaṃ sugaraṃ smṛtam /
GS40rajnighu:4371: rañjanaṃ daradaṃ mlecchaṃ citrāṅgaṃ cūrṇapāradam // Rajni_13.56
GS40rajnighu:4372: anyac ca mārakaṃ caiva maṇirāgaṃ rasodbhavam /
GS40rajnighu:4377: dhātuḥ suraṅgadhātuś ca girijaṃ girimṛdbhavam // Rajni_13.59
GS40rajnighu:4379: saṃdhyābhraṃ babhrudhātuś ca śilādhātuḥ ṣaḍāhvayam // Rajni_13.60
GS40rajnighu:4382: tuvarī mṛc ca saurāṣṭrī mṛtsnā saṅgā surāṣṭrajā /
GS40rajnighu:4384: stutyā kāṅkṣī sujātā ca jñeyā caiva caturdaśa // Rajni_13.62
GS40rajnighu:4387: haritālaṃ godantaṃ pītaṃ naṭamaṇḍanaṃ ca gauraṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4388: citrāṅgaṃ piñjarakaṃ bhaved ālaṃ tālakaṃ ca tālaṃ ca // Rajni_13.64
GS40rajnighu:4389: kanakarasaṃ kāñcanakaṃ biḍālakaṃ caiva citragandhaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4390: piṅgaṃ ca piṅgasāraṃ gaurīlalitaṃ ca saptadaśasaṃjñam // Rajni_13.65
GS40rajnighu:4394: pūtigandho 'tigandhaś ca vaṭaḥ saugandhikas tathā // Rajni_13.67
GS40rajnighu:4395: sugandho divyagandhaś ca gandhaś ca rasagandhakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4396: kuṣṭhāriḥ krūragandhaś ca kīṭaghnaḥ śarabhūmitaḥ // Rajni_13.68
GS40rajnighu:4399: śveto raktaś ca pītaś ca nīlaś ceti caturvidhaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4400: gandhako varṇato jñeyo bhinno bhinnaguṇāśrayaḥ // Rajni_13.70
GS40rajnighu:4403: śilājatu syād aśmotthaṃ śailaṃ girijam aśmajam /
GS40rajnighu:4405: śilājatu bhavet tiktaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca rasāyanam /
GS40rajnighu:4409: kṣaudreyaṃ pītarāgaṃ ca snigdhaṃ mākṣikajaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4411: madhūṣitaṃ ca samproktaṃ madhūtthaṃ conaviṃśati // Rajni_13.75
GS40rajnighu:4413: kaṭu snigdhaṃ ca lepena sphuṭitāṅgaviropaṇam // Rajni_13.76
GS40rajnighu:4415: śodhanaṃ pāṃśukāsīsaṃ śubhraṃ saptāhvayaṃ matam // Rajni_13.77
GS40rajnighu:4416: kāsīsaṃ tu kaṣāyaṃ syāt śiśiraṃ viṣakuṣṭhajit /
GS40rajnighu:4419: hrasvaṃ netrauṣadhaṃ yojyaṃ viśadaṃ nīlamṛttikā // Rajni_13.79
GS40rajnighu:4431: dehe hemādikaṃ śastaṃ rogahṛd balapuṣṭidam // Rajni_13.85
GS40rajnighu:4432: añjanaṃ yāmunaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ nādeyaṃ mecakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4433: srotojaṃ dṛkpradaṃ nīlaṃ sauvīraṃ ca suvīrajam // Rajni_13.86
GS40rajnighu:4435: kapotakaṃ ca kāpotaṃ samproktaṃ śarabhūmitam // Rajni_13.87
GS40rajnighu:4436: śītaṃ nīlāñjanaṃ proktaṃ kaṭu tiktaṃ kaṣāyakam /
GS40rajnighu:4437: cakṣuṣyaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ viṣaghnaṃ ca rasāyanam // Rajni_13.88
GS40rajnighu:4440: kulatthikā tu cakṣuṣyā kaṣāyā kaṭukā himā /
GS40rajnighu:4443: rītikaṃ rītikusumaṃ rītipuṣpaṃ ca pauṣpakam // Rajni_13.91
GS40rajnighu:4449: rasanābhaṃ cāgnisāraṃ dvādaśāhvaṃ ca kīrtitam // Rajni_13.94
GS40rajnighu:4450: rītyāṃ tu dhmāyamānāyāṃ tatkiṭṭaṃ tu rasāñjanam /
GS40rajnighu:4452: srotoñjanaṃ vāribhavaṃ tathānyaṃ srotodbhavaṃ srotanadībhavaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4453: sauvīrasāraṃ ca kapotasāraṃ valmīkaśīrṣaṃ munisaṃmitāhvam // Rajni_13.96
GS40rajnighu:4455: rasāñjanaṃ rase yogyaṃ stanyavṛddhikaraṃ param // Rajni_13.97
GS40rajnighu:4457: ghṛṣṭe ca gairikāvarṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ srotoñjanaṃ ca tat // Rajni_13.98
GS40rajnighu:4462: tutthaṃ nīlāśmajaṃ nīlaṃ haritāśmaṃ ca tutthakam /
GS40rajnighu:4469: kharparī kaṭukā tiktā cakṣuṣyā ca rasāyanī /
GS40rajnighu:4473: sūtarāṭ capalo jaitraḥ śivabījaṃ śivas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4474: amṛtaṃ ca rasendraḥ syāllokeśo dhūrtaraḥ prabhuḥ // Rajni_13.106
GS40rajnighu:4484: pāraṃ dadāti yasmāttasmādayameva pāradaḥ kathitaḥ // Rajni_13.111
GS40rajnighu:4486: bahupattraṃ khamanantaṃ gaurījaṃ gaurijeyamiti ravayaḥ // Rajni_13.112
GS40rajnighu:4487: śvetaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ nīlamabhraṃ cāturvidhyaṃ yāti bhinnakriyārham /
GS40rajnighu:4488: śvetaṃ tāre kāñcane pītarakte nīlaṃ vyādhāv agryam agryaṃ guṇāḍhyam // Rajni_13.113
GS40rajnighu:4489: nīlābhraṃ darduro nāgaḥ pināko vajra ityapi /
GS40rajnighu:4490: caturvidhaṃ bhavettasya parīkṣā kathyate kramāt // Rajni_13.114
GS40rajnighu:4491: yadvahnau nihitaṃ tanoti nitarāṃ bhekāravaṃ darduro nāgaḥ phūtkurute dhanuḥsvanamupādatte pinākaḥ kila /
GS40rajnighu:4492: vajraṃ naiva vikārameti tadimānyāsevamānaḥ kramāt gulmī ca vraṇavāṃś ca kutsitagadī nīruk ca saṃjāyate // Rajni_13.115
GS40rajnighu:4495: sphaṭī ca sphaṭikī proktā śvetā śubhrā ca raṅgadā /
GS40rajnighu:4497: sphaṭī ca kaṭukā snigdhā kaṣāyā pradarāpahā /
GS40rajnighu:4500: kṣullakaḥ kaṭukas tiktaḥ śūlahārī ca dīpanaḥ // Rajni_13.119
GS40rajnighu:4501: śaṅkho hy arṇobhavaḥ kambur jalajaḥ pāvanadhvaniḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4504: evaṃ ṣoḍaśadhā jñeyo dhavalo maṅgalapradaḥ // Rajni_13.121
GS40rajnighu:4510: carācaraś caro varyo bālakrīḍaranakaśca saḥ // Rajni_13.124
GS40rajnighu:4514: muktāsphoṭas tautikaṃ tu mauktikaprasavā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:4517: śūlapraśamanī rucyā madhurā dīpanī parā // Rajni_13.127
GS40rajnighu:4527: vajrābho dīptikaḥ saudho dugdhī kṣīrayavo'pi ca // Rajni_13.132
GS40rajnighu:4537: recakaṃ pulakaṃ caiva śodhakaṃ kālapālakam // Rajni_13.137
GS40rajnighu:4538: kaṅkuṣṭhaṃ ca dvidhā proktaṃ tārahemābhrakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4541: bāṇasaṃkhyābhidhaṃ proktaṃ tārahema dvidhā matam // Rajni_13.139
GS40rajnighu:4543: rasavīryādike tulyaṃ vedhe syād bhinnavīryakam // Rajni_13.140
GS40rajnighu:4549: śrīr vyavahāryaṃ draviṇaṃ dhanamartho rāḥ svāpateyaṃ ca // Rajni_13.143
GS40rajnighu:4558: snigdhaṃ gurugātrayutaṃ dīptaṃ svacchaṃ suraṅgaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4561: rāgavikalaṃ virūpaṃ laghu māṇikyaṃ na dhārayeddhīmān // Rajni_13.149
GS40rajnighu:4562: tadraktaṃ yadi padmarāgamatha tatpītātiraktaṃ dvidhā jānīyāt kuruvindakaṃ yadaruṇaṃ syādeṣu saugandhikam /
GS40rajnighu:4563: tannīlaṃ yadi nīlagandhikamiti jñeyaṃ caturdhā budhair māṇikyaṃ kaṣagharṣaṇe 'pyavikalaṃ rāgeṇa jātyaṃ jaguḥ // Rajni_13.150
GS40rajnighu:4564: muktā saumyā mauktikaṃ mauktikeyaṃ tāraṃ tārā bhautikaṃ tārakā ca /
GS40rajnighu:4565: ambhaḥsāraṃ śītalaṃ nīrajaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ syād indraratnaṃ valakṣam // Rajni_13.151
GS40rajnighu:4566: muktāphalaṃ binduphalaṃ ca muktikā śaukteyakaṃ śuklamaṇiḥ śaśipriyam /
GS40rajnighu:4567: svacchaṃ himaṃ haimavataṃ sudhāṃśubhaṃ sudhāṃśuratnaṃ śaranetrasaṃmitam // Rajni_13.152
GS40rajnighu:4568: mauktikaṃ ca madhuraṃ suśītalaṃ dṛṣṭirogaśamanaṃ viṣāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:4570: nakṣatrābhaṃ vṛttamatyantamuktaṃ snigdhaṃ sthūlaṃ nirmalaṃ nirvraṇaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4571: nyastaṃ dhatte gauravaṃ yattulāyāṃ tan nirmūlyaṃ mauktikaṃ saukhyadāyi // Rajni_13.154
GS40rajnighu:4572: yadvicchāyaṃ mauktikaṃ vyaṅgakāyaṃ śuktisparśaṃ raktatāṃ cāpi dhatte /
GS40rajnighu:4573: matsyākṣyābhaṃ rūkṣamuttānanimnaṃ naitaddhāryaṃ dhīmatā doṣadāyi // Rajni_13.155
GS40rajnighu:4574: mātaṃgoragamīnapotriśirasas tvaksāraśaṅkhāmbubhṛt śuktīnāmudarācca mauktikamaṇiḥ spaṣṭaṃ bhavatyaṣṭadhā /
GS40rajnighu:4575: chāyāḥ pāṭalanīlapītadhavalās tatrāpi sāmānyataḥ saptānāṃ bahuśo na labdhir itaracchaukteyakaṃ tūlvaṇam // Rajni_13.156
GS40rajnighu:4577: marditamapi śālituṣairyadavikṛtaṃ tattu mauktikaṃ jātyam // Rajni_13.157
GS40rajnighu:4579: bhaumaratnaṃ ca raktāṅgo raktāṅkuro latāmaṇiḥ // Rajni_13.158
GS40rajnighu:4583: samaṃ guru sirāhīnaṃ pravālaṃ dhārayet śubham // Rajni_13.160
GS40rajnighu:4585: rūkṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ laghu śvetaṃ pravālam aśubhaṃ tyajet // Rajni_13.161
GS40rajnighu:4587: yā na tyajati nijaruciṃ nikaṣe ghṛṣṭāpi sā smṛtā jātyā // Rajni_13.162
GS40rajnighu:4591: marakataṃ viṣaghnaṃ ca śītalaṃ madhuraṃ rase /
GS40rajnighu:4593: svacchaṃ guru succhāyaṃ snigdhaṃ gātre ca mārdavasametam /
GS40rajnighu:4594: avyaṅgaṃ bahuraṅgaṃ śṛṅgāri marakataṃ śubhaṃ bibhṛyāt // Rajni_13.165
GS40rajnighu:4597: yat śaivālaśikhaṇḍiśādvalaharitkācaiśca cāṣacchadaiḥ khadyotena ca bālakīravapuṣā śairīṣapuṣpeṇa ca /
GS40rajnighu:4598: chāyābhiḥ samatāṃ dadhāti tadidaṃ nirdiṣṭamaṣṭātmakaṃ jātyaṃ yattapanātapaiśca parito gārutmataṃ rañjayet // Rajni_13.167
GS40rajnighu:4602: āyuḥ śriyaṃ ca prajñāṃ ca dhāraṇāt kurute nṛṇām // Rajni_13.169
GS40rajnighu:4604: yaḥ puṣparāgam amalaṃ kalayedamuṣya puṣṇāti kīrtim atiśauryasukhāyur arthān // Rajni_13.170
GS40rajnighu:4608: tena khalu puṣparāgo jātyatayāyaṃ parīkṣakair uktaḥ // Rajni_13.172
GS40rajnighu:4614: bhasmāṅgaṃ kākapādaṃ ca rekhākrāntaṃ tu vartulam /
GS40rajnighu:4616: nīlābhaṃ cipiṭaṃ rūkṣaṃ tadvajraṃ doṣadaṃ tyajet // Rajni_13.175
GS40rajnighu:4617: śvetālohitapītakamecakatayā chāyāś catasraḥ kramāt viprāditvam ihāsya yat sumanasaḥ śaṃsanti satyaṃ tataḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4618: sphītāṃ kīrtim anuttamāṃ śriyamidaṃ dhatte yathāsvaṃ dhṛtaṃ martyānām ayathāyathaṃ tu kuliśaṃ pathyaṃ hi nānyattataḥ // Rajni_13.176
GS40rajnighu:4619: yatpāṣāṇatale nikāṣanikare nodghṛṣyate niṣṭhurair yaccolūkhalalohamudgaraghanair lekhāṃ na yātyāhatam /
GS40rajnighu:4620: yaccānyannijalīlayaiva dalayedvajreṇa vā bhidyate tajjātyaṃ kuliśaṃ vadanti kuśalāḥ ślāghyaṃ mahārghyaṃ ca tat // Rajni_13.177
GS40rajnighu:4621: vipraḥ so 'pi rasāyaneṣu balavānaṣṭāṅgasiddhiprado rājanyastu nṛṇāṃ valīpalitajit mṛtyuṃ jayed añjasā /
GS40rajnighu:4622: dravyākarṣaṇasiddhidastu sutarāṃ vaiśvo'tha śūdro bhavet sarvavyādhiharastadeṣa kathito vajrasya varṇyo guṇaḥ // Rajni_13.178
GS40rajnighu:4625: masāram indranīlaṃ syād gallarkaḥ padmarāgajaḥ // Rajni_13.179
GS40rajnighu:4627: yo dadhāti śarīre syāt saurirmaṅgalado bhavet // Rajni_13.180
GS40rajnighu:4631: rūkṣaḥ sphuṭitagartaś ca varjyo nīlaḥ sadoṣakaḥ // Rajni_13.182
GS40rajnighu:4635: yaḥ pātraṃ rañjayatyāśu sa jātyo nīla ucyate // Rajni_13.184
GS40rajnighu:4640: gomūtrābhaṃ yanmṛdu snigdhamugdhaṃ śuddhacchāyaṃ gauravaṃ yacca dhatte /
GS40rajnighu:4641: hemāraktaṃ śrīmatāṃ yogyametat gomedākhyaṃ ratnam ākhyānti santaḥ // Rajni_13.187
GS40rajnighu:4642: pātre yatra nyaste payaḥ prayātyeva gojalojjvalatām /
GS40rajnighu:4643: gharṣe'pyahīnakāntiṃ gomedaṃ taṃ budhā vidur jātyam // Rajni_13.188
GS40rajnighu:4645: vicchāyaṃ śarkarāgāraṃ gomedaṃ vibudhas tyajet // Rajni_13.189
GS40rajnighu:4648: vaiḍūryaratnaṃ samproktaṃ jñeyaṃ vidūrajaṃ tathā // Rajni_13.190
GS40rajnighu:4651: ekaṃ veṇupalāśapeśalarucā māyūrakaṇṭhatviṣā mārjārekṣaṇapiṅgalacchavijuṣā jñeyaṃ tridhā chāyayā /
GS40rajnighu:4652: yadgātre gurutāṃ dadhāti nitarāṃ snigdhaṃ tu doṣojjhitaṃ vaiḍūryaṃ vimalaṃ vadanti sudhiyaḥ svacchaṃ ca tacchobhanam // Rajni_13.192
GS40rajnighu:4653: vicchāyaṃ mṛcchilāgarbhe laghu rūkṣaṃ ca sakṣatam /
GS40rajnighu:4654: satrāsaṃ paruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vaiḍūryaṃ dūratas tyajet // Rajni_13.193
GS40rajnighu:4656: sphuṭaṃ pradarśayed etad vaiḍūryaṃ jātyamucyate // Rajni_13.194
GS40rajnighu:4657: māṇikyaṃ padmabandhor ativimalatamaṃ mauktikaṃ śītabhānor māheyasya pravālaṃ marakatamatulaṃ kalpayedindusūnoḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4658: devejye puṣparāgaṃ kuliśamapi kaver nīlam arkātmajasya svarbhānoścāpi gomedakam atha vidurodbhāvitaṃ kiṃtu ketoḥ // Rajni_13.195
GS40rajnighu:4660: yo dadyādbibhṛyād vāpi tasmin sānugrahā grahāḥ // Rajni_13.196
GS40rajnighu:4662: lāghavamatha komalatā sādhāraṇadoṣa eva vijñeyaḥ // Rajni_13.197
GS40rajnighu:4667: sphaṭikaḥ sitopalaḥ syād amalamaṇir nirmalopalaḥ svacchaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4670: tasyākṣamālā japatāṃ datte koṭiguṇaṃ phalam // Rajni_13.201
GS40rajnighu:4671: yad gaṅgātoyabinduchavivimalatamaṃ nistuṣaṃ netrahṛdyaṃ snigdhaṃ śuddhāntarālaṃ madhuram atihimaṃ pittadāhāsrahāri /
GS40rajnighu:4672: pāṣāṇair yan nighṛṣṭaṃ sphuṭitam api nijāṃ svacchatāṃ naiva jahyāt tajjātyaṃ jātvalabhyaṃ śubham upacinute śaivaratnaṃ vicitram // Rajni_13.202
GS40rajnighu:4673: atha bhavati sūryakāntas tapanamaṇis tapanaśca ravikāntaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4677: śuddhaḥ snigdho nirvraṇo nistuṣo'ntaryo nirmṛṣṭo vyomni nairmalyam eti /
GS40rajnighu:4678: yaḥ sūryāṃśusparśaniṣṭhyūtavahnir jātyaḥ so 'yaṃ jāyate sūryakāntaḥ // Rajni_13.205
GS40rajnighu:4680: gonāsaḥ kṣudrakuliśaṃ cūrṇavajraṃ ca gonasaḥ // Rajni_13.206
GS40rajnighu:4684: yadvikrāntiṃ dhatte tadvaikrāntaṃ budhairidaṃ kathitam // Rajni_13.208
GS40rajnighu:4689: snigdhaṃ śvetaṃ pītamātrāsametaṃ dhatte citte svacchatāṃ yan munīnām /
GS40rajnighu:4690: yacca srāvaṃ yāti candrāṃśusaṅgāj jātyaṃ ratnaṃ candrakāntākhyametat // Rajni_13.211
GS40rajnighu:4694: saubhāgyaṃ kurute nṝṇāṃ bhūṣaṇeṣu prayojitaḥ // Rajni_13.213
GS40rajnighu:4695: nirgāram asitamasṛṇaṃ nīlaṃ guru nirmalaṃ bahuchāyam /
GS40rajnighu:4696: śikhikaṇṭhasamaṃ saumyaṃ rājāvartaṃ vadanti jātyamaṇim // Rajni_13.214
GS40rajnighu:4697: perojaṃ haritāśmaṃ ca bhasmāṅgaṃ haritaṃ dvidhā /
GS40rajnighu:4698: perojaṃ sukaṣāyaṃ syānmadhuraṃ dīpanaṃ param // Rajni_13.215
GS40rajnighu:4699: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva saṃyogāc ca yathā viṣam /
GS40rajnighu:4700: tatsarvaṃ nāśayet śīghraṃ śūlaṃ bhūtādidoṣajam // Rajni_13.216
GS40rajnighu:4701: siddhāḥ pāradam abhrakaṃ ca vividhān dhātūṃś ca lohāni ca prāhuḥ kiṃca maṇīnapīha sakalān saṃskārataḥ siddhidān /
GS40rajnighu:4702: yat saṃskāravihīnam eṣu hi bhaved yaccānyathā saṃskṛtaṃ tanmartyaṃ viṣavan nihanti tadiha jñeyā budhaiḥ saṃskriyāḥ // Rajni_13.217
GS40rajnighu:4703: yān saṃskṛtān śubhaguṇān atha cānyathā ced doṣāṃś ca yān api diśanti rasādayo 'mī /
GS40rajnighu:4704: yāś ceha santi khalu saṃskṛtayas tadetan nātrābhyadhāyi bahuvistarabhītibhāgbhiḥ // Rajni_13.218
GS40rajnighu:4706: avadhārya vargam imam ādyavaidyakapraguṇaprayogakuśalo bhaved budhaḥ // Rajni_13.219
GS40rajnighu:4707: kurvanti ye nijaguṇena rasādhvagena nṝṇāṃ jarantyapi vapūṃṣi punarnavāni /
GS40rajnighu:4708: teṣāmayaṃ nivasatiḥ kanakādikānāṃ vargaḥ prasidhyati rasāyanavarganāmnā // Rajni_13.220
GS40rajnighu:4709: nityaṃ yasya guṇāḥ kilāntaralasatkalyāṇabhūyas tathā cittākarṣaṇacañcavas tribhuvanaṃ bhūmnā parikurvate /
GS40rajnighu:4710: tenātraiṣa kṛte nṛsiṃhakṛtinā nāmādicūḍāmaṇau saṃsthāmeti mitas trayodaśatayā vargaḥ suvarṇādikaḥ // Rajni_13.221
GS40rajnighu:4714: āpaḥ kavāruṇakabandhajalāni nīrakīlālavārikamalāni viṣārṇasī ca // Rajni_14.1
GS40rajnighu:4717: pānīyaṃ madhuraṃ himaṃ ca rucidaṃ tṛṣṇāviśoṣāpahaṃ mohabhrāntimapākaroti kurute bhuktānnapaktiṃ parām /
GS40rajnighu:4718: nidrālasyanirāsanaṃ viṣaharaṃ śrāntātisaṃtarpaṇaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhībalavīryatuṣṭijananaṃ naṣṭāṅgapuṣṭipradam // Rajni_14.3
GS40rajnighu:4724: cirasthitaṃ laghu svacchaṃ pathyaṃ svādu sukhāvaham // Rajni_14.6
GS40rajnighu:4729: nadī dhunī nirjhariṇī taraṃgiṇī sarasvatī śaivalinī samudragā /
GS40rajnighu:4730: kūlaṃkaṣā kūlavatī ca nimnagā śaivālinī sindhur athāpagāpi ca // Rajni_14.9
GS40rajnighu:4732: srotasvinī sunīrā rodhovakrā ca vāhinī taṭinī // Rajni_14.10
GS40rajnighu:4734: rucyaṃ tṛṣṇāpahaṃ pathyaṃ madhuraṃ ceṣaduṣṇakam // Rajni_14.11
GS40rajnighu:4737: vetrāvatī kṣaudravatī payoṣṇī tāpī vitastā sarayūśca sindhuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4738: mahāśatadrur hy atha gautamī syāt kṛṣṇā ca tuṅgā ca kaverikanyā // Rajni_14.13
GS40rajnighu:4740: anye 'py anūpātmakadeśabhedāḥ kaulābhidhānaiḥ svayam ūhanīyāḥ // Rajni_14.14
GS40rajnighu:4742: parīkṣyeta yathā coktaṃ jñātavyaṃ jalavedibhiḥ // Rajni_14.15
GS40rajnighu:4743: gaṅgā svargasarid varā tripathagā mandākinī jāhnavī puṇyā viṣṇupadī samudrasubhagā bhāgīrathī svarṇadī /
GS40rajnighu:4744: triḥsrotā suradīrghikā suranadī siddhāpagā svardhunī jyeṣṭhā jahnusutā ca bhīṣmajananī śubhrā ca śailendrajā // Rajni_14.16
GS40rajnighu:4745: śītaṃ svādu svaccham atyantarucyaṃ pathyaṃ pākyaṃ pāvanaṃ pāpahāri /
GS40rajnighu:4746: tṛṣṇāmohadhvaṃsanaṃ dīpanaṃ ca prajñāṃ datte vāri bhāgīrathīyam // Rajni_14.17
GS40rajnighu:4747: yamunā tapanatanujā kalindakanyā yamasvasā ca kālindī // Rajni_14.18
GS40rajnighu:4749: vahnidīpanakaraṃ virocanaṃ yāmunaṃ jalam idaṃ balapradam // Rajni_14.19
GS40rajnighu:4750: revā mekalakanyā somasutā narmadā ca vijñeyā // Rajni_14.20
GS40rajnighu:4752: sakalāmayamardanaṃ ca rucyaṃ madhuraṃ mekalakanyakāsamuttham // Rajni_14.21
GS40rajnighu:4753: cāndrabhāgasalilaṃ suśītalaṃ dāhapittaśamanaṃ ca vātadam // Rajni_14.22
GS40rajnighu:4754: sarasvatī plakṣasamudbhavā ca sā vākpradā brahmasatī ca bhāratī /
GS40rajnighu:4755: vedāgraṇīś caiva payoṣṇijātā vāṇī viśālā kuṭilā daśāhvā // Rajni_14.23
GS40rajnighu:4757: rucyaṃ dīpanadaṃ pathyaṃ dehakāntikaraṃ laghu // Rajni_14.24
GS40rajnighu:4759: śatadror vipāśāyujaḥ sindhunadyāḥ suśītaṃ laghu svādu sarvāmayaghnam /
GS40rajnighu:4760: jalaṃ nirmalaṃ dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ ca pradatte balaṃ buddhimedhāyuṣaṃ ca // Rajni_14.26
