GS40rajnighu:4761: śoṇe ghargharake jalaṃ tu rucidaṃ saṃtāpaśoṣāpahaṃ pathyaṃ vahnikaraṃ tathā ca baladaṃ kṣīṇāṅgapuṣṭipradam /
GS40rajnighu:4762: tatrānyā dadhate jalaṃ sumadhuraṃ kāntipradaṃ puṣṭidaṃ vṛṣyaṃ dīpanapācanaṃ balakaraṃ vetrāvatī tāpinī // Rajni_14.27
GS40rajnighu:4768: godāvarī gautamasambhavā sā brahmādrijātāpyatha gautamī ca // Rajni_14.31
GS40rajnighu:4771: kṛṣṇānadī kṛṣṇasamudbhavā syātsā kṛṣṇaveṇāpi ca kṛṣṇagaṅgā // Rajni_14.33
GS40rajnighu:4774: malāpahā bhīmarathī ca ghaṭṭagā yathā ca kṛṣṇājalasāmyadā guṇaiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4775: malāpahāghaṭṭagayos tathāpi pathyaṃ laghu svādutaraṃ sukāntidam // Rajni_14.35
GS40rajnighu:4777: kaṇḍūpittāsradaṃ prāyaḥ sātmye pathyakaraṃ param // Rajni_14.36
GS40rajnighu:4782: sarvā gurvī prāṅmukhī vāhinī yā laghvī paścādvāhinī niścayena /
GS40rajnighu:4783: deśe deśe tadguṇānāṃ viśeṣādeṣā dhatte gauravaṃ lāghavaṃ ca // Rajni_14.39
GS40rajnighu:4784: vindhyāt prācī yāpy avācī pratīcī yā codīcī syānnadī sā krameṇa /
GS40rajnighu:4785: vātāṭopaṃ śleṣmapittārtilopaṃ pittodrekaṃ pathyapākaṃ ca dhatte // Rajni_14.40
GS40rajnighu:4786: himavati malayācale ca vindhye prabhavati sahyagirau ca yā sravantī /
GS40rajnighu:4787: sṛjati kila śirorujādidoṣān apanudate 'pi ca pāriyātrajātā // Rajni_14.41
GS40rajnighu:4788: nadyaḥ prāvṛṣijās tu pīnasakaphaśvāsārtikāsapradāḥ pathyā vātakaphāpahāḥ śaradijā hemantajā buddhidāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4789: saṃtāpaṃ śamayanti śaṃ vidadhate śaiśiryavāsantajās tṛṣṇādāhavamiśramārtiśamadā grīṣme yathā sadguṇāḥ // Rajni_14.42
GS40rajnighu:4794: sādhāraṇaṃ jalaṃ rucyaṃ dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:4796: jātaṃ tāmramṛdas tadeva salilaṃ vātādidoṣapradaṃ deśāj jāḍyakaraṃ ca durjarataraṃ doṣāvahaṃ dhūsaram /
GS40rajnighu:4797: vātaghnaṃ tu śilāśirottham amalaṃ pathyaṃ laghu svādu ca śreṣṭhaṃ śyāmamṛdas tridoṣaśamanaṃ sarvāmayaghnaṃ payaḥ // Rajni_14.46
GS40rajnighu:4798: hradavāri vahnijananaṃ madhuraṃ kaphavātahāri pathyaṃ ca // Rajni_14.47
GS40rajnighu:4799: prasravaṇajalaṃ svacchaṃ laghu madhuraṃ rocanaṃ ca dīpanakṛt // Rajni_14.48
GS40rajnighu:4800: taḍāgasalilaṃ svādu kaṣāyaṃ vātadaṃ kiyat // Rajni_14.49
GS40rajnighu:4801: vāpījalaṃ tu saṃtāpi vātaśleṣmakaraṃ guru // Rajni_14.50
GS40rajnighu:4802: kaphaghnaṃ kūpapānīyaṃ kṣāraṃ pittakaraṃ laghu // Rajni_14.51
GS40rajnighu:4803: audbhidaṃ pittaśamanaṃ salilaṃ laghu ca smṛtam // Rajni_14.52
GS40rajnighu:4805: tadeva baddhamuktaṃ tu viśeṣād doṣadaṃ bhavet // Rajni_14.53
GS40rajnighu:4806: nādeyaṃ navamṛdghaṭeṣu nihitaṃ saṃtaptam arkāṃśubhir yāminyāṃ ca niviṣṭam indrakiraṇair mandānilāndolitam /
GS40rajnighu:4807: elādyaiḥ parivāsitaṃ śramaharaṃ pittoṣṇadāhe viṣe mūrchāraktamadātyayeṣu ca hitaṃ śaṃsanti haṃsodakam // Rajni_14.54
GS40rajnighu:4808: yaḥ pānīyaṃ pibati śiśiraṃ svādu nityaṃ niśīthe pratyūṣe vā pibati yadi vā ghrāṇarandhreṇa dhīraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4809: so 'yaṃ sadyaḥ patagapatinā spardhate netraśaktyā svargācāryaṃ prahasati dhiyā dveṣṭi dasrau ca tanvā // Rajni_14.55
GS40rajnighu:4810: viṇmūtrāruṇanīlikāviṣahataṃ taptaṃ ghanaṃ phenilaṃ dantagrāhyam anārtavaṃ salavaṇaṃ śaivālakaiḥ saṃvṛtam /
GS40rajnighu:4811: jantuvrātavimiśritaṃ gurutaraṃ parṇaughapaṅkāvilaṃ candrārkāṃśutirohitaṃ ca na pibennīraṃ jaḍaṃ doṣalam // Rajni_14.56
GS40rajnighu:4815: jīrṇajvare śaithilyasaṃnipāte jalaṃ praśastaṃ śṛtaśītalaṃ tu // Rajni_14.58
GS40rajnighu:4816: taptaṃ pāthaḥ pādabhāgena hīnaṃ proktaṃ pathyaṃ vātajātāmayaghnam /
GS40rajnighu:4817: ardhāṃśonaṃ nāśayed vātapittaṃ pādaprāyaṃ tattu doṣatrayaghnam // Rajni_14.59
GS40rajnighu:4818: hemante pādahīnaṃ tu pādārdhonaṃ tu śārade /
GS40rajnighu:4821: grīṣme cauḍaṃ tu seveta doṣadaṃ syādato 'nyathā // Rajni_14.61
GS40rajnighu:4822: taptaṃ divā jāḍyam upaiti naktaṃ naktaṃ ca taptaṃ tu divā guru syāt /
GS40rajnighu:4823: divā ca naktaṃ ca nṛbhis tadātvataptaṃ jalaṃ yuktamato grahītum // Rajni_14.62
GS40rajnighu:4824: uṣṇaṃ kvāpi kvāpi śītaṃ kavoṣṇaṃ kvāpi kvāpi kvāthaśītaṃ ca pāthaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4825: itthaṃ nṝṇāṃ pathyametat prayuktaṃ kālāvasthādehasaṃsthānurodhāt // Rajni_14.63
GS40rajnighu:4827: pācayati cānnamanalaṃ puṣṇāti niśīthapītam uṣṇāmbhaḥ // Rajni_14.64
GS40rajnighu:4828: rātrau pītamajīrṇadoṣaśamanaṃ śaṃsanti sāmānyataḥ pītaṃ vāri niśāvasānasamaye sarvāmayadhvaṃsanam /
GS40rajnighu:4829: bhuktvā tūrdhvamidaṃ ca puṣṭijananaṃ prāk ced apuṣṭipradaṃ rucyaṃ jāṭharavahnipāṭavakaraṃ pathyaṃ ca bhuktyantare // Rajni_14.65
GS40rajnighu:4830: atyambupānānna vipacyate 'nnam anambupānācca sa eva doṣaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4831: tasmānnaro vahnivivardhanārthaṃ muhur muhur vāri pibed abhūri // Rajni_14.66
GS40rajnighu:4833: dhāraṃ ca kārakaṃ caiva tauṣāraṃ haimamityapi // Rajni_14.67
GS40rajnighu:4837: tatra gāṅgaṃ guṇāḍhyaṃ syāt adoṣaṃ pācanaṃ param // Rajni_14.69
GS40rajnighu:4843: dadhnopadigdhe nihitaṃ muhūrtād avikriyaṃ gāṅgam athānyathā syāt // Rajni_14.72
GS40rajnighu:4844: gāṅgaṃ jalaṃ svādu suśītalaṃ ca rucipradaṃ pittakaphāpahaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4845: nirdoṣam acchaṃ laghu tacca nityaṃ guṇādhikaṃ vyomni gṛhītam āhuḥ // Rajni_14.73
GS40rajnighu:4850: patitaṃ bhuvi yattoyaṃ gāṅgaṃ sāmudrameva vā /
GS40rajnighu:4851: svasvāśrayavaśād gacched anyad anyad rasādikam // Rajni_14.76
GS40rajnighu:4852: asraṃ ca lavaṇaṃ ca syātpatitaṃ pārthivasthale /
GS40rajnighu:4853: āpye tu madhuraṃ proktaṃ kaṭu tiktaṃ ca taijase // Rajni_14.77
GS40rajnighu:4856: yatra cedāśvine māsi naiva varṣati vāridaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4857: gāṅgatoyavihīne syuḥ kāle tatrādhikā rujaḥ // Rajni_14.79
GS40rajnighu:4861: sitaḥ puṇḍraḥ karaṅkekṣuḥ kṛṣṇo raktaśca te kramāt // Rajni_14.81
GS40rajnighu:4863: asipattro madhutṛṇo vṛṣyo guḍatṛṇo nava // Rajni_14.82
GS40rajnighu:4864: śvetekṣus tu sitekṣuḥ syāt kāṣṭhekṣur vaṃśapattrakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4867: dīpanaḥ pittadāhaghno vipāke koṣṇadaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_14.84
GS40rajnighu:4869: karburo miśravarṇaś ca nepālekṣuś ca saptadhā // Rajni_14.85
GS40rajnighu:4871: dāhaśramaharo rucyo rase saṃtarpaṇaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_14.86
GS40rajnighu:4878: kṛṣṇekṣur ukto madhuraś ca pāke svāduḥ suhṛdyaḥ kaṭuko rasāḍhyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4889: bhuktamadhye gurutarā itīkṣūṇāṃ guṇās trayaḥ // Rajni_14.95
GS40rajnighu:4890: vṛṣyo raktāsrapittaśramaśamanapaṭuḥ śītalaḥ ślesmado 'lpaḥ snigdho hṛdyaś ca rucyo racayati ca mudaṃ sūtraśuddhiṃ vidhatte /
GS40rajnighu:4891: kāntiṃ dehasya datte balamati kurute bṛṃhaṇaṃ tṛptidāyī dantair niṣpīdya kāṇḍaṃ mṛduyatirasito mohanaś cekṣudaṇḍaḥ // Rajni_14.96
GS40rajnighu:4892: pīyūṣopamitaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ syād dantaniṣpīḍitaṃ tadvacced gṛhayantrajaṃ tadaparaṃ ślesmānilaghnaṃ kiyat /
GS40rajnighu:4893: etad vātaharaṃ tu vātajananaṃ jāḍyapratiśvāyadaṃ proktaṃ paryuṣitaṃ kaphānilakaraṃ pānīyam ikṣadbhavam // Rajni_14.97
GS40rajnighu:4895: vṛṣyaṃ vātakaphaghnaṃ ca yāvanālaśarāt rasam // Rajni_14.98
GS40rajnighu:4899: śiśupriyaḥ sitādiḥ syādaruṇo rasajaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_14.100
GS40rajnighu:4900: pittaghnaḥ pavanārtijid rucikaro hṛdyastridoṣāpahaḥ saṃyogena viśeṣato jvaraharaḥ saṃtāpaśāntipradaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4901: viṇmūtrāmayaśodhano'gnijananaḥ pāṇḍupramehāntakaḥ snigdhaḥ svādutaro laghuḥ śramaharaḥ pathyaḥ purāṇo guḍaḥ // Rajni_14.101
GS40rajnighu:4902: syādyāvanālarasapākabhavo guḍo'yaṃ kṣāraḥ kaṭuḥ sumadhuraḥ kaphavātahārī /
GS40rajnighu:4904: śarkaroktā tu mīnāṇḍī śvetā matsyaṇḍikā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:4905: ahicchatrā tu sikatā sitā caiva guḍodbhavā // Rajni_14.103
GS40rajnighu:4908: snigdhā puṇḍrakaśarkarā hitakarī kṣīṇe kṣaye'rocake cakṣuṣyā balavardhinī sumadhurā rūkṣā ca vaṃśekṣujā /
GS40rajnighu:4909: vṛṣyā tṛptibalapradā śramaharā śyāmekṣujā śītalā snigdhā kāntikarī rasālajanitā raktekṣujā pittajit // Rajni_14.105
GS40rajnighu:4924: dāhaṃ nivārayati tāpamapākaroti tṛptiṃ niyacchati nihanti ca mohamūrchām /
GS40rajnighu:4925: śvāsaṃ nivārayati tarpayatīndriyāṇi śītaḥ sadā sumadhuraḥ khalu siddhikhaṇḍaḥ // Rajni_14.113
GS40rajnighu:4926: madhu kṣaudraṃ ca mākṣīkaṃ mākṣikaṃ kusumāsavam /
GS40rajnighu:4927: puṣpāsavaṃ pavitraṃ ca pitryaṃ puṣparasāhvayam // Rajni_14.114
GS40rajnighu:4928: mākṣikaṃ bhrāmaraṃ kṣaudraṃ pauttikaṃ chāttrakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4933: bhramarairjanitaṃ taistu bhrāmaraṃ madhu bhaṇyate // Rajni_14.117
GS40rajnighu:4934: piṅgalā makṣikāḥ sūkṣmāḥ kṣudrā iti hi viśrutāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4935: tābhirutpāditaṃ yattu tat kṣaudraṃ madhu kathyate // Rajni_14.118
GS40rajnighu:4936: annajā makṣikāḥ piṅgāḥ puttikā iti kīrtitāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4937: tajjātaṃ madhu dhīmadbhiḥ pauttikaṃ samudāhṛtam // Rajni_14.119
GS40rajnighu:4939: yatkurvanti tadutpannaṃ madhu chāttrakam īritam // Rajni_14.120
GS40rajnighu:4941: tadudbhūtaṃ yadarghārhaṃ tadārghyaṃ madhu varṇyate // Rajni_14.121
GS40rajnighu:4942: auddālāḥ kapilāḥ kīṭā bhūmer uddalanāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4947: atha vakṣyāmyahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇavīryādikaṃ kramāt // Rajni_14.124
GS40rajnighu:4949: kṣaudraṃ tu kapilābhāsaṃ pauttikaṃ ghṛtasaṃnibham // Rajni_14.125
GS40rajnighu:4953: bhrāmaraṃ picchilaṃ rūkṣaṃ madhuraṃ mukhajāḍyajit // Rajni_14.127
GS40rajnighu:4954: kṣaudraṃ tu śītaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ picchilaṃ pittavātahṛt /
GS40rajnighu:4959: dālaṃ kaṭu kaṣāyāmlaṃ madhuraṃ pittadāyi ca // Rajni_14.130
GS40rajnighu:4960: navaṃ madhu bhavet sthaulyaṃ nātiśleṣmakaraṃ param /
GS40rajnighu:4961: dehasthaulyāpahaṃ grāhi purāṇaṃ madhu lekhanam // Rajni_14.131
GS40rajnighu:4962: pakvaṃ doṣatrayaghnaṃ madhu vividharujājāḍyajihvāmayādidhvaṃsaṃ dhatte ca rucyaṃ balamatidhṛtidaṃ vīryavṛddhiṃ vidhatte /
GS40rajnighu:4963: āmaṃ ced āmagulmāmayapavanarujāpittadāhāsradoṣaṃ hanyād vātaṃ ca śoṣaṃ janayati niyataṃ dhvaṃsayaty antavṛddhim // Rajni_14.132
GS40rajnighu:4965: sādhāraṇyā madhu hitaṃ tattulyā madhuśarkarā // Rajni_14.133
GS40rajnighu:4967: āmaṃ madhu manuṣyāṇāṃ viṣavat tāpadāyakam // Rajni_14.134
GS40rajnighu:4969: kaṇṭakoṭaragataṃ ca mecakaṃ tacca gehajanitaṃ ca doṣakṛt // Rajni_14.135
GS40rajnighu:4970: daṇḍair nihatya yadupāttamapāstadaṃśaṃ tādṛgvidhaṃ madhu rasāyanayogayogyam /
GS40rajnighu:4974: yadguṇaṃ yanmadhu proktaṃ tadguṇā tasya śarkarā /
GS40rajnighu:4975: viśeṣād balavṛṣyaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ kṣīṇadehinām // Rajni_14.138
GS40rajnighu:4976: madyaṃ surā prasannā syānmadirā vāruṇī varā /
GS40rajnighu:4977: mattā kādambarī śītā capalā kāminī priyā // Rajni_14.139
GS40rajnighu:4978: madagandhā ca mādhvīkaṃ madhu saṃdhānam āsavaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4979: parisṛtāmṛtā vīrā medhāvī madanī ca sā // Rajni_14.140
GS40rajnighu:4980: supratibhā manojñā ca vipānā modinī tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4985: syāddhātakīrasaguḍādikṛtā tu gauḍī puṣpadravādimadhusāramayī tu mādhvī /
GS40rajnighu:4986: paiṣṭī punarvividhadhānyavikārajātā khyātā madādhikatayātra ca pūrvapūrvā // Rajni_14.143
GS40rajnighu:4989: saindhī kādambarī caiva dvividhaṃ madyalakṣaṇam // Rajni_14.144
GS40rajnighu:4991: balakṛddīpanī pathyā kāntikṛt tarpaṇī parā // Rajni_14.145
GS40rajnighu:4992: mādhvī tu madhurā hṛdyā nātyuṣṇā pittavātahṛt /
GS40rajnighu:4994: paiṣṭī kaṭūṣṇā tīkṣṇā syānmadhurā dīpanī parā // Rajni_14.147
GS40rajnighu:4995: saindhī śītā kaṣāyāmlā pittahṛdvātadā ca sā // Rajni_14.148
GS40rajnighu:4996: gauḍī tu śiśire peyā paiṣṭī hemantavarṣayoḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4997: śaradgrīṣmavasanteṣu mādhvī grāhyā na cānyathā // Rajni_14.149
GS40rajnighu:4999: mādhvīsamaṃ syāttṛṇavṛkṣajātaṃ madyaṃ suśītaṃ guru tarpaṇaṃ ca // Rajni_14.150
GS40rajnighu:5002: aikṣavaṃ tu bhavenmadyaṃ śiśiraṃ ca madotkaṭam /
GS40rajnighu:5005: śārkaraṃ kathyate madyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ dīpanamohanam // Rajni_14.153
GS40rajnighu:5008: madyaṃ navaṃ sarvavikārahetuḥ sarvaṃ tu vātādikadoṣadāyi /
GS40rajnighu:5009: jīrṇaṃ tu sarvaṃ sakalāmayaghnaṃ balapradaṃ vṛṣyakaraṃ ca dīpanam // Rajni_14.155
GS40rajnighu:5011: dvijais tribhis tu na grāhyaṃ yadyapy ujjīvayenmṛtam // Rajni_14.156
GS40rajnighu:5013: prāgasmātpratibudhya nāmaguṇato nirṇītayogaucitī yāthātathyavaśād viniścitamanāḥ kurvīta vaidyaḥ kriyām // Rajni_14.157
GS40rajnighu:5014: yai rasyamānā hi nṛṇāṃ yathāsvaṃ doṣānnirasyantyapi durnirāsān /
GS40rajnighu:5015: teṣāṃ rasānāṃ vasatiḥ kilāyaṃ vargaḥ prasiddho rasavarganāmnā // Rajni_14.158
GS40rajnighu:5016: nisyandaṃ dugdhasindhāv amṛtamatha samastauṣadhīnāṃ na dohaṃ tāpāhaṃ no cikitsāmabhilaṣati rasaṃ nāpi doṣākarasya /
GS40rajnighu:5017: labdhvā yat sauhṛdayyaṃ jagati budhajanastena vargaḥ kṛto'smin pānīyādiḥ prasiddhiṃ vrajati manumito nāmagīrmauliratne // Rajni_14.159
GS40rajnighu:5020: kṣīraṃ pīyūṣam ūdhasyaṃ dugdhaṃ stanyaṃ payo'mṛtam // Rajni_15.1
GS40rajnighu:5021: kṣīrajaṃ dadhi tadrūpyaṃ viralaṃ mastu tajjalam // Rajni_15.2
GS40rajnighu:5024: amṛtaṃ cābhighāraśca homyam āyuśca taijasam // Rajni_15.4
GS40rajnighu:5025: mrakṣaṇaṃ snehanaṃ snehaḥ snigdhatā mrakṣa eva ca /
GS40rajnighu:5029: takraṃ tribhāgadadhisaṃyutamambu dhīrairuktaṃ dadhidviguṇavāriyutaṃ tu mastu /
GS40rajnighu:5030: dadhyambhasī yadi same tadudaśvidāhus tat kevalaṃ tu mathitaṃ munayo vadanti // Rajni_15.7
GS40rajnighu:5032: gomayaṃ gopurīṣaṃ syād goviṣṭhā gomalaṃ ca tat // Rajni_15.8
GS40rajnighu:5035: gavyaṃ kṣīraṃ pathyam atyantarucyaṃ svādu snigdhaṃ pittavātāmayaghnam /
GS40rajnighu:5036: kāntiprajñābuddhimedhāṅgapuṣṭiṃ dhatte spaṣṭaṃ vīryavṛddhiṃ vidhatte // Rajni_15.10
GS40rajnighu:5037: gaulyaṃ tu mahiṣīkṣīraṃ vipāke śītalaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:5041: sūkṣmājadugdheti ca saṃvadārhaṃ godugdhavīryāt tv adhikaṃ guṇe ca /
GS40rajnighu:5042: sukṣīṇadeheṣu ca pathyam uktaṃ sthūlājadugdhaṃ kila kiṃcidūnam // Rajni_15.13
GS40rajnighu:5043: āvikaṃ tu payaḥ snigdhaṃ kaphapittaharaṃ param /
GS40rajnighu:5044: sthaulyamehaharaṃ pathyaṃ lomaśaṃ guru vṛddhidam // Rajni_15.14
GS40rajnighu:5046: snigdhaṃ sthairyakaraṃ śītaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ balavardhanam // Rajni_15.15
GS40rajnighu:5047: aśvīkṣīraṃ tu rūkṣāmlaṃ lavaṇaṃ dīpanaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5050: madhurāmlarasaṃ rūkṣaṃ dīpanaṃ pathyadaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_15.17
GS40rajnighu:5053: madhuraṃ mānuṣīkṣīraṃ kaṣāyaṃ ca himaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5054: cakṣuṣyaṃ dīpanaṃ pathyaṃ pācanaṃ rocanaṃ ca tat // Rajni_15.19
GS40rajnighu:5055: kṣīraṃ kāsaśvāsakopāya sarvaṃ gurvāmaṃ syāt prāyaśo doṣadāyi /
GS40rajnighu:5056: taccettaptaṃ vartitaṃ pathyamuktaṃ nārīkṣīraṃ tv āmam evāmayaghnam // Rajni_15.20
GS40rajnighu:5058: sarvāmayaharaṃ pathyaṃ cirasaṃsthaṃ tu doṣadam // Rajni_15.21
GS40rajnighu:5059: ke 'py āvikaṃ pathyatamaṃ śṛtoṣṇaṃ kṣīraṃ tv ajānāṃ śṛtaśītamāhuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5060: dohāntaśītaṃ mahiṣīpayaśca gavyaṃ tu dhāroṣṇamidaṃ praśastam // Rajni_15.22
GS40rajnighu:5061: vṛṣyaṃ bṛṃhaṇam agnivardhanakaraṃ pūrvāhṇapītaṃ payo madhyāhne baladāyakaṃ kaphaharaṃ kṛcchrasya vicchedakam /
GS40rajnighu:5062: bālye vahnikaraṃ tato balakaraṃ vīryapradaṃ vārddhake rātrau kṣīramanekadoṣaśamanaṃ sevyaṃ tataḥ sarvadā // Rajni_15.23
GS40rajnighu:5063: kṣīraṃ muhūrtatritayoṣitaṃ yad ataptam etad vikṛtiṃ prayāti /
GS40rajnighu:5064: uṣṇaṃ tu doṣaṃ kurute tadūrdhvaṃ viṣopamaṃ syād uṣitaṃ daśānām // Rajni_15.24
GS40rajnighu:5065: jīrṇajvare kaphe kṣīṇe kṣīraṃ syād amṛtopamam /
GS40rajnighu:5066: tadeva taruṇe pītaṃ viṣavaddhanti mānuṣam // Rajni_15.25
GS40rajnighu:5067: caturthabhāgaṃ salilaṃ nidhāya yatnād yad āvartitam uttamaṃ tat /
GS40rajnighu:5068: sarvāmayaghnaṃ balapuṣṭikāri vīryapradaṃ kṣīram atipraśastam // Rajni_15.26
GS40rajnighu:5070: kṣīraṃ saśarkaraṃ pathyaṃ yad vā sātmye ca sarvadā // Rajni_15.27
GS40rajnighu:5071: pittaghnaṃ śṛtaśītalaṃ kaphaharaṃ pakvaṃ taduṣṇaṃ bhavecchītaṃ yattu na pācitaṃ tadakhilaṃ viṣṭambhadoṣapradam /
GS40rajnighu:5072: dhāroṣṇaṃ tv amṛtaṃ payaḥ śramaharaṃ nidrākaraṃ kāntidaṃ vṛṣyaṃ bṛṃhaṇam agnivardhanam atisvādu tridoṣāpaham // Rajni_15.28
GS40rajnighu:5073: kṣīraṃ na yuñjīta kadāpyataptaṃ taptaṃ na caitallavaṇena sārdham /
GS40rajnighu:5076: śākajāmbavarasaistu sevitaṃ mārayatyabudham āśu sarpavat // Rajni_15.30
GS40rajnighu:5077: snigdhaṃ śītaṃ guru kṣīraṃ sarvakālaṃ na sevayet /
GS40rajnighu:5078: dīptāgniṃ kurute mandaṃ mandāgniṃ naṣṭameva ca // Rajni_15.31
GS40rajnighu:5079: nityaṃ tīvrāgninā sevyaṃ supakvaṃ māhiṣaṃ payaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5082: rūkṣañca pittadāhaṃ karoti raktāmayaṃ kurute // Rajni_15.33
GS40rajnighu:5084: lavaṇaṃ madhuraṃ kṣīraṃ vidāhajananaṃ ciraprasūtānām // Rajni_15.34
GS40rajnighu:5086: madhyavayasāṃ rasāyanamuktamidaṃ durbalaṃ tu vṛddhānām // Rajni_15.35
GS40rajnighu:5088: taddāhi lavaṇaṃ kṣīraṃ madhuraṃ pittadoṣakṛt // Rajni_15.36
GS40rajnighu:5091: deśeṣu deśeṣu ca teṣu teṣu tṛṇāmbunī yādṛśadoṣayukte /
GS40rajnighu:5092: tatsevanādeva gavādikānāṃ guṇādi dugdhādiṣu tādṛśaṃ matam // Rajni_15.38
GS40rajnighu:5093: śītaṃ snigdhaṃ gurur gaulyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ pittāpahaṃ param /
GS40rajnighu:5094: jñeyā caivābhidhā tasya kīlāṭaṃ tu payaḥcchadaḥ // Rajni_15.39
GS40rajnighu:5095: dadhi gavyam atipavitraṃ śītaṃ snigdhaṃ ca dīpanaṃ balakṛt /
GS40rajnighu:5096: madhuramarocakahāri grāhi ca vātāmayaghnaṃ ca // Rajni_15.40
GS40rajnighu:5098: balāsravardhanaṃ vṛṣyaṃ śramaghnaṃ śodhanaṃ dadhi // Rajni_15.41
GS40rajnighu:5102: vāte ca raktavāte ca pathyaṃ śophavraṇāpaham // Rajni_15.43
GS40rajnighu:5104: dīptidaṃ khalu balāsagadaghnaṃ vīryavardhanabalapradam uktam // Rajni_15.44
GS40rajnighu:5106: vātālpadaṃ dīpanakāri netradoṣāpahaṃ tat kathitaṃ pṛthivyām // Rajni_15.45
GS40rajnighu:5110: nihanti kaṭukaṃ svādu kiṃcid amlarasaṃ dadhi // Rajni_15.47
GS40rajnighu:5111: vipāke madhuraṃ balyam amlaṃ saṃtarpaṇaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:5113: dadhyamlaṃ guru vātadoṣaśamanaṃ saṃgrāhi mūtrāvahaṃ balyaṃ śophakaraṃ ca rucyaśamanaṃ vahneśca śāntipradam /
GS40rajnighu:5114: kāsaśvāsasupīnaseṣu viṣame śītajvare syāddhitaṃ raktodrekakaraṃ karoti satataṃ śukrasya vṛddhiṃ parām // Rajni_15.49
GS40rajnighu:5115: dadhi madhuramīṣadamlaṃ madhurāmlaṃ vā hitaṃ na cātyuṣṇam /
GS40rajnighu:5116: yāvadyāvanmadhuraṃ doṣaharaṃ tāvad uktam idam // Rajni_15.50
GS40rajnighu:5118: na ca śaradi vasante noṣṇakāle na rātrau na dadhi kaphavikāre pittadoṣe 'pi nādyāt // Rajni_15.51
GS40rajnighu:5120: tuhinaśiśirakāle sevitaṃ cātipathyaṃ racayati tanudārḍhyaṃ kāntimattvaṃ ca nṝṇām // Rajni_15.52
GS40rajnighu:5121: uṣṇāmlaṃ rucipaktidaṃ klamaharaṃ balyaṃ kaṣāyaṃ saraṃ bhukticchedakaraṃ tṛṣodaragadaplīhārśasāṃ nāśanam /
GS40rajnighu:5122: srotaḥśuddhikaraṃ kaphānilaharaṃ viṣṭambhaśūlāpahaṃ pāṇḍuśvāsavikāragulmaśamanaṃ mastu praśastaṃ laghu // Rajni_15.53
GS40rajnighu:5123: uktaṃ śleṣmasamīrahāri mathitaṃ tat śleṣmapittāpahaṃ rucyaṃ prāhur udaśvidākhyam adhikaṃ takraṃ tridoṣāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:5124: mandāgnāv arucau vidāhaviṣamaśvāsārtikāsādiṣu śreṣṭhaṃ pathyatamaṃ vadanti sudhiyas takratrayaṃ hy uttamam // Rajni_15.54
GS40rajnighu:5125: takraṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ rucidīpanīyaṃ rucyaṃ vamiśramaharaṃ klamahāri mastu /
GS40rajnighu:5126: balyapradaṃ pavananāśam udaśvidākhyaṃ śastaṃ kaphaśramamarudvamaneṣu gholam // Rajni_15.55
GS40rajnighu:5127: amlena vātaṃ madhureṇa pittaṃ kaphaṃ kaṣāyeṇa nihanti sadyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5128: yathā surāṇām amṛtaṃ hitāya tathā narāṇām iha takramāhuḥ // Rajni_15.56
GS40rajnighu:5129: āmātisāre ca viṣūcikāyāṃ vātajvare pāṇḍuṣu kāmaleṣu /
GS40rajnighu:5130: pramehagulmodaravātaśūle nityaṃ pibet takram arocake ca // Rajni_15.57
GS40rajnighu:5137: takraṃ dadyānno kṣate noṣṇakāle no daurbalye no tṛṣāmūrchite ca /
GS40rajnighu:5138: naiva bhrāntau naiva pittāsradoṣe naitaddadyāt sūtikāyāṃ viśeṣāt // Rajni_15.61
GS40rajnighu:5140: ardhāvaśiṣṭaṃ sāmānyaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ laghu pathyadam // Rajni_15.62
GS40rajnighu:5141: śītaṃ varṇabalāvahaṃ sumadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca saṃgrāhakaṃ vātaghnaṃ kaphahārakaṃ rucikaraṃ sarvāṅgaśūlāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:5142: kāsaghnaṃ śramanāśanaṃ sukhakaraṃ kāntipradaṃ puṣṭidaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ navanītam uddhṛtanavaṃ goḥ sarvadoṣāpaham // Rajni_15.63
GS40rajnighu:5143: gavyaṃ ca māhiṣaṃ cāpi navanītaṃ navodbhavam /
GS40rajnighu:5145: māhiṣaṃ navanītaṃ tu kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ rase /
GS40rajnighu:5146: śītaṃ vṛṣyapradaṃ grāhi pittaghnaṃ tu balapradam // Rajni_15.65
GS40rajnighu:5147: laghv ājaṃ tu madhuraṃ kaṣāyaṃ ca tridoṣanut /
GS40rajnighu:5148: cakṣuṣyaṃ dīpanaṃ balyaṃ navanītaṃ hitaṃ sadā // Rajni_15.66
GS40rajnighu:5150: balyaṃ netrāmayaghnaṃ ca kaphaghnaṃ dīpanaṃ param // Rajni_15.67
GS40rajnighu:5151: āvikaṃ navanītaṃ tu vipāke tu himaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5152: yoniśūle kaphe vāte durnāmni ca hitaṃ sadā // Rajni_15.68
GS40rajnighu:5153: aiḍakaṃ navanītaṃ tu kaṣāyaṃ śītalaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5154: medhāhṛdguru puṣṭyaṃ ca sthaulyaṃ mandāgnidīpanam // Rajni_15.69
GS40rajnighu:5156: tiktaṃ viṣṭambhi jantughnaṃ hanti pittakaphakrimīn // Rajni_15.70
GS40rajnighu:5158: cakṣuṣyaṃ kaṭukaṃ coṣṇam īṣad vātāpahārakam // Rajni_15.71
GS40rajnighu:5160: balyaṃ dīpanadaṃ pāke laghūṣṇaṃ mūtradoṣanut // Rajni_15.72
GS40rajnighu:5161: auṣṭraṃ tu navanītaṃ syādvipāke laghu śītalam /
GS40rajnighu:5163: navanītaṃ tu nārīṇāṃ rucyaṃ pāke laghu smṛtam /
GS40rajnighu:5165: śītaṃ rucyanavoddhṛtaṃ sumadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca vātāpahaṃ kāsaghnaṃ krimināśanaṃ kaphakaraṃ saṃgrāhi śūlāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:5166: balyaṃ puṣṭikaraṃ tṛṣārtiśamanaṃ saṃtāpavicchedanaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ śramahāri tarpaṇakaraṃ dadhyudbhavaṃ pittajit // Rajni_15.75
GS40rajnighu:5168: ahṛdyaṃ sarvarogāḍhyaṃ dadhijaṃ tadghṛtaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_15.76
GS40rajnighu:5169: dhīkāntismṛtidāyakaṃ balakaraṃ medhāpradaṃ puṣṭikṛt vātaśleṣmaharaṃ śramopaśamanaṃ pittāpahaṃ hṛdyadam /
GS40rajnighu:5170: vahnervṛddhikaraṃ vipākamadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ vapuḥsthairyadaṃ gavyaṃ havyatamaṃ ghṛtaṃ bahuguṇaṃ bhogyaṃ bhavedbhāgyataḥ // Rajni_15.77
GS40rajnighu:5171: sarpirmāhiṣamuttamaṃ dhṛtikaraṃ saukhyapradaṃ kāntikṛt vātaśleṣmanibarhaṇaṃ balakaraṃ varṇapradāne kṣamam /
GS40rajnighu:5172: durnāmagrahaṇīvikāraśamanaṃ mandānaloddīpanaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ navagavyataḥ paramidaṃ hṛdyaṃ manohāri ca // Rajni_15.78
GS40rajnighu:5176: yonidoṣe kaphe vāte śophe kampe ca taddhitam // Rajni_15.80
GS40rajnighu:5177: aiḍakaṃ ghṛtam atīva gauravād varjyamiva sukumāradehinām /
GS40rajnighu:5178: buddhipāṭavakaraṃ balāvahaṃ sevitaṃ ca kurute nṛṇāṃ vapuḥ // Rajni_15.81
GS40rajnighu:5180: kaṣāyaṃ laghu viṣṭambhi tiktaṃ cāgnikaraṃ param // Rajni_15.82
GS40rajnighu:5182: īṣad dīpanadaṃ mūrchāhāri vātālpadaṃ guru // Rajni_15.83
GS40rajnighu:5184: pāke laghūṣṇavīryaṃ ca kaṣāyaṃ kaphanāśanam // Rajni_15.84
GS40rajnighu:5185: ghṛtam auṣṭraṃ tu madhuraṃ vipāke kaṭuśītalam /
GS40rajnighu:5188: mandāgnidīpanaṃ rucyaṃ pāke laghu viṣāpaham // Rajni_15.86
GS40rajnighu:5191: āyurvṛddhiṃ vapuṣi dṛḍhatāṃ saukumāryaṃ ca kāntiṃ buddhiṃ dhatte smṛtibalakaraṃ śītavidhvaṃsanaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:5192: pathyaṃ bālye vayasi taruṇe vārddhake cātibalyaṃ nānyat kiṃcij jagati guṇadaṃ sarpiṣaḥ pathyamasti // Rajni_15.88
GS40rajnighu:5198: dāhakaṃ gātraśaithilyaṃ mardanānna ca bhakṣaṇāt // Rajni_15.91
GS40rajnighu:5200: śākhāmlabhedanaṃ caivam amlasāraṃ ca cukrikā // Rajni_15.92
GS40rajnighu:5204: yavāmlajaṃ yavotthaṃ ca tuṣotthaṃ ca tuṣodakam // Rajni_15.94
GS40rajnighu:5218: āvikaṃ tiktakaṭukaṃ mūtram uṣṇaṃ ca kuṣṭhajit /
GS40rajnighu:5221: tiktaṃ kaṣāyaṃ śūlaghnaṃ hikkāśvāsaharaṃ param // Rajni_15.102
GS40rajnighu:5222: aśvamūtraṃ tu tiktoṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca viṣadoṣajit /
GS40rajnighu:5224: kharamūtraṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca kṣāraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ kaphāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:5233: jyotiṣmatyabhayodbhavaṃ madhurikākośāmraciñcābhavaṃ karpūratrapusādijaṃ ca sakalaṃ siddhyai kramāt kathyate // Rajni_15.108
GS40rajnighu:5234: tilatailam alaṃkaroti keśaṃ madhuraṃ tiktakaṣāyam uṣṇatīkṣṇam /
GS40rajnighu:5239: tridoṣakṛtpuṣṭibalakṣayaṃ ca karoti kaṇḍūṃ ca karoti dṛṣṭeḥ // Rajni_15.111
GS40rajnighu:5245: kuṣṭhāpahaṃ svādu rasāyanottamaṃ pittaprakopaṃ kurute 'tidīpanam // Rajni_15.114
GS40rajnighu:5249: śītalaṃ kāntidaṃ balyaṃ śleṣmalaṃ keśavardhanam // Rajni_15.116
GS40rajnighu:5251: ākṣaṃ svādu himaṃ keśyaṃ guru pittānilāpaham // Rajni_15.118
GS40rajnighu:5259: śiśiraṃ kaṭu puṃstvaghnaṃ keśyaṃ tvagdoṣanāśanam // Rajni_15.122
GS40rajnighu:5262: yacca ciñcībhavaṃ tailaṃ kaṭu pāke vilekhanam /
GS40rajnighu:5267: tanmadhuraṃ guru śiśiraṃ keśyaṃ kaphapittanāśi kāntikaram // Rajni_15.126
GS40rajnighu:5268: tailaṃ na sevayeddhīmān yasya kasya ca yadbhavet /
GS40rajnighu:5270: viṣasya tailasya na kiṃcid antaraṃ mṛtasya suptasya na kiṃcid antaram /
GS40rajnighu:5271: tṛṇasya dāsasya na kiṃcid antaraṃ mūrkhasya kāṣṭhasya na kiṃcid antaram // Rajni_15.128
GS40rajnighu:5273: vargaṃ nisargalalitojjvalaśabdasargaṃ buddhvā bhiṣakpatir aśaṅkatayā bhiṣajyet // Rajni_15.129
GS40rajnighu:5274: pātāram ātmanaḥ kila yānti pratyupacikīrṣayā yāni /
GS40rajnighu:5275: teṣām eva nivāsaḥ parikathitaḥ peyavarga iti kṛtibhiḥ // Rajni_15.130
GS40rajnighu:5276: pāyaṃ pāyaṃ madhuravimalāṃ śītalāṃ yasya kīrtisrotodhārāṃ jahati sujanā durjanāsaṃgadausthyam /
GS40rajnighu:5277: vargastasya vrajati nṛharer nāmanirmāṇanāmnaś cūḍāratne khalu tithimitaḥ kṣīrakādiḥ samāptim // Rajni_15.131
GS40rajnighu:5281: tacca tāvat tridhā jñeyaṃ śūkaśimbītṛṇāhvayam // Rajni_16.1
GS40rajnighu:5282: vrīhyādikaṃ yadiha śūkasamanvitaṃ syāt tacchūkadhānyam atha mudgamakuṣṭakādi /
GS40rajnighu:5283: śimbīnigūḍham iti tat pravadanti śimbīdhānyaṃ tṛṇodbhavatayā tṛṇadhānyam anyat // Rajni_16.2
GS40rajnighu:5285: śimbībhavaṃ guru himaṃ ca vibandhadāyi vātūlakaṃ tu śiśiraṃ tṛṇadhānyam āhuḥ // Rajni_16.3
GS40rajnighu:5286: deśe deśe śūkadhānyeṣu saṃkhyā jñātuṃ śakyā naiva taddaivatairvā /
GS40rajnighu:5287: tasmād eṣāṃ yeṣu bhogopayogās tānyasmābhir vyākriyante kiyanti // Rajni_16.4
GS40rajnighu:5289: dhānyottamāś ca vijñeyāḥ kaidārāḥ sukumārakāḥ // Rajni_16.5
GS40rajnighu:5291: vrīhis tatheti daśadhā bhuvi śālayastu teṣāṃ krameṇa guṇanāmagaṇaṃ bravīmi // Rajni_16.6
GS40rajnighu:5292: rājānnaṃ dīrghaśūkaḥ kharipudivasajaṃ ṣaṣṭiko varṇato dvau niḥśūko muṇḍaśāliḥ svaguṇaviśaditaḥ svābhidhānāstrayo'nye /
GS40rajnighu:5293: māsair yo 'nyas tribhiḥ syāt sa bhavati nirapo yo 'pi vṛṣṭyambusambhūr eṣa syādvrīhisaṃjñastaditi daśavidhāḥ śālayastu prasiddhāḥ // Rajni_16.7
GS40rajnighu:5296: rājānnaṃ tu tridoṣaghnaṃ susnigdhaṃ madhuraṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5298: rājānnaṃ trividhaṃ svaśūkabhidayā jñeyaṃ sitaṃ lohitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ceti rasādhikaṃ ca tadidaṃ syād auttarottaryataḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5299: traividhyādiha taṇḍulāś ca haritāḥ śvetāstathā lohitāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti te 'pyatha guṇaiḥ syuḥ pūrvapūrvottarāḥ // Rajni_16.10
GS40rajnighu:5302: gauro nīlaḥ ṣaṣṭiko'yaṃ dvidhā syād ādyo rucyaḥ śītalo doṣahārī /
GS40rajnighu:5303: balyaḥ pathyo dīpano vīryavṛddhiṃ datte cāsmāt kiṃcid ūno dvitīyaḥ // Rajni_16.12
GS40rajnighu:5308: raktaśāliḥ sumadhuro laghuḥ snigdho balāvahaḥ // Rajni_16.15
GS40rajnighu:5315: mahāśāliḥ svādurmadhuraśiśiraḥ pittaśamano jvaraṃ jīrṇaṃ dāhaṃ jaṭhararujam ahnāya śamayet /
GS40rajnighu:5316: śiśūnāṃ yūnāṃ vā yadapi jaratāṃ vā hitakaraḥ sadā sevyaḥ sarvair analabalavīryāṇi kurute // Rajni_16.20
GS40rajnighu:5326: vrīhir gauro madhuraśiśiraḥ pittahārī kaṣāyaḥ snigdho vṛṣyaḥ kṛmikaphaharas tāparaktāpahaś ca /
GS40rajnighu:5327: puṣṭiṃ datte śramaśamanakṛd vīryavṛddhiṃ vidhatte rucyo 'tyantaṃ janayati mudaṃ vātakṛnmecako 'nyaḥ // Rajni_16.26
GS40rajnighu:5328: maṇḍakaḥ sthūlaśāliś ca syād bimbaśālikas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:5329: nijātiśāṇahulyāś ca bimbī kausendukas tathā // Rajni_16.27
GS40rajnighu:5331: rājānāṃ maulikasyāpi śāliḥ syād urvarī tathā // Rajni_16.28
GS40rajnighu:5336: vrīhisaṃdhānyam uddiṣṭaḥ ardhadhānyas tu vrīhikaḥ // Rajni_16.30
GS40rajnighu:5338: sudhānyaṃ pathyakārī ca mupaviḥ prajñavipriyaḥ // Rajni_16.31
GS40rajnighu:5344: tṛṣṇāghno malakṛcchraghno hṛdyastu matidāḥ pare // Rajni_16.35
GS40rajnighu:5346: gandhāḍhyā gandhamālyā ca gandhānī gandhamālinī // Rajni_16.36
GS40rajnighu:5349: raktāṅgulaṃ sukāraṃ ca kuṅkumaṃ samavarṇajā // Rajni_16.38
GS40rajnighu:5352: madhurā ca sugandhā ca tilavāsī nigadyate // Rajni_16.40
GS40rajnighu:5354: tilanī tilaparṇī ca āmagandhā pravāsinī // Rajni_16.41
GS40rajnighu:5362: kalāṭakaḥ kavilaḥ syād guruso garuḍaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5370: saurabhaṃ śuṇḍikaḥ śuṇḍī kausumbhī kaṭhino 'phalaḥ // Rajni_16.50
GS40rajnighu:5374: umpikā madhurā snigdhā sugandhā ca kaṣāyakā /
GS40rajnighu:5379: kiṃcit satiktā madhurāḥ pācanā balavardhanāḥ // Rajni_16.55
GS40rajnighu:5382: śālayo ye chinnaruhā rūkṣās te baddhavarcasaḥ // Rajni_16.57
GS40rajnighu:5394: sa raktayāvanālo hitalohitas tuvaradhānyaś ca // Rajni_16.63
GS40rajnighu:5398: śiśiro madhuro vṛṣyo doṣaghno balapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_16.65
GS40rajnighu:5400: yavano nistuṣaḥ kṣīrī rasālaḥ sumanaśca saḥ // Rajni_16.66
GS40rajnighu:5402: guruḥ śleṣmāmado balyo ruciro vīryavardhanaḥ // Rajni_16.67
GS40rajnighu:5406: syāt tīkṣṇaśūkas turagapriyaś ca saktur hayeṣṭaś ca pavitradhānyam // Rajni_16.69
GS40rajnighu:5407: yavaḥ kaṣāyo madhuraḥ suśītalaḥ pramehajit tiktakaphāpahārakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5408: aśūkamuṇḍas tu yavo balaprado vṛṣyaśca nṝṇāṃ bahuvīryapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_16.70
GS40rajnighu:5411: śītaḥ kaṣāyo madhuras tu rūkṣo mehakrimiśleṣmaviṣāpahaś ca /
GS40rajnighu:5412: puṣṭiṃ ca vīryaṃ ca balaṃ ca datte pittāpaho veṇuyavaḥ praśastaḥ // Rajni_16.72
GS40rajnighu:5415: kṛṣṇamudgas tu vāsanto mādhavaś ca surāṣṭrajaḥ // Rajni_16.74
GS40rajnighu:5417: laghuś ca dīpanaḥ pathyo balavīryāṅgapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_16.75
GS40rajnighu:5418: śāradas tu harinmudgo dhūsaro 'nyaśca śāradaḥ // Rajni_16.76
GS40rajnighu:5423: pittajvarārtiśamanaṃ laghu mudgayūṣaṃ saṃtāpahāri tad arocakanāśanaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:5424: raktaprasādanam idaṃ yadi saindhavena yuktaṃ tadā bhavati sarvarujāpahāri // Rajni_16.79
GS40rajnighu:5426: māṃsalaś ca balāḍhyaś ca pitryaś ca pitṛjottamaḥ // Rajni_16.80
GS40rajnighu:5427: māṣaḥ snigdho bahumalakaraḥ śoṣaṇaḥ śleṣmakārī vīryeṇoṣṇo jhaṭiti kurute raktapittaprakopam /
GS40rajnighu:5428: hanyādvātaṃ gurubalakaro rocano bhakṣyamāṇaḥ svādur nityaṃ śramasukhavatāṃ sevanīyo narāṇām // Rajni_16.81
GS40rajnighu:5432: bālabhojyo vājibhakṣaś caṇakaḥ kañcukī ca saḥ // Rajni_16.84
GS40rajnighu:5436: gaulyo 'śmarīśoṣavināśakārī kaṣāya īṣat kaṭur vīryakārī // Rajni_16.86
GS40rajnighu:5439: caṇo gaurastu madhuro balakṛd rocanaḥ paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5440: śveto vātakaro rucyaḥ pittaghnaḥ śiśiro guruḥ // Rajni_16.88
GS40rajnighu:5443: caṇasya yūṣaṃ madhuraṃ kaṣāyaṃ kaphāpahaṃ vātavikārahetuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5446: puṣṭipradaṃ naijaguṇaṃ ca pāke saṃtarpaṇaṃ mañjulamādhurīkam // Rajni_16.91
GS40rajnighu:5448: amṛto 'raṇyamudgaś ca vallīmudgaś ca kīrtitaḥ // Rajni_16.92
GS40rajnighu:5452: śūraḥ kalyāṇabījaś ca gurubījo masūrakaḥ // Rajni_16.94
GS40rajnighu:5456: trāsano nālakaḥ kaṇṭhī satīnaś ca hareṇukaḥ // Rajni_16.96
GS40rajnighu:5459: laṅkā karālā tripuṭā kāṇḍikā rūkṣaṇātmikā // Rajni_16.98
GS40rajnighu:5460: laṅkā rucyā himā gaulyā pittajid vātakṛdguruḥ // Rajni_16.99
GS40rajnighu:5462: vṛttabījā pītapuṣpā śvetā raktāsitā tridhā // Rajni_16.100
GS40rajnighu:5463: āḍhakī tu kaṣāyā ca madhurā kaphapittajit /
GS40rajnighu:5464: īṣad vātakarā rucyā vidalā gurugrāhikā // Rajni_16.101
GS40rajnighu:5465: sā ca śvetā doṣadātrī tu raktā rucyā balyā pittatāpādihantrī /
GS40rajnighu:5466: sā śyāmā ced dīpanī pittadāhadhvaṃsā balyaṃ cāḍhakīyūṣam uktam // Rajni_16.102
GS40rajnighu:5467: kulitthas tāmrabījaś ca śvetabījaḥ sitetaraḥ // Rajni_16.103
GS40rajnighu:5470: sukumāro vṛttabījo madhuraḥ kṣavakaśca saḥ // Rajni_16.105
GS40rajnighu:5474: palaṃkaṣā sthūlaśimbī vṛttā madhusitā sitā // Rajni_16.107
GS40rajnighu:5479: vātalaḥ kaphado rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyo viṣadoṣanut // Rajni_16.110
GS40rajnighu:5481: pāpaghnaḥ pūtadhānyaṃ ca jaṭilastu vanodbhavaḥ // Rajni_16.111
GS40rajnighu:5482: snigdho varṇabalāgnivṛddhijananastanyānilaghno guruḥ soṣṇaḥ pittakaro'lpamūtrakaraṇaḥ keśyo 'tipathyo vraṇe /
GS40rajnighu:5483: saṃgrāhī madhuraḥ kaṣāyasahitastikto vipāke kaṭuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pathyatamaḥ sito'lpaguṇadaḥ kṣīṇās tathānye tilāḥ // Rajni_16.112
GS40rajnighu:5484: palalaṃ tilakalkaṃ syāttilacūrṇaṃ ca piṣṭakam // Rajni_16.113
GS40rajnighu:5486: tilakiṭṭaṃ tu piṇyākaḥ khalaḥ syāt tilakalkajaḥ // Rajni_16.115
GS40rajnighu:5489: umā kṣumā haimavatī sunīlā nīlapuṣpikā // Rajni_16.117
GS40rajnighu:5493: tīkṣṇagandhā madhurikā kṣavakaḥ kṣuvakaḥ kṣavaḥ // Rajni_16.119
GS40rajnighu:5497: sā kṛṣṇasarṣapākhyā vijñeyā rājasarṣapākhyā ca // Rajni_16.121
GS40rajnighu:5504: dhānyānāṃ kañcuke śimbī bījaguptiś ca śāmbhavī /
GS40rajnighu:5505: tadguptāni ca dhānyāni śimbīdhānyāni cakṣate // Rajni_16.125
GS40rajnighu:5507: sukumārī rājadhānyaṃ tṛṇabījottamaś ca saḥ // Rajni_16.126
GS40rajnighu:5511: sa ca deśaviśeṣeṇa nānābhedaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Rajni_16.128
GS40rajnighu:5514: varakaḥ sthūlakaṅguś ca rūkṣaḥ sthūlapriyaṅgukaḥ // Rajni_16.130
GS40rajnighu:5515: varako madhuro rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyo vātapittakṛt // Rajni_16.131
GS40rajnighu:5517: vātalaḥ sukumāraśca sa ca nānāvidhābhidhaḥ // Rajni_16.132
GS40rajnighu:5521: nīvāro madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ pavitraḥ pathyado laghuḥ // Rajni_16.135
GS40rajnighu:5522: rāgī tu lāñchanaḥ syād bahudalakaṇiśaś ca gucchakaṇiśaś ca // Rajni_16.136
GS40rajnighu:5523: tikto madhurakaṣāyaḥ śītaḥ pittāsranāśano baladaḥ // Rajni_16.137
GS40rajnighu:5525: haritaṃ vārddhakaṃ pakvaṃ vājināṃ puṣṭidāyakam // Rajni_16.138
GS40rajnighu:5526: ye ke ca vrīhayo bhṛṣṭāste lājā iti kīrtitāḥ // Rajni_16.139
GS40rajnighu:5527: yavādayaśca ye bhṛṣṭā dhānāste parikīrtitāḥ // Rajni_16.140
GS40rajnighu:5528: lājā ca yavadhānā ca tarpaṇī pittanāśinī /
GS40rajnighu:5531: ākulā guravo vṛṣyā madhurāḥ balakāriṇaḥ // Rajni_16.142
GS40rajnighu:5532: vrīhayo 'pyardhapakvāś ca taptās te pṛthukāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5533: pṛthukāḥ svādavaḥ snigdhā hṛdyā madanavardhanāḥ // Rajni_16.143
GS40rajnighu:5534: pūpalā madhurāḥ proktā vṛṣyāste baladāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5536: ye cānye yāvanālādyāś cipiṭās taptataṇḍulāḥ // Rajni_16.145
GS40rajnighu:5540: taptāstu mudgacaṇakāḥ sumanādilaṅkā sadyas tṛṣārtirucipittakṛtaś ca jagdhāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5541: vātālpadāḥ sukhakarā hy abalāśca rūkṣā hṛdyā bhavanti yuvajarjarabālakānām // Rajni_16.149
GS40rajnighu:5545: sphoṭas tu caṇakādīnāṃ dāl iti parikīrtitāḥ // Rajni_16.152
GS40rajnighu:5546: pakvaṃ haritalūnaṃ ca dhānyaṃ sarvaguṇāvaham // Rajni_16.153
GS40rajnighu:5547: śuṣkalūnaṃ tu niḥsāraṃ rūkṣaṃ tatsattvanāśanam // Rajni_16.154
GS40rajnighu:5548: koṣadhānyaṃ navaṃ balyaṃ madhuraṃ vatsaroṣitam // Rajni_16.155
GS40rajnighu:5550: dvyabdoṣitaṃ laghu pathyaṃ trivarṣādabalaṃ bhavet // Rajni_16.156
GS40rajnighu:5553: dhānyaṃ vāpitamuttamaṃ tadakhilaṃ chinnodbhavaṃ madhyamaṃ jñeyaṃ yadyadavāpitaṃ tadadhamaṃ niḥsāradoṣapradam /
GS40rajnighu:5554: dagdhāyāṃ bhuvi yatnato'pi vipine ye vāpitāḥ śālayo ye ca chinnabhavā bhavanti khalu te viṇmūtrabandhapradāḥ // Rajni_16.158
GS40rajnighu:5558: dhānyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ṣaṣṭikaṃ rājabhogyaṃ māṃsaṃ tv ājaṃ taittiraṃ lāvakīyam /
GS40rajnighu:5559: pānīyaṃ syāt kṛṣṇamṛtsnāsamutthaṃ kṣīrājyādau gavyamājaṃ praśastam // Rajni_16.162
GS40rajnighu:5561: āmnāya vargam imam āśu labheta vaidyo vidyāṃ viṣaṇṇajanajīvanadānadhanyām // Rajni_16.163
GS40rajnighu:5562: yāni sadā bhujyante bhuñjānajanāśca yāni bhuñjante /
GS40rajnighu:5563: teṣāṃ khalu dhānyānāṃ vargo 'yaṃ bhojyavarga iti kathitaḥ // Rajni_16.164
GS40rajnighu:5564: yenācāracaṇena mugdhamadhuraśrīśālinā sanmahāmānārhā bahudhānyasampaducitā saṃnīyate saṃtatam /
GS40rajnighu:5565: tena śrīnṛharīśvareṇa racite nāmokticūḍāmaṇau vargo 'yaṃ sthitam eti nūtanaracano dhānyāhvayaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ // Rajni_16.165
GS40rajnighu:5568: māṃsaṃ tu piśitaṃ kravyaṃ palaṃ tu rasyamasrajam /
GS40rajnighu:5569: palalaṃ jāṅgalaṃ kīram āmiṣaṃ ca tad ucyate // Rajni_17.1
GS40rajnighu:5570: sadyohatasya māṃsaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ hariṇādikasya yūnas tu /
GS40rajnighu:5571: jñeyaṃ sugandhi pathyaṃ jāṅgaladeśasthitasya pathyatamam // Rajni_17.2
GS40rajnighu:5572: bālasya vṛddhasya kṛśasya rogiṇo viṣāgnidagdhasya mṛtasya cāmbuṣu /
GS40rajnighu:5573: tyājyaṃ mṛgādeḥ piśitaṃ tu tasya vigandhi śuṣkaṃ ca cirasthitaṃ ca // Rajni_17.3
GS40rajnighu:5574: sarvaṃ māṃsaṃ vātavidhvaṃsi vṛṣyaṃ balyaṃ rucyaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ tacca māṃsam /
GS40rajnighu:5575: deśasthānāccātmasaṃsthaṃ svabhāvairbhūyo nānārūpatāṃ yāti nūnam // Rajni_17.4
GS40rajnighu:5576: tatrānūpīyamāṃsaṃ gavayarurumṛgakroḍagaṇḍādikānāṃ snigdhaṃ pathyaṃ ca balyaṃ laghu śaśaśikharādyudbhavaṃ jāṅgalīyam /
GS40rajnighu:5577: puṣṭiṃ dīptiṃ ca datte rucikṛdatha laghu svādu sādhāraṇīyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ balyaṃ ca rucyaṃ ruruhariṇamṛgakroḍasāraṅgakāṇām // Rajni_17.5
GS40rajnighu:5578: māṃsaṃ sārasahaṃsarātrivirahikrauñcādijaṃ śītalaṃ snigdhaṃ vātakaphāpahaṃ guru tataḥ svādu tridoṣāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:5579: pathyaṃ lāvakatittirādijanitaṃ vṛṣyaṃ laghu syāt paraṃ cakrakrauñcamayūratittirabhavaṃ deśatrayādīdṛśam // Rajni_17.6
GS40rajnighu:5580: druto vilambitaś caiva plavaś ceti gatais trayaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5581: sthānato 'pi trayas te tu bilasthalajalāśrayāḥ // Rajni_17.7
GS40rajnighu:5582: punaste tu prasahanāḥ pratudā viṣkirā iti /
GS40rajnighu:5585: evaṃ navavidhāḥ proktās ta eva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Rajni_17.9
GS40rajnighu:5586: ajaśaśahariṇādayaḥ svayaṃ ye drutagamanā drutasaṃjñakāḥ smṛtāste /
GS40rajnighu:5587: taduditapalalaṃ ca pathyabalyaṃ racayati vīryamadapradaṃ laghu syāt // Rajni_17.10
GS40rajnighu:5589: balakṛtpiśitaṃ ca picchalaṃ kaphakāsānilamāndyadaṃ guru syāt // Rajni_17.11
GS40rajnighu:5591: plavasaṃjñāḥ kathitāste tanmāṃsaṃ gurūṣṇaṃ ca baladāyi // Rajni_17.12
GS40rajnighu:5595: sthaleśayāstu te sarve māṃsaṃ sarvaguṇāvaham // Rajni_17.14
GS40rajnighu:5597: māṃsaṃ teṣāṃ tu saraṃ vṛṣyaṃ guru śiśirabalasamīrakaram // Rajni_17.15
GS40rajnighu:5599: te kīrtitāḥ prasahanāḥ palalaṃ tadīyam arśaḥpramehajaṭharāmayajāḍyahāri // Rajni_17.16
GS40rajnighu:5600: bhoktā niṣkṛṣyāmiṣaṃ sa pratudaḥ prokto gṛdhraśyenakākādiko yaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5601: māṃsaṃ tasya svādu saṃtarpaṇaṃ ca snigdhaṃ balyaṃ pittadāhāsradāyi // Rajni_17.17
GS40rajnighu:5602: bhakṣyāśca kukkuṭakapotakatittirādyāḥ kṣauṇīṃ vilikhya nakharaiḥ khalu vartayanti /
GS40rajnighu:5603: te viṣkirāḥ prakathitāḥ piśitaṃ tadīyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ kaṣāyamadhuraṃ śiśiraṃ ca rucyam // Rajni_17.18
GS40rajnighu:5604: ayameva guṇo jñeyaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ ca yathākramam /
GS40rajnighu:5605: sarvasthānaviśeṣeṇa saṃkhyā ca gatir ucyate // Rajni_17.19
GS40rajnighu:5606: yatra sthitā ye gatito 'pi deśādanyatra yātā mṛgapakṣimukhyāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5607: svasvocitasthānanivartanena māṃse 'pi teṣāṃ guṇaparyayāḥ syuḥ // Rajni_17.20
GS40rajnighu:5608: māṃsaṃ khaḍgamṛgotthaṃ tu balakṛd bṛṃhaṇaṃ guru // Rajni_17.21
GS40rajnighu:5609: gavayasyāmiṣaṃ balyaṃ rucyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca bṛṃhaṇam // Rajni_17.22
GS40rajnighu:5611: apūtaṃ gobhavaṃ kravyaṃ guru vātakaphapradam // Rajni_17.24
GS40rajnighu:5612: vanamahiṣāmiṣaṃ syād īṣallaghu dīpanaṃ ca baladāyi // Rajni_17.25
GS40rajnighu:5613: grāmīṇamahiṣamāṃsaṃ snigdhaṃ nidrākaraṃ ca pittaharam // Rajni_17.26
GS40rajnighu:5616: aśvamāṃsaṃ bhaved uṣṇaṃ vātaghnaṃ baladaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5621: rucyaṃ tu vanyajaṃ śaityaṃ bahuvīryabalapradam // Rajni_17.30
GS40rajnighu:5622: eṇasya māṃsaṃ laghuśītavṛṣyaṃ tridoṣahṛt ṣaḍrasajaṃ ca rucyam // Rajni_17.31
GS40rajnighu:5623: kuraṅgamāṃsaṃ madhuraṃ ca tadvat kaphāpahaṃ māṃsadapittanāśi // Rajni_17.32
GS40rajnighu:5624: sāraṅgaṃ jāṅgalaṃ snigdhaṃ madhuraṃ laghu vṛṣyakam // Rajni_17.33
GS40rajnighu:5625: śikharīsambhavaṃ māṃsaṃ laghu hṛdyaṃ balapradam // Rajni_17.34
GS40rajnighu:5626: varāhamāṃsaṃ guru vātahāri vṛṣyaṃ balasvedakaraṃ vanottham // Rajni_17.35
GS40rajnighu:5627: tasmādguru grāmavarāhamāṃsaṃ tanoti medo balavīryavṛddhim // Rajni_17.36
GS40rajnighu:5628: śaraśṛṅgasya māṃsaṃ tu guru snigdhaṃ kaphapradam /
GS40rajnighu:5633: īṣallaghu balaṃ datte tad eva tṛṇacāriṇaḥ // Rajni_17.39
GS40rajnighu:5634: aurabhraṃ madhuraṃ śītaṃ guru viṣṭambhi bṛṃhaṇam // Rajni_17.40
GS40rajnighu:5635: āvikaṃ madhuraṃ māṃsaṃ kiṃcid guru balapradam // Rajni_17.41
GS40rajnighu:5636: śalyamāṃsaṃ guru snigdhaṃ dīpanaṃ śvāsakāsajit // Rajni_17.42
GS40rajnighu:5637: picchilaṃ nākulaṃ māṃsaṃ vātaghnaṃ śleṣmapittakṛt // Rajni_17.43
GS40rajnighu:5638: godhāmāṃsaṃ tu vātaghnaṃ śvāsakāsaharaṃ ca tat // Rajni_17.44
GS40rajnighu:5641: māṃsaṃ ca garhitaṃ teṣāṃ māndyaṃ gauravadurjaram // Rajni_17.46
GS40rajnighu:5643: grāmyakukkuṭajaṃ snigdhaṃ vātahṛd dīpanaṃ guru // Rajni_17.48
GS40rajnighu:5649: kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ śītaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ param // Rajni_17.52
GS40rajnighu:5650: tadvacca lāvakaṃ māṃsaṃ pathyaṃ grāhi laghu smṛtam // Rajni_17.53
GS40rajnighu:5652: caṭakāyāḥ palaṃ śītaṃ laghu vṛṣyaṃ balapradam // Rajni_17.55
GS40rajnighu:5655: tadvaccakorajaṃ māṃsaṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca balapuṣṭidam // Rajni_17.58
GS40rajnighu:5656: kravyaṃ tu cakravākasya laghu snigdhaṃ balapradam /
GS40rajnighu:5660: snigdhahimaṃ guru vṛṣyaṃ māṃsaṃ jalapakṣiṇāṃ tu vātaharam // Rajni_17.61
GS40rajnighu:5661: teṣvapi ca haṃsamāṃsaṃ vṛṣyatamaṃ timiraharaṇaṃ ca // Rajni_17.62
GS40rajnighu:5663: anuktaṃ tu mṛgādīnāṃ māṃsaṃ grāhyaṃ hitādiṣu // Rajni_17.63
GS40rajnighu:5667: chāgalo raktamatsyo 'tha mahiṣaś cāvilas tathā // Rajni_17.65
GS40rajnighu:5670: kṛṣṇaḥ śalkī śvetakukṣistu matsyo yaḥ śreṣṭho'sau rohito vṛttavaktraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5671: koṣṇaṃ balyaṃ rohitasyāpi māṃsaṃ vātaṃ hanti snigdhamāpnoti vīryam // Rajni_17.67
GS40rajnighu:5672: yaḥ pītavarṇo 'pi ca picchilāṅgaḥ pṛṣṭhe tu rekhābahulaḥ saśalkaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5673: sa gargaro barbaranādarūkṣo jaḍaś ca śītaḥ kaphavātadāyī // Rajni_17.68
GS40rajnighu:5674: pṛṣṭhe pakṣau dvau gale pucchakaṃ cet sarpābhaḥ syāt phūtkṛto vṛttatuṇḍaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5675: jñeyaḥ śalkī matsyako bhīruruktaḥ snigdho vṛṣyo durjaro vātakārī // Rajni_17.69
GS40rajnighu:5676: nātisthūlo vṛttavaktro'pi śasto dhatte dantān śmaśrulo dīrghakāyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5677: saṃdhyāyāṃ vā rātriśeṣe ca varyaḥ prokto bālaḥ pathyabalyaḥ suvṛṣyaḥ // Rajni_17.70
GS40rajnighu:5678: pṛṣṭhe kukṣau kaṇṭakī dīrghatuṇḍaḥ sarpābho yaḥ so 'pyayaṃ barbarākhyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5679: vātāṭopaṃ so 'pi datte jaḍaś ca balyaḥ snigdho durjaro vīryakārī // Rajni_17.71
GS40rajnighu:5680: śvetaṃ sukāyaṃ samadīrghavṛttaṃ niḥśalkakaṃ chāgalakaṃ vadanti /
GS40rajnighu:5681: nale dvikaṇṭaḥ kila tasya pṛṣṭhe kaṇṭaḥ supathyo rucido balapradaḥ // Rajni_17.72
GS40rajnighu:5682: yo raktāṅgo nātidīrgho na cālpo nātisthūlo raktamatsyaḥ sa coktaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5683: śīto rucyaḥ puṣṭikṛddīpano'sau nāśaṃ dhatte kiṃca doṣatrayasya // Rajni_17.73
GS40rajnighu:5684: yaḥ kṛṣṇo dīrghakāyaḥ syāt sthūlaśalko balādhikaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5687: surucyo madhuro balyo guṇāḍhyo vīryapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_17.75
GS40rajnighu:5688: yaḥ sthūlāṅgo māhiṣākārako yas tālusthāne nīrajābhāṃ dadhāti /
GS40rajnighu:5689: śalkaṃ sthūlaṃ yasya vātūkako 'sau datte vīryaṃ dīpanaṃ vṛṣyadāyī // Rajni_17.76
GS40rajnighu:5692: yo vṛttagaulyaḥ kṛṣṇāṅgaḥ śalkī karṇavaśābhidhaḥ // Rajni_17.78
GS40rajnighu:5693: dīpanaḥ pācanaḥ pathyo vṛṣyo 'sau balapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_17.79
GS40rajnighu:5694: niḥśalkā ninditā matsyāḥ sarve śalkayutā hitāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5697: te tu jaḍā nādeyā yathottaraṃ laghutarāstu nādeyāḥ // Rajni_17.81
GS40rajnighu:5699: tānaśnatāṃ svādujalasthitā api jñeyā jaḍāste'pi tathā śṛtānimān // Rajni_17.82
GS40rajnighu:5700: śailāṭavīnagarabhūjalacāriṇo ye ye ke 'pi sattvanivahāḥ khalu saptasaṃkhyāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5701: tanmāṃsamatra na vitathyam athābhyadhāyi granthasya vistarabhayācca navopayogāt // Rajni_17.83
GS40rajnighu:5704: pūrvārdhaṃ puruṣasya tadgurutaraṃ paścārdhabhāgaḥ striyāḥ strī gurvī kila gurviṇī yadi tathā yoṣicca tulyā laghuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5705: pakṣī cetpuruṣo laghuḥ śṛṇu śiraḥskandhorupṛṣṭhe kramāt māṃsaṃ yacca kaṭisthitaṃ tadakhilaṃ gurveva sarvātmanā // Rajni_17.85
GS40rajnighu:5706: rasaraktādidhātūnāṃ guruḥ syāduttarottaram meḍhravṛkkayakṛnmāṃsaṃ vārṣaṇaṃ cātimātrataḥ // Rajni_17.86
GS40rajnighu:5708: vargaṃ vicārya bhiṣajā viniyujyamāno bhuktvāśanaṃ na vikṛtiṃ samupaiti martyaḥ // Rajni_17.87
GS40rajnighu:5710: tasyāyaṃ puruṣapratāpasuhṛdaḥ śrīmannṛsiṃheśitur vargaḥ saptadaśo niṣīdati kṛtau nāmādicūḍāmaṇau // Rajni_17.88
GS40rajnighu:5713: manuṣyā mānuṣā martyā manujā mānavā narāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5714: dvipādāś cetanā bhūsthā bhūmijā bhūspṛśo viśaḥ // Rajni_18.1
GS40rajnighu:5715: puruṣaḥ pūruṣo nā ca naraḥ pañcajanaḥ pumān /
GS40rajnighu:5716: arthāśrayo 'dhikārī syāt karmārhaś ca jano 'rthavān // Rajni_18.2
GS40rajnighu:5717: strī yoṣidvanitābalā sunayanā nārī ca sīmantinī rāmā vāmadṛgaṅganā ca lalanā kāntā puraṃdhrī vadhūḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5718: subhrūḥ sā varavarṇinī ca sutanustanvī tanuḥ kāminī tanvaṅgī ramaṇī kuraṅganayanā bhīruḥ priyā bhāminī // Rajni_18.3
GS40rajnighu:5719: yoṣinmahelā mahilā vilāsinī nitambinī sāpi ca mattakāśinī /
GS40rajnighu:5720: janī sunetrā pramadā ca sundarī syād añcitabhrūr lalitā vilāsinī // Rajni_18.4
GS40rajnighu:5721: māninī ca varārohā natāṅgī ca natodarā /
GS40rajnighu:5722: pratīpadarśinī śyāmā kāminī darśanī ca sā // Rajni_18.5
GS40rajnighu:5723: bhartā patirvaraḥ kāntaḥ pariṇetā priyo gṛhī // Rajni_18.6
GS40rajnighu:5724: bhāryā patnī priyā jāyā dārāśca gṛhiṇī ca sā // Rajni_18.7
GS40rajnighu:5726: ṣaṇḍḥaḥ paṇḍaśca nārī tu poṭā strīpuṃsalakṣaṇā // Rajni_18.8
GS40rajnighu:5727: atha rājñī ca paṭṭārhā mahiṣī rājavallabhā // Rajni_18.9
GS40rajnighu:5728: bhoginyo 'nyā vilāsinyaḥ saṃbhuṅkte yāstu pārthivaḥ // Rajni_18.10
GS40rajnighu:5729: rājabhogyāḥ sumukhyo yāstā bhaṭṭinya iti smṛtāḥ // Rajni_18.11
GS40rajnighu:5730: veśyā tu gaṇikā bhogyā vārastrī smaradīpikā // Rajni_18.12
GS40rajnighu:5731: brahmā tu brāhmaṇo vipraḥ ṣaṭkarmā ca dvijottamaḥ // Rajni_18.13
GS40rajnighu:5732: rājā tu sārvabhaumaḥ syāt pārthivaḥ kṣatriyo nṛpaḥ // Rajni_18.14
GS40rajnighu:5733: vaiśyastu vyavahartā viḍ vārttiko vāṇijo vaṇik // Rajni_18.15
GS40rajnighu:5734: śūdraḥ pajjaścaturthaḥ syāt dvijadāsa upāsakaḥ // Rajni_18.16
GS40rajnighu:5735: vipraḥ kṣatro vaiśyaśūdrau ca varṇāścatvāro'mī tatra pūrve dvijāḥ syuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5737: bālaḥ pāko'rbhako garbhaḥ potakaḥ pṛthukaḥ śiśuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5738: śāvo 'rbho bāliśo ḍimbho vaṭur māṇavako mataḥ // Rajni_18.18
GS40rajnighu:5740: ṣaḍbhistu māsaiḥ pṛthuko'bdataḥ śiśus tribhir vaṭur māṇavakaś ca saptabhiḥ // Rajni_18.19
GS40rajnighu:5742: yuvā pañcāśatā varṣair vṛddhaḥ syādata uttaraiḥ // Rajni_18.20
GS40rajnighu:5744: kaiśoram ā pañcadaśād yauvanaṃ tu tataḥ param // Rajni_18.21
GS40rajnighu:5745: yuvā vayaḥsthas taruṇo vṛddhastu sthaviro jaran /
GS40rajnighu:5746: pravayā yātayāmaśca jīno jīrṇaś ca jarjaraḥ // Rajni_18.22
GS40rajnighu:5747: bālottānaśayā ḍimbhā stanapā ca stanaṃdhayī // Rajni_18.23
GS40rajnighu:5748: kanyā kumārī gaurī tu nagnikānāgatārtavā // Rajni_18.24
GS40rajnighu:5749: sā madhyamā vayaḥsthā ca yuvatī sustanī ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:5750: ciraṇṭī suvayāḥ śyāmā prauḍhā dṛṣṭarajāśca sā // Rajni_18.25
GS40rajnighu:5751: gurviṇyāpannasattvā syād antarvatnī ca garbhiṇī // Rajni_18.26
GS40rajnighu:5752: niṣphalā jaratī vṛddhā sthavirā ca gatārtavā // Rajni_18.27
GS40rajnighu:5753: puṣpitā malinā mlānā pāṃśulā ca rajasvalā // Rajni_18.28
GS40rajnighu:5755: tanus tanūḥ saṃhananaṃ śarīraṃ kalevaraṃ kṣetravapuḥpurāṇi /
GS40rajnighu:5756: gātraṃ ca mūrtir ghanakāyadehāv aṣṭāṅgapīḍāni ca vigrahaś ca // Rajni_18.30
GS40rajnighu:5758: śiraḥ śīrṣakamuṇḍaṃ ca mūrdhā mauliśca mastakam /
GS40rajnighu:5759: varāṅgam uttamāṅgaṃ ca kapālaṃ keśabhṛt smṛtam // Rajni_18.32
GS40rajnighu:5760: keśāḥ śirasijā vālāḥ kuntalā mūrdhajāḥ kacāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5761: cikurāḥ karuhāś cātha tadveṣṭāḥ kavarīmukhāḥ // Rajni_18.33
GS40rajnighu:5763: īkṣaṇaṃ grahaṇaṃ cākṣi darśanaṃ ca vilocanam // Rajni_18.34
GS40rajnighu:5765: tayormadhyagatā tārā bimbinī ca kanīnikā // Rajni_18.35
GS40rajnighu:5766: bhālaṃ lalāṭamalikaṃ kathayanti godhir bhrūś cillikā ca nayanordhvagaromarājiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5767: madhyaṃ tayorbhavati kūrcamatha śrutistu śrotaḥ śravaḥ śravaṇakarṇavacograhāśca // Rajni_18.36
GS40rajnighu:5769: tayorubhayato deśau yau prāntau sṛkkaṇī ca tau // Rajni_18.37
GS40rajnighu:5770: ghrāṇaṃ gandhavaho ghoṇā siṅghiṇī nāsikā ca sā // Rajni_18.38
GS40rajnighu:5771: śaṅkhaḥ karṇasamīpaḥ syāt śiṅghāṇaṃ nāsikāmale // Rajni_18.39
GS40rajnighu:5772: tuṇḍamāsyaṃ mukhaṃ vaktraṃ vadanaṃ lapanānane // Rajni_18.40
GS40rajnighu:5773: oṣṭhādharastu cibukaṃ gaṇḍo gallaḥ kapolakaḥ // Rajni_18.41
GS40rajnighu:5774: hanūs tadūrdhvaṃ daśanāśca dantā dvijā radāste radanāstathoktāḥ // Rajni_18.42
GS40rajnighu:5775: jihvā rasajñā rasanā ca soktā syātkākudaṃ tālu ca tālukaṃ ca // Rajni_18.43
GS40rajnighu:5776: tadūrdhvaṃ sūkṣmajihvā yā ghaṇṭikā lambikā ca sā // Rajni_18.44
GS40rajnighu:5779: grīvā ca kaṃdharā kaṃdhiḥ śirodhiśca śirodharā // Rajni_18.47
GS40rajnighu:5780: kaṇṭho galo nigālo'tha ghaṇṭikā galaśuṇṭhikā // Rajni_18.48
GS40rajnighu:5781: dhamanī tu śirāṃse tu skandho'dhaḥśikharaṃ tathā // Rajni_18.49
GS40rajnighu:5782: tasya saṃdhis tu jatru syātkakṣā dormūlasaṃjñakā // Rajni_18.50
GS40rajnighu:5784: dor doṣā ca praveṣṭaśca bāhurbāhā bhujo bhujā // Rajni_18.52
GS40rajnighu:5785: pāṇis tu pañcaśākhaḥ syāt karo hastaḥ śayastathā // Rajni_18.53
GS40rajnighu:5786: karamūle maṇibandho bhujamadhye kūrparaḥ kaphoṇiśca // Rajni_18.54
GS40rajnighu:5787: tasmādadhaḥ prakoṣṭhaḥ pragaṇḍakaḥ kūrparāṃsamadhyaṃ syāt // Rajni_18.55
GS40rajnighu:5788: aṅgulyaḥ karaśākhāḥ syuḥ pradeśinyāṃ tu tarjanī /
GS40rajnighu:5789: paruḥ syādaṅgulīsaṃdhiḥ parvasaṃdhiś ca kathyate // Rajni_18.56
GS40rajnighu:5791: kaniṣṭhā ceti pañca syuḥ krameṇāṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ // Rajni_18.57
GS40rajnighu:5797: stanāgraṃ cūcukaṃ vṛttaṃ śikhā stanamukhaṃ ca tat // Rajni_18.61
GS40rajnighu:5798: vakṣo vatsamuraḥ kroḍo hṛdayaṃ hṛdbhujāntaram // Rajni_18.62
GS40rajnighu:5799: kukṣiḥ piciṇḍo jaṭharaṃ tundaṃ syādudaraṃ ca tat // Rajni_18.63
GS40rajnighu:5800: jīvasthānaṃ tu marma syātkaṭiprānte trikaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_18.64
GS40rajnighu:5802: vastiśca vātaśīrṣaṃ syād garbhasthānaṃ ca tat striyāḥ // Rajni_18.65
GS40rajnighu:5803: garbhāśayo jarāyuśca garbhādhāraśca ca smṛtaḥ // Rajni_18.66
GS40rajnighu:5805: pakvāśayo hy adho nābhervastirmūtrāśayaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_18.68
GS40rajnighu:5810: kaṭiprothau sphicau pāyur gudāpānaṃ tadāsanam // Rajni_18.71
GS40rajnighu:5811: gudamuṣkadvayormadhye yo bhāgaḥ sa bhagaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_18.72
GS40rajnighu:5813: śiśnaṃ śephaśca liṅgaṃ ca meḍhraṃ sādhanamehane // Rajni_18.74
GS40rajnighu:5815: ūrū tu sakthinī śroṇisakthnoḥ saṃdhis tu vaṅkṣaṇaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5817: jaṅghā tu prasṛtā jñeyā tanmadhye piṇḍikā tathā // Rajni_18.77
GS40rajnighu:5818: jaṅghāṅghrisaṃdhigranthau tu ghuṭikā gulpha ityapi // Rajni_18.78
GS40rajnighu:5819: gulphasyādhastu pārṣṇiḥ syāt padāgraṃ prapadaṃ matam // Rajni_18.79
GS40rajnighu:5820: vikramaścaraṇaḥ pādaḥ pādāṅghriś ca padaṃ kramaḥ // Rajni_18.80
GS40rajnighu:5822: karo bhavet saṃhitavistṛtāṅgulas talaś capeṭaḥ pratalaḥ prahastakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5823: muṣṭirbhavet saṃhṛtapiṇḍitāṅgulāv ākuñcito 'gre prasṛtaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Rajni_18.82
GS40rajnighu:5824: syāt tarjanī madhyamikā tv anāmikā kaniṣṭhikāṅguṣṭhayutā yadā tadā /
GS40rajnighu:5825: prādeśatālābhidhagosravas tathā vitastir atyartham iha kramādiyam // Rajni_18.83
GS40rajnighu:5826: hastas tu vistṛte pāṇāv ā madhyāṅgulikūrparam // Rajni_18.84
GS40rajnighu:5827: baddhamuṣṭau saratniḥ syād aratnir akaniṣṭhakaḥ // Rajni_18.85
GS40rajnighu:5829: ūrdhvaṃ vistṛtadoṣpāṇir nṛmānaṃ pauruṣaṃ viduḥ // Rajni_18.86
GS40rajnighu:5830: jīvasthānaṃ tu marma syājjīvāgāraṃ tad ucyate // Rajni_18.87
GS40rajnighu:5833: vaidyāḥ śarekṣaṇamitāni vadanti marmasthānāni cāṅgagatināśakarāṇi martye // Rajni_18.89
GS40rajnighu:5834: lālā bhavenmukhasrāvaḥ sṛṇikā syandinī ca sā // Rajni_18.90
GS40rajnighu:5835: svedo gharmaśca gharmāmbho dūṣikā netrayormalam // Rajni_18.91
GS40rajnighu:5836: malaṃ viṣṭhā purīṣaṃ ca viṭ kiṭṭaṃ pūtikaṃ ca tat /
GS40rajnighu:5837: mūtraṃ tu guhyaniṣyandaḥ prasrāvaḥ sravaṇaṃ sravaḥ // Rajni_18.92
GS40rajnighu:5838: valī carmataraṃgaḥ syāt tvagūrmis tvaktaraṃgakaḥ // Rajni_18.93
GS40rajnighu:5839: palitaṃ ca jarā lakṣma keśaśauklyaṃ ca tadbhavet // Rajni_18.94
GS40rajnighu:5841: śarīrasthairyadāḥ samyak vijñeyāḥ sapta dhātavaḥ // Rajni_18.95
GS40rajnighu:5845: śoṇitaṃ lohitaṃ cāsṛk śoṇaṃ lohaṃ ca carmajam // Rajni_18.97
GS40rajnighu:5846: māṃsaṃ tu piśitaṃ kravyaṃ palaṃ tu rasyam asrajam /
GS40rajnighu:5847: palalaṃ jāṅgalaṃ kīram āmiṣaṃ ca tad ucyate // Rajni_18.98
GS40rajnighu:5848: medas tu māṃsasāraḥ syānmāṃsasneho vasā vapā // Rajni_18.99
GS40rajnighu:5849: medojam asthidhātuḥ syāt kulyaṃ kīkasakaṃ ca tat // Rajni_18.100
GS40rajnighu:5850: asthisāras tu majjā syāt tejo bījaṃ tathāsthijam /
GS40rajnighu:5852: śukraṃ puṃstvaṃ reto bījaṃ vīryaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ kathitam /
GS40rajnighu:5853: indriyamannavikāro majjaraso harṣaṇaṃ balaṃ caiva // Rajni_18.102
GS40rajnighu:5855: asthno majjā tataḥ śukram ittham eṣāṃ janikramaḥ // Rajni_18.103
GS40rajnighu:5856: tilakaṃ kloma mastiṣkaṃ snehas tu mastakodbhavaḥ // Rajni_18.104
GS40rajnighu:5857: antraṃ purī tad ākhyātaṃ plīhā gulma iti smṛtaḥ // Rajni_18.105
GS40rajnighu:5861: tantukī jīvitajñā ca nāḍī siṃhī ca kīrtitā // Rajni_18.107
GS40rajnighu:5862: kaṇḍarā tu mahāsnāyurmahānāḍī ca sā smṛtā // Rajni_18.108
GS40rajnighu:5864: srotāṃsi khāni chidrāṇi kālakhaṇḍaṃ yakṛnmatam // Rajni_18.109
GS40rajnighu:5865: śiro'sthi tu karoṭiḥ syāt śirastrāṇaṃ tu śīrṣakam /
GS40rajnighu:5866: tat khaṇḍaṃ kharparaṃ prāhuḥ kapālaṃ ca tad īritam // Rajni_18.110
GS40rajnighu:5867: pṛṣṭhāsthi tu kaseruḥ syātśākhāsthi nalakaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_18.111
GS40rajnighu:5869: ātmā śarīrī kṣetrajñaḥ pudgalaḥ prāṇa īśvaraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5870: jīvo vibhuḥ pumānīśaḥ sarvajñaḥ śambhuravyayaḥ // Rajni_18.113
GS40rajnighu:5873: mānasaṃ hṛdayaṃ svāntaṃ cittaṃ ceto manaśca hṛt // Rajni_18.116
GS40rajnighu:5874: sattvaṃ rajastamaśceti proktāḥ puṃsas trayo guṇāḥ // Rajni_18.117
GS40rajnighu:5875: śrotraṃ tvagrasanā netraṃ nāsā cetyakṣapañcakam // Rajni_18.118
GS40rajnighu:5876: akṣaṃ hṛṣīkaṃ karaṇaṃ varhaṇaṃ viṣayīndriyam // Rajni_18.119
GS40rajnighu:5877: śabdaḥ sparśo raso rūpaṃ gandhaś ca viṣayā amī /
GS40rajnighu:5880: krameṇa pañca bhūtāni kīrtitāni manīṣibhiḥ // Rajni_18.121
GS40rajnighu:5882: vargaḥ kṛtastu bhiṣajāṃ bahudehadoṣanāmā nidānagaṇanirṇayadhīniveśaḥ // Rajni_18.122
GS40rajnighu:5884: naraharikṛtināyaṃ nirmite yāti nāmapracayamukuṭaratne śāntimaṣṭādaśāṅkaḥ // Rajni_18.123
GS40rajnighu:5887: siṃhaḥ pañcamukho nakhī mṛgapatirmānī hariḥ kesarī kravyādo nakharāyudho mṛgaripuḥ śūraśca kaṇṭhīravaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5888: vikrānto dviradāntako bahubalo dīpto balī vikramī haryakṣaḥ sa ca dīptapiṅgala iti khyāto mṛgendraśca saḥ // Rajni_19.1
GS40rajnighu:5892: tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraḥ puṇḍarīko dvīpī bhīrur nakhāyudhaḥ // Rajni_19.3
GS40rajnighu:5894: śūraś ca kṣudraśārdūlaś citravyāghraś ca sa smṛtaḥ // Rajni_19.4
GS40rajnighu:5895: ṛkṣo bhallūko 'tha bhallaḥ saśalyo durghoṣaḥ syāt bhallakaḥ pṛṣṭhadṛṣṭiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5896: drāghiṣṭhaḥ syāt dīrghakeśaś cirāyur jñeyaḥ so 'yaṃ duścaro dīrghadarśī // Rajni_19.5
GS40rajnighu:5897: mṛgādastu sa vijñeyas tarakṣur ghoradarśanaḥ // Rajni_19.6
GS40rajnighu:5898: śivā tu bhūrimāyaḥ syāt gomāyur mṛgadhūrtakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5906: śūraḥ śuniḥ śayāluśca bhaṣaḥ śaradikāmukaḥ // Rajni_19.10
GS40rajnighu:5917: sa bālaḥ kalabho jñeyo durdānto vyāla ucyate /
GS40rajnighu:5918: prabhinno garjito bhrānto matto madakalaśca saḥ // Rajni_19.16
GS40rajnighu:5919: ibhī tu kariṇī jñeyā hastinī dhenukā vaśā /
GS40rajnighu:5920: kareṇuḥ padminī caiva mātaṃgī vāsitā ca sā // Rajni_19.17
GS40rajnighu:5922: gaṇḍako vajracarmā ca khaḍgī vārdhrīṇasaś ca saḥ // Rajni_19.18
GS40rajnighu:5923: uṣṭro dīrghagatir balī ca karabho dāserako dhūsaro lamboṣṭho lavaṇaḥ kramelakamahājaṅghau ca bījāṅghrikaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5924: dīrghaḥ śṛṅkhalako mahān atha mahāgrīvo mahāṅgo mahānādaḥ so 'pi mahādhvagaḥ sa ca mahāpṛṣṭho baliṣṭhaś ca saḥ // Rajni_19.19
GS40rajnighu:5928: lulāpakāntā kaluṣā turaṃgadveṣiṇī ca sā // Rajni_19.21
GS40rajnighu:5929: gaus tu bhadro balīvardo damyo dāntaḥ sthiro balī /
GS40rajnighu:5930: ukṣānaḍvān kakudmān syādṛṣabho vṛṣabho vṛṣaḥ // Rajni_19.22
GS40rajnighu:5933: vṛṣabhastu vṛṣaḥ prokto mahokṣaḥ puṃgavo balī /
GS40rajnighu:5934: gonātha ukṣā ṛṣabho gopriyo gopatiśca saḥ // Rajni_19.24
GS40rajnighu:5937: vinītaḥ śikṣito dānto dhuryo voḍhā ca dhaurikaḥ // Rajni_19.26
GS40rajnighu:5938: bālo vatsataraḥ prokto durdānto gaḍir ucyate // Rajni_19.27
GS40rajnighu:5939: gaur mātosrā śṛṅgiṇī saurabheyī māheyī syādrohiṇī dhenuraghnyā /
GS40rajnighu:5940: dogdhrī bhadrā bhūrimatyānaḍuhyau kalyāṇī syātpāvanī cārjunī ca // Rajni_19.28
GS40rajnighu:5941: vanagaur gavayaḥ prokto balabhadro mahāgavaḥ // Rajni_19.29
GS40rajnighu:5942: gavayī vanadhenuḥ syātsaiva bhillagavī matā // Rajni_19.30
GS40rajnighu:5944: tasya strī camarī proktā dīrghabālā giripriyā // Rajni_19.31
GS40rajnighu:5945: varāhaḥ stabdharomā ca romaśaḥ śūkaraḥ kiriḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5946: vakradaṃṣṭraḥ kiṭir daṃṣṭrī kroḍo dantāyudho balī // Rajni_19.32
GS40rajnighu:5948: kolaḥ potrāyudhaḥ śūro bahvapatyo radāyudhaḥ // Rajni_19.33
GS40rajnighu:5950: grāmyakroḍo grāmyakolo viṣṭhāśī dārakaśca saḥ // Rajni_19.34
GS40rajnighu:5952: vāho vājī mudgabhojī vītiḥ saptiśca saindhavaḥ // Rajni_19.35
GS40rajnighu:5956: sāmrāṇaśephakamukhā api deśataḥ syur varṇena te 'pi ca punarbahudhā bhavanti // Rajni_19.37
GS40rajnighu:5957: śvetaḥ karkaḥ so 'tha raktastu śoṇo haimaḥ kṛṣṇo nīlavarṇastu nīlaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5958: śubhrairnetrairmallikākṣo nidiṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇairuktaḥ so 'yam indrāyudhākhyaḥ // Rajni_19.38
GS40rajnighu:5959: itthaṃ nānāvarṇabhedena vājī jñātavyo 'yaṃ lokarūḍhaiḥ sudhībhiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5960: atrāsmābhirna prapañcaḥ kṛto'smādājāneyo 'pyatra vājī kulīnaḥ // Rajni_19.39
GS40rajnighu:5962: vājinī vaḍabā cāpi prasūraśvāśvinī ca sā // Rajni_19.41
GS40rajnighu:5967: ajo bukkaśca medhyaḥ syāllambakarṇaḥ paśuśca saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5968: chāgalo barkaraś chāgastubho bastaḥ payasvalaḥ // Rajni_19.44
GS40rajnighu:5969: ajā payasvinī bhīruśchāgī medhyā galastanī // Rajni_19.45
GS40rajnighu:5970: meṣo bheḍo huḍo meṇḍhraḥ ūrṇāyur uraṇastathā /
GS40rajnighu:5971: eḍakaḥ śṛṅgiṇo 'viḥ syādurabhro romaśo balī // Rajni_19.46
GS40rajnighu:5976: anyaśca bhāraśṛṅgaḥ syāt mahāśṛṅgo vanapriyaḥ // Rajni_19.49
GS40rajnighu:5981: vānaro markaṭaḥ kīśaḥ kapiḥ śākhāmṛgo hariḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5982: plavaṃgamo vanaukāśca plavaṃgaḥ plavagaḥ plavaḥ // Rajni_19.52
GS40rajnighu:5983: golāṅgūlastu gaurākhyaḥ kapiḥ kṛṣṇamukho hi saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5985: śalyakaḥ syāt śalyamṛgo vajraśuktir bileśayaḥ // Rajni_19.54
GS40rajnighu:5986: śalyo'nyaḥ śvāvidityuktaḥ śalī ca śalalī ca saḥ // Rajni_19.55
GS40rajnighu:5987: śalyalomni tu vijñeyā śalalī śalalaṃ śalam // Rajni_19.56
GS40rajnighu:5989: jñeyaś camarapucchaś ca lomaśo dhūmravarṇakaḥ // Rajni_19.57
GS40rajnighu:5994: pannago vāyubhakṣaśca bhogī syājjihmagaśca saḥ // Rajni_19.60
GS40rajnighu:5995: sarpo daṃṣṭrī bhujaṃgo 'hir bhujagaś ca sarīsṛpaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5996: kañcukī dīrghapucchaś ca dvijhvi uragaśca saḥ // Rajni_19.61
GS40rajnighu:5997: phaṇino dhavalāṅgā ye te nāgā iti kīrtitāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6000: kuliko harito jñeyo rājilaṃ ḍuṇḍubhaṃ viduḥ // Rajni_19.64
GS40rajnighu:6002: karkoṭaḥ kulikaḥ śaṅkha ityamī nāganāyakāḥ // Rajni_19.65
GS40rajnighu:6004: āpahṛt dvimukhī caiva dhāmiṇītyādayaḥ pare // Rajni_19.67
GS40rajnighu:6006: khanako bilakārī ca dhānyāriśca bahuprajaḥ // Rajni_19.68
GS40rajnighu:6008: mahāṅgaḥ sasyamārī ca bhūphalo bhittipātanaḥ // Rajni_19.69
GS40rajnighu:6011: godhā tu godhikā jñeyā dārumatsyāhvayā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:6013: godhājaḥ syāttu gaudheyo gaudhāro godhikāsutaḥ // Rajni_19.72
GS40rajnighu:6016: brāhmaṇī gṛhagodhā ca supadī raktapucchikā // Rajni_19.74
GS40rajnighu:6020: kāmarūpī virūpī ca bilavāsaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Rajni_19.76
GS40rajnighu:6021: pallī tu musalī proktā gṛhagodhā gṛhālikā /
GS40rajnighu:6022: jyeṣṭhā ca kuḍyamatsyā ca pallikā gṛhagodhikā // Rajni_19.77
GS40rajnighu:6024: hālāhalā tv añjalikā girikā bālamūṣikā // Rajni_19.79
GS40rajnighu:6025: vṛścikaḥ śūkakīṭaḥ syād alidroṇaś ca vṛścike // Rajni_19.80
GS40rajnighu:6027: pipīlakaḥ pipīlaśca strīsaṃjñā ca pipīlikā // Rajni_19.82
GS40rajnighu:6029: kṛṣṇānyā ca pipīlī tu sthūlā vṛkṣaruhā ca sā // Rajni_19.84
GS40rajnighu:6032: tatrātikrūrakarmā yaḥ sa jalavyāla ucyate // Rajni_19.86
GS40rajnighu:6036: pāṭhīnaḥ śakulaś caiva nadyāvartaśca rohitaḥ // Rajni_19.88
GS40rajnighu:6041: śiśukaḥ śiśumāraḥ syātsa ca grāho varāhakaḥ // Rajni_19.91
GS40rajnighu:6046: saṃdaṃśakaḥ paṅkavāsas tiryaggāmī sa cordhvadṛk // Rajni_19.94
GS40rajnighu:6047: maṇḍūko darduro maṇḍo harir bhekaśca lūlakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6048: śālūraḥ sa ca varṣābhūḥ plavaḥ kaṭuravastathā /
GS40rajnighu:6049: samīḍanyaśca muṇḍī ca plavaṃgaśca plavaṃgamaḥ // Rajni_19.95
GS40rajnighu:6054: jalakākastu dātyūhaḥ sa ca syāt kālakaṇṭhakaḥ // Rajni_19.98
GS40rajnighu:6057: jale'pi te ca tāvanto jñātavyā jalapūrvakāḥ // Rajni_19.100
GS40rajnighu:6061: śakuntaḥ patagaḥ picchan pataṃgo vikiraśca saḥ // Rajni_19.102
GS40rajnighu:6064: śyenaḥ śaśādaḥ kravyādaḥ krūro vegī khagāntakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6069: kaṅkas tu lohapṛṣṭhaḥ syāt saṃdaṃśavadanaḥ kharaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6070: raṇālaṃkaraṇaḥ krūraḥ sa ca syādāmiṣapriyaḥ // Rajni_19.107
GS40rajnighu:6079: valgulī vaktraviṣṭhā sā divāndhā ca niśācarī /
GS40rajnighu:6080: svairiṇī ca divāsvāpā māṃseṣṭā mātṛvāhinī // Rajni_19.112
GS40rajnighu:6083: dināndhā naktabhojī ca bhrāmaṇī karṇikāhvayā // Rajni_19.113
GS40rajnighu:6085: meghānandī kalāpī ca śikhaṇḍī citrapicchakaḥ // Rajni_19.114
GS40rajnighu:6089: pracalākaḥ śikhā jñeyā dhvaniḥ keketi kathyate // Rajni_19.116
GS40rajnighu:6090: kuraraḥ kharaśabdaḥ kruṅ krauñcaḥ paṅkticaraḥ kharaḥ // Rajni_19.117
GS40rajnighu:6092: bakaḥ kaṅko bakoṭaśca tīrthasevī ca tāpasaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6093: mīnaghātī mṛṣādhyānī niścalāṅghriś ca dāmbhikaḥ // Rajni_19.119
GS40rajnighu:6094: śakunī potakī śyāmā pāṇḍavī śvetapakṣiṇī // Rajni_19.120
GS40rajnighu:6095: durgā bhagavatī caiva saivoktā satyapāṇḍavī // Rajni_19.121
GS40rajnighu:6096: balākā viṣakaṇṭhī syāt śuṣkāṅgī dīrghakaṃdharā // Rajni_19.122
GS40rajnighu:6098: cakraḥ kokaścakravāko rathāṅgo bhūripremā dvaṃdvacārī sahāyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6099: kāntaḥ kāmī rātriviśleṣagāmī rāmāvakṣojopamaḥ kāmukaśca // Rajni_19.124
GS40rajnighu:6108: sarājī rājimantaśca jalasarpaḥ sa dundubhiḥ // Rajni_19.130
GS40rajnighu:6109: dvivigoḍo nisaś caiva citrī śalpī ca gomukhaḥ // Rajni_19.131
GS40rajnighu:6110: anye ca plavagā ye ye te sarve kṣudrasārasāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6112: haṃso dhavalapakṣī syāt cakrāṅgo mānasālayaḥ // Rajni_19.133
GS40rajnighu:6114: eteṣu cañcucaraṇeṣvaruṇeṣu rājahaṃso'pi dhūsaratareṣu ca mallikākṣaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6115: kāleṣu teṣu dhavalaḥ kila dhārtarāṣṭraḥ so 'pyeṣa dhūsaratanustu bhaved abhavyaḥ // Rajni_19.135
GS40rajnighu:6116: haṃsī tu varaṭā jñeyā varalā vāralā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:6123: raktekṣaṇo madanamohanavāgvilāsī kaṇṭhīravo gṛhakapotaka eṣa uktaḥ // Rajni_19.139
GS40rajnighu:6125: jalapārāvataḥ kāmī jñeyo galaravaśca saḥ // Rajni_19.141
GS40rajnighu:6126: kokilaḥ parapuṣṭaḥ syāt kālaḥ parabhṛtaḥ pikaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6130: kokilā tv anyapuṣṭā syānmattā parabhṛtā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:6132: vasantadūtī tāmrākṣī pikī sā ca kuhūravā /
GS40rajnighu:6133: vāsantī kāmagā caiva gandharvā vanabhūṣaṇī // Rajni_19.145
GS40rajnighu:6134: śukaḥ kīro raktatuṇḍo medhāvī mañjupāṭhakaḥ // Rajni_19.146
GS40rajnighu:6135: anyo rājaśukaḥ prājñaḥ śatapattro nṛpapriyaḥ // Rajni_19.147
GS40rajnighu:6136: sārikā madhurālāpā dūtī medhāvinī ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:6137: kavarī kutsitāṅgī ca kaṣkalāṅgī ca śārikā // Rajni_19.148
GS40rajnighu:6139: paṭhantī pāṭhavārtā ca buddhimatī bhūsārikā // Rajni_19.149
GS40rajnighu:6144: dhūsarī piṅgalā sūcī bhairavī yoginī jayā /
GS40rajnighu:6145: kumārī suvicitrā ca mātā koṭaravāsinī // Rajni_19.153
GS40rajnighu:6147: bhṛṅgaḥ kuliṅgo dhūmyāṭo dārvāghātaḥ śatacchadaḥ // Rajni_19.155
GS40rajnighu:6151: cāṣaḥ kikīdiviḥ prokto nīlāṅgaḥ puṇyadarśanaḥ // Rajni_19.157
GS40rajnighu:6152: vartako vartiko vartir gāñjikāyaśca kathyate // Rajni_19.158
GS40rajnighu:6154: caṭakā kalaviṅkī syāt cāṭakairastu tatsutaḥ // Rajni_19.160
GS40rajnighu:6159: lāvā tu lāvakaḥ prokto lāvaḥ sa ca lavaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_19.163
GS40rajnighu:6160: tittiris tittiraś caiva taittiro yājuṣo giriḥ // Rajni_19.164
GS40rajnighu:6161: kṛṣṇo 'nyas tittiriḥ śūraḥ subhūtiḥ paripālakaḥ // Rajni_19.165
GS40rajnighu:6165: śyāmā varāhī śakunī kumārī durgā ca devī caṭakā ca kṛṣṇā /
GS40rajnighu:6166: syātpotakī pāṇḍavikā ca vāmā sā kālikā syāt sitabimbinī ca // Rajni_19.167
GS40rajnighu:6168: tailinī tailakīṭaḥ syāt ṣaḍbimbā dadrunāśinī // Rajni_19.169
GS40rajnighu:6174: varvaṇā makṣikā nīlā saraghā madhumakṣikā // Rajni_19.173
GS40rajnighu:6175: gandholī varaṭā kṣudrā krūrā syāt kṣudravarvaṇā /
GS40rajnighu:6178: daṃśo duṣṭamukhaḥ krūraḥ kṣudrikā vanamakṣikā // Rajni_19.175
GS40rajnighu:6179: makṣikā tv amṛtotpannā vamanī cāpalā ca sā // Rajni_19.176
GS40rajnighu:6181: rātrijāgarado dhūmro nīlābhras tv anyajātayaḥ // Rajni_19.177
GS40rajnighu:6182: aṣṭāṅghrir aṣṭapādaśca gṛhavāsī ca kṛṣṇakaḥ // Rajni_19.178
GS40rajnighu:6185: yūkā tu keśakīṭaḥ syāt svedajaḥ ṣaṭpadaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_19.180
GS40rajnighu:6186: pakṣmajā pakṣmayūkā syātsūkṣmā ṣaṭcaraṇāpi sā // Rajni_19.181
GS40rajnighu:6189: tatra tatra budhairjñeyaḥ sa sarvaḥ kīṭasaṃjñakaḥ // Rajni_19.183
GS40rajnighu:6191: kṛśāṅgī tāmasī śūrā kīribhārā mahābalā // Rajni_19.184
GS40rajnighu:6196: kīṭā iti kathitāḥ navadhātra tiryañcaḥ // Rajni_19.187
GS40rajnighu:6198: buddhyā samyak cābhisaṃdhāya dhīmān vaidyaḥ kuryānmāṃsavargaprayogam // Rajni_19.188
GS40rajnighu:6199: yenebhāsyapitā mṛgāṅkamukuṭaḥ śārdūlacarmāmbaraḥ sarpālaṃkaraṇaḥ supuṅgavagatiḥ pañcānano'bhyarcyate /
GS40rajnighu:6200: tasya śrīnṛharīśituḥ khalu kṛtāv ekonaviṃśo 'bhidhācūḍāpīṭhamaṇāv agād avasitiṃ siṃhādivargo mahān // Rajni_19.189
GS40rajnighu:6208: śophaḥ śothastu śvayathuḥ kāsaḥ kṣavathurucyate // Rajni_20.3
GS40rajnighu:6209: kṣutaṃ tu kṣavathuḥ kṣucca pratiśyāyastu pīnasaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6212: kuṣṭhaṃ tu puṇḍarīkaḥ syāt śvitraṃ tu carmacitrakam // Rajni_20.5
GS40rajnighu:6213: kilāsasidhme ca śikhī śvāsaḥ pāmā vicarcikā /
GS40rajnighu:6216: pītasphoṭe tu pāmā ca kṣudrasphoṭe tu kañcikā // Rajni_20.7
GS40rajnighu:6218: visphoṭaḥ sphoṭakaḥ sphoṭaḥ keśaghnas tv indraluptakaḥ // Rajni_20.8
GS40rajnighu:6219: galaśuṇḍī tu śuṇḍā syād galagaṇḍo galastanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6222: paktiśūlaṃ tu śūlaṃ syāt pākajaṃ pariṇāmajam // Rajni_20.10
GS40rajnighu:6223: lūtā carmavraṇo vṛkkaṃ nāḍī nāḍīvraṇo bhavet /
GS40rajnighu:6226: arśāṃsi gudakīlāḥ syur durnāmāni gudāṅkurāḥ // Rajni_20.12
GS40rajnighu:6229: hṛdrogo hṛdgado hṛdrug utprāṇaḥ śvāsa ucyate /
GS40rajnighu:6230: jvarastu sa jvarātaṅko rogaśreṣṭho mahāgadaḥ // Rajni_20.14
GS40rajnighu:6237: mūrchā tu moho mūḍhiś ca svarasādaḥ svarakṣayaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6240: kṛcchraṃ tu mūtrakṛcchraṃ syāt mūtrarodho 'śmarī ca sā // Rajni_20.19
GS40rajnighu:6242: kampastu vepanaṃ vepaḥ kampanaṃ vepathustathā // Rajni_20.20
GS40rajnighu:6243: jṛmbhā tu jṛmbhikā jambhā jṛmbhaṇaṃ jambhikā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:6244: ālasyaṃ mandatā māndyaṃ kāryapradveṣa ityapi // Rajni_20.21
GS40rajnighu:6249: vidradhiḥ syādvidaraṇaṃ hṛdgranthir hṛdvraṇaś ca saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6250: vraṇo bhagapradeśe yaḥ sa bhagaṃdaranāmakaḥ // Rajni_20.24
GS40rajnighu:6252: ittham anye'pi boddhavyā bhiṣagbhir dehato gadāḥ // Rajni_20.25
GS40rajnighu:6253: saṃtāpaḥ saṃjvarastāpaḥ śoṣa uṣmā ca kathyate /
GS40rajnighu:6254: yaścāpi koṣṭhasaṃtāpaḥ so 'ntardāha iti smṛtaḥ // Rajni_20.26
GS40rajnighu:6257: tandrā tu viṣayājñānaṃ pramīlā tandrikā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:6266: abhyānto'bhyamito rugnaś cāmayāvyapaṭuś ca saḥ // Rajni_20.32
GS40rajnighu:6269: utsāhī dvijadevabheṣajabhiṣagbhakto'pi pathye rato dhīro dharmaparāyaṇaḥ priyavacā mānī mṛdurmānadaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6270: viśvāsī ṛjur āstikaḥ sucarito dātā dayāluḥ śucir yaḥ syāt kāmam avañcakaḥ sa vikṛto mucyeta mṛtyorapi // Rajni_20.34
GS40rajnighu:6272: nigraho vedanāniṣṭhā kriyā copakramaḥ samāḥ // Rajni_20.35
GS40rajnighu:6274: āyuryogo gadārātir amṛtaṃ ca taducyate // Rajni_20.36
GS40rajnighu:6278: cūrṇaṃ tu vastubhiḥ kṣuṇṇaiḥ kaṣāyaḥ kvathitaistu taiḥ // Rajni_20.38
GS40rajnighu:6279: taiḥ pakvair avalehaḥ syātkalko madhvādimarditaiḥ // Rajni_20.39
GS40rajnighu:6281: dīpanastarpaṇaḥ śoṣa iti saptavidhāḥ smṛtāḥ // Rajni_20.40
GS40rajnighu:6287: vilambya ca krāmaṇam etad īritaṃ rātrau punaḥ pācanam etad ūcire // Rajni_20.43
GS40rajnighu:6288: ātmanīnaṃ tu pathyaṃ syādāyuṣyaṃ ca hitaṃ ca tat // Rajni_20.44
GS40rajnighu:6291: agado nīrujo nirug anātaṅkaś ca kathyate // Rajni_20.46
GS40rajnighu:6293: rogajño jīvano vidvān āyurvedī cikitsakaḥ // Rajni_20.47
GS40rajnighu:6294: vipro vaidyakapāragaḥ śuciranūcānaḥ kulīnaḥ kṛtī dhīraḥ kālakalāvid āstikamatir dakṣaḥ sudhīr dhārmikaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6295: svācāraḥ samadṛgdayālur akhalo yaḥ siddhamantrakramaḥ śāntaḥ kāmamalolupaḥ kṛtayaśā vaidyaḥ sa vidyotate // Rajni_20.48
GS40rajnighu:6297: pañca vaidyā na yujyante dhanvantarisamā api // Rajni_20.49
GS40rajnighu:6298: pumarthāś catvāraḥ khalu karaṇasaukhyaikasubhagās tad etad bhaiṣajyānavarataniṣevaikavaśagam /
GS40rajnighu:6299: tadapyekāyattaṃ phaladam agadaṃkārakṛpayā tato loke loke na param upakartaivamamutaḥ // Rajni_20.50
GS40rajnighu:6300: rājāno vijigīṣayā nijabhujaprakrāntam ojodayāt śauryaṃ saṃgararaṅgasadmani yathā saṃbibhrate saṃgatāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6301: yasminnauṣadhayas tathā samuditāḥ sidhyanti vīryādhikā vipro 'sau bhiṣag ucyate svayamiti śrutyāpi satyāpitam // Rajni_20.51
GS40rajnighu:6303: yathāyathaṃ cauṣadhayo guṇottarāḥ pratyāharante yamagocarān api // Rajni_20.52
GS40rajnighu:6304: yena tvāṃ khanate brahmā yena tvāṃ khanate bhṛguḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6305: yenendro yena varuṇaḥ khanate yena keśavaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6306: tenāhaṃ tvāṃ khaniṣyāmi siddhiṃ kuru mahauṣadha // Rajni_20.53
GS40rajnighu:6307: vipraḥ paṭhann imaṃ mantraṃ prayatātmā mahauṣadhīm /
GS40rajnighu:6309: vīryaṃ prakāśya nijamoṣadhayaḥ kilocur anyonyam urvyapi divo bhuvamāvrajantyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6310: jīvaṃ mumūrṣam api yaṃ hi vayaṃ mahimnā svena stuvīmahi sa jātvapi naiva naśyet // Rajni_20.55
GS40rajnighu:6311: pratyāyitāḥ pramuditā muditena rājñā somena sākamidamoṣadhayaḥ samūcuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6312: yasmai dvijo diśati bheṣajamāśu rājan taṃ pālayāma iti ca śrutirāha sākṣāt // Rajni_20.56
GS40rajnighu:6313: āsāmīśo likhitapaṭhitaḥ sa dvijānāṃ hi rājā siddhyai yāśca dvijam avṛjinaṃ svāśrayaṃ kāmayante /
GS40rajnighu:6314: tāsvevānyaḥ prasarati madād yas tu jātyā ca gatyā hīnaḥ śūnyo jagati kupitāḥ pātayanty enam etāḥ // Rajni_20.57
GS40rajnighu:6316: vidyādrasāyanavaraṃ dṛḍhadehahetum āyuḥśruter dvicaturaṅgam ihāha śambhuḥ // Rajni_20.58
GS40rajnighu:6320: aṅgahīnaḥ sa vijñeyo na ślāghyo rājamandire // Rajni_20.60
GS40rajnighu:6321: prājño vijñaḥ paṇḍito dīrghadarśī dhīro dhīmān kovido labdhavarṇaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6322: doṣajñaḥ san dūradarśī manīṣī medhāvī jñaḥ sūrivijñau vipaścit // Rajni_20.61
GS40rajnighu:6324: kuśāgrīyamatiḥ kṛṣṭiḥ kuśalo viduro budhaḥ // Rajni_20.62
GS40rajnighu:6325: niṣṇātaḥ śikṣito dakṣaḥ sudīkṣaḥ kṛtadhīḥ sudhīḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6326: abhijño nipuṇo vidvān kṛtakarmā vicakṣaṇaḥ // Rajni_20.63
GS40rajnighu:6328: sumedhāḥ sumatistīkṣṇaḥ prekṣāvān vibudho vidan // Rajni_20.64
GS40rajnighu:6329: manīṣā dhiṣaṇā prajñā dhāraṇā śemuṣī matiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6330: dhīr buddhiḥ pratipat prekṣā pratipattiśca cetanā // Rajni_20.65
GS40rajnighu:6331: saṃvij jñaptiś copalabdhiś cinmedhā mananaṃ manaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6332: bhānaṃ bodhaśca hṛllekhaḥ saṃkhyā ca pratibhā ca sā // Rajni_20.66
GS40rajnighu:6335: maṇḍaḥ peyā vilepī ca yavāgūḥ pathyabhedakāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6339: pādāhāraṃ pathyamāhuśca vaidyā vidyād ardhāhāram āhārasaṃjñam /
GS40rajnighu:6342: andho bhissādanaṃ bhojyam annādyam aśanaṃ tathā // Rajni_20.71
GS40rajnighu:6343: bhojyaṃ peyaṃ tathā coṣyaṃ lehyaṃ khādyaṃ ca carvaṇam /
GS40rajnighu:6344: niṣpeyaṃ caiva bhakṣyaṃ syādannamaṣṭavidhaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_20.72
GS40rajnighu:6346: upadaṃśo vidaṃśaḥ syāt saṃdhāno rocakaśca saḥ // Rajni_20.73
GS40rajnighu:6348: balbhanam aśanaṃ svadanaṃ nighasāhārau ca nigaraṇaṃ nyādaḥ // Rajni_20.74
GS40rajnighu:6350: carvaṇaṃ pānapītī ca dhayanaṃ cūṣaṇaṃ bhidāḥ // Rajni_20.75
GS40rajnighu:6353: madhuraṃ laulyam ityāhur ikṣvādau ca sa lakṣyate // Rajni_20.77
GS40rajnighu:6354: lavaṇastu paṭuḥ proktaḥ saindhavādau sa dṛśyate // Rajni_20.78
GS40rajnighu:6356: kaṣāyastuvaraḥ proktaḥ sa tu pūgīphalādiṣu // Rajni_20.80
GS40rajnighu:6358: kaṭustu tīkṣṇasaṃjñaḥ syānmarīcādau sa cekṣyate // Rajni_20.82
GS40rajnighu:6362: atisevanato jarāṃ ca pittaṃ sitimānaṃ ca dadāti kuṣṭhakārī // Rajni_20.84
GS40rajnighu:6363: tikto jantūn hanti kuṣṭhaṃ jvarārtiṃ kāsaṃ dāhaṃ dīpano rocanaśca /
GS40rajnighu:6364: martyair gāḍhaṃ pratyahaṃ sevitaścettīvraṃ datte rājayakṣmāṇameṣaḥ // Rajni_20.85
GS40rajnighu:6365: kaṣāyanāmā niruṇaddhi śophaṃ varṇaṃ tanor dīpanapācanaśca /
GS40rajnighu:6366: sattvāpaho'sau śithilatvakārī niṣevitaḥ pāṇḍu karoti gātram // Rajni_20.86
GS40rajnighu:6367: amlābhidhaḥ prītikaro rucipradaḥ prapācano 'gneḥ paṭutāṃ ca yacchati /
GS40rajnighu:6368: bhrāntiṃ ca kuṣṭhaṃ kaphapāṇḍutāṃ ca kārṣṇyaṃ ca kāsaṃ kurute'tisevitaḥ // Rajni_20.87
GS40rajnighu:6370: eṣo'pi datte bahusevitaścet kṣayāvaho vīryabalakṣayaṃ ca // Rajni_20.88
GS40rajnighu:6371: kaṭuḥ kaṣāyaśca kaphāpahāriṇau mādhuryatiktāv api pittanāśanau /
GS40rajnighu:6372: paṭvamlasaṃjñau ca rasau maruddharau itthaṃ dviśo'mī sakalāmayāpahāḥ // Rajni_20.89
GS40rajnighu:6373: anyonyaṃ madhurāmlau lavaṇāmlau kaṭutiktakau ca rasau /
GS40rajnighu:6374: kaṭulavaṇau ca syātāṃ miśrarasau tiktalavaṇau ca // Rajni_20.90
GS40rajnighu:6375: lavaṇamadhurau viruddhāv atha kaṭumadhurau ca tiktamadhurau ca /
GS40rajnighu:6376: sādhāraṇaḥ kaṣāyaḥ sarvatra samānatāṃ dhatte // Rajni_20.91
GS40rajnighu:6377: saṃdhatte madhuro'mlatāṃ ca lavaṇo dhatte yathāvat sthitiṃ tiktākhyaḥ kaṭutāṃ tathā madhuratāṃ dhatte kaṣāyāhvayaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6378: amlastiktaruciṃ dadāti kaṭuko yāty antatas tiktatām ityeṣāṃ svavipākato 'pi kathitā ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ sthitiḥ // Rajni_20.92
GS40rajnighu:6380: kramād anyonyasaṃkīrṇā nānātvaṃ yānti ṣaḍrasāḥ // Rajni_20.93
GS40rajnighu:6384: caturbhirapi paryāyair ādye proktā bhidā daśa // Rajni_20.95
GS40rajnighu:6385: evaṃ dvitīye ṣaḍbhedās tṛtīye ca trayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6386: caturthe caika ityete trikabhedāstu viṃśatiḥ // Rajni_20.96
GS40rajnighu:6389: ādye tyakte tu pañca syuḥ svāgrimaikaikasaṃyute /
GS40rajnighu:6392: ekaḥ sarvasamāsena vyāse ṣaḍiti sapta te // Rajni_20.99
GS40rajnighu:6395: bṛṃhaṇaṃ puṣṭidaṃ poṣyamutkaṃ pīnatvadaṃ ca tat /
GS40rajnighu:6397: āpyāyanaṃ tarpaṇaṃ ca prīṇanaṃ toṣaṇaṃ ca tat /
GS40rajnighu:6398: niḥṣyandanam abhiṣyandi netradrāvaṃ saraṃ ca tat // Rajni_20.102
GS40rajnighu:6400: imamakhilamuditvā vargamutsargasiddhān pravadatu sa ca vidvān āmayapratyayāṃs tān // Rajni_20.103
GS40rajnighu:6401: yena vyādhiśatāndhakārapaṭalīniṣkāsanābhāskaraprāyeṇāpi punastarāṃ pravihitā hanta dviṣāṃ vyādhayaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6402: tasyāyaṃ kṛtivāci viṃśatitamaḥ śrīmannṛsiṃheśituḥ śāntiṃ nāmakirīṭamaṇḍanamaṇau vargo gadādirgataḥ // Rajni_20.104
GS40rajnighu:6406: teṣu kramādamī doṣāḥ kaphapittānilāḥ sthitāḥ // Rajni_21.1
GS40rajnighu:6407: sattvaṃ śleṣmā rajaḥ pittaṃ tamaścāpi samīraṇaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6409: sattvaṃ manovikāśaḥ syāt sattvāyattā tathā sthitiḥ // Rajni_21.3
GS40rajnighu:6414: sparśano gandhavāhī ca pavano marudāśugaḥ // Rajni_21.6
GS40rajnighu:6422: ābhyantaraṃ ca bāhyaṃ ca svarūpaṃ saṃnirucyate // Rajni_21.10
GS40rajnighu:6423: sattvāḍhyaḥ śucirāstikaḥ sthiramatiḥ puṣṭāṅgako dhārmikaḥ kāntaḥ so 'pi bahuprajaḥ sumadhurakṣīrādibhojyapriyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6424: dātā pātraguṇādṛto drutatamaṃ vāgmī kṛpāluḥ samo gauraḥ śyāmatanur ghanāmbutuhinasvapnekṣaṇaḥ śleṣmalaḥ // Rajni_21.11
GS40rajnighu:6425: rājaso lavaṇāmlatiktakaṭukaprāyoṣṇabhojī paṭuḥ prauḍho nātikṛśo 'pyakālapalitī krodhaprapañcānvitaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6426: drāghīyān mahilāśayo vitaritā sopādhikaṃ yācito gaurāṅgaḥ kanakādidīptilalitaḥ svapnī ca pittātmakaḥ // Rajni_21.12
GS40rajnighu:6427: nidrālurbahubhāṣakaḥ sukuṭilaḥ krūrāśayo nāstikaḥ prāyaḥ paryuṣitātiśītavirasāhāraikaniṣṭho 'lasaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6428: kāryeṣvatyabhimānavān asamaye dātā yathecchaṃ kṛśaḥ svapne vyomagatiḥ sitetaratanur vātūlakas tāmasaḥ // Rajni_21.13
GS40rajnighu:6429: sattvādayo guṇā yatra miśritāḥ santi bhūyasā /
GS40rajnighu:6432: madhyamaṃ rajasā miśre kanīyo guṇamiśraṇam // Rajni_21.15
GS40rajnighu:6433: sattvaṃ cittavikāśamāśu tanute datte prabodhaṃ paraṃ kāluṣyaṃ kurute rajastu manasaḥ prastauti cāvyākṛtim /
GS40rajnighu:6434: āndhyaṃ hanta hṛdi prayacchati tirodhatte svatattve dhiyaṃ saṃdhatte jaḍatāṃ ca saṃtatam upādhatte pramīlāṃ tamaḥ // Rajni_21.16
GS40rajnighu:6435: vātaḥ svairaḥ syāllaghuḥ śītarūkṣaḥ sūkṣmasparśajñānakas todakārī /
GS40rajnighu:6436: mādhuryānne so 'bhrakāle 'parāhṇe pratyūṣe 'nne yāti jīrṇe ca kopam // Rajni_21.17
GS40rajnighu:6437: pittaṃ ca tiktāmlarasaṃ ca sārakaṃ coṣṇaṃ dravaṃ tīkṣṇam idaṃ madhau bahu /
GS40rajnighu:6438: varṣāntakāle bhṛśam ardharātre madhyaṃdine 'nnasya jare ca kupyati // Rajni_21.18
GS40rajnighu:6439: śleṣmā guruḥ ślakṣṇamṛduḥ sthirastathā snigdhaḥ paṭuḥ śītajaḍaś ca gaulyavān /
GS40rajnighu:6440: śīte vasante ca bhṛśaṃ niśāmukhe pūrve 'hni bhuktopari ca prakupyati // Rajni_21.19
GS40rajnighu:6443: ekaikavṛddhau syur bhedās trayo ye vṛddhidās trayaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6444: tatrāpyekatarā hy arthe ṣaḍevaṃ dvādaśaiva te // Rajni_21.21
GS40rajnighu:6448: evaṃ kṣaye'pi tāvantas tataḥ pañcāśad īritāḥ // Rajni_21.23
GS40rajnighu:6452: triṣaṣṭistvantimo bhedas trayāṇāṃ prakṛtau sthitiḥ // Rajni_21.25
GS40rajnighu:6454: tato bhiṣak prayuñjīta tadavasthocitāḥ kriyāḥ // Rajni_21.26
GS40rajnighu:6456: so 'pyeṣa bhūtaḥ kila vartamānastathā bhaviṣyanniti ca tridhoktaḥ // Rajni_21.27
GS40rajnighu:6457: bhūte vṛttamatītaṃ ca hyastanaṃ nisṛtaṃ gatam /
GS40rajnighu:6459: anāgataṃ bhaviṣye syāt śvastanaṃ ca pragetanam /
GS40rajnighu:6460: vartsyad vartiṣyamāṇaṃ ca syādāgāmi ca bhāvi ca // Rajni_21.29
GS40rajnighu:6463: turyaṃ pādaṃ caturthāṃśam īṣat kiṃcit tathocyate // Rajni_21.30
GS40rajnighu:6466: śabdoccāre sakalaguruke ṣaṣṭivarṇapramāṇe mānaṃ kāle palamiti daśa syāt kṣaṇastāni taistu /
GS40rajnighu:6467: ṣaḍbhir nāḍī prahara iti tāḥ sapta sārdhās tathāhorātro jñeyaḥ sumatibhir asāv aṣṭabhistaiḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // Rajni_21.32
GS40rajnighu:6471: tribhis tribhiḥ kramādetaiḥ syātāṃ ca viṣuvāyane // Rajni_21.35
GS40rajnighu:6472: palaṃ vighaṭikā proktā nāḍī tāstu triviṃśatiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6473: nāḍī tu ghaṭikā proktā taddvayaṃ ca muhūrtakam // Rajni_21.36
GS40rajnighu:6474: yāmaḥ prahara ityukto dinabhāgo dināṃśakaḥ // Rajni_21.37
GS40rajnighu:6476: ghasro dino'pi divaso vāsaro bhāsvaro divā // Rajni_21.39
GS40rajnighu:6479: vyuṣṭaṃ cāharmukhaṃ kalyaṃ prage prāhṇaṃ prabhātakam // Rajni_21.41
GS40rajnighu:6482: rocir dīptir dyutiḥ śocistviḍojo bhā ruciḥ prabhā /
GS40rajnighu:6483: vibhā lokaprakāśaśca teja ojāyitaṃ ca ruk // Rajni_21.43
GS40rajnighu:6487: abhītir ātapābhāvo bhāvālīnā ca sā smṛtā // Rajni_21.45
GS40rajnighu:6489: tamī triyāmā śayanī kṣapā yāmavatī tamā // Rajni_21.46
GS40rajnighu:6491: jyotiṣmatī tārakiṇī kālī sāpi kalāpinī // Rajni_21.47
GS40rajnighu:6492: sā jyautsnī candrikāyuktā tamisrā tu tamo'nvitā // Rajni_21.48
GS40rajnighu:6493: ardharātro niśīthe syānmadhyarātraśca sa smṛtaḥ // Rajni_21.49
GS40rajnighu:6494: jyotsnā tu candrikā cāndrī kaumudī kāmavallabhā /
GS40rajnighu:6496: kāntistu suṣamā śobhā chaviśchāyā vibhā śubhā /
GS40rajnighu:6497: śrīr lakṣmīr dakpriyābhikhyā bhānaṃ bhātirumā ramā // Rajni_21.51
GS40rajnighu:6502: pakṣādiḥ prathamādyā ca pakṣatiḥ pratipac ca sā // Rajni_21.54
GS40rajnighu:6506: pakṣe tithayo jñeyāḥ pakṣaśca sito'sito dvividhaḥ // Rajni_21.56
GS40rajnighu:6507: sitastvāpūryamāṇaḥ syāt śuklaśca viśadaḥ śudi // Rajni_21.57
GS40rajnighu:6508: asito malinaḥ kṛṣṇo bahulo vadi ca smṛtaḥ // Rajni_21.58
GS40rajnighu:6511: pūrṇimā paurṇamāsī ca jyautsnī cendumatī sitā /
GS40rajnighu:6512: sā pūrvānumatir jñeyā rākā syāduttarā ca sā // Rajni_21.60
GS40rajnighu:6514: sā pūrvā tu sinīvālī dvitīyā tu kuhūrmatā // Rajni_21.61
GS40rajnighu:6516: dvipakṣas tu bhavenmāsaścaitrādyā dvādaśāśca te // Rajni_21.63
GS40rajnighu:6517: caitrastu caitrikaścaitrī madhuḥ kālādikaśca saḥ // Rajni_21.64
GS40rajnighu:6518: vaiśākho mādhavo rādho jyaiṣṭhaḥ śukrastapastathā // Rajni_21.65
GS40rajnighu:6519: āṣāḍhaḥ śuciruktaḥ śrāvaṇikaḥ śrāvaṇo nabhāścāpi // Rajni_21.66
GS40rajnighu:6520: bhādro bhādrapado'pi prauṣṭhapadaḥ syānnabho nabhasyaśca // Rajni_21.67
GS40rajnighu:6522: kārttiko bāhulo'pi syād ūrjaḥ kārttikikaś ca saḥ // Rajni_21.69
GS40rajnighu:6523: mārgaḥ sahā mārgaśīrṣa āgrahāyaṇiko'pi saḥ // Rajni_21.70
GS40rajnighu:6524: pauṣastu pauṣikas taiṣaḥ sahasyo haimano'pi ca // Rajni_21.71
GS40rajnighu:6526: caitrādimāsau dvau dvau syur nāmnā ṣaḍṛtavaḥ kramāt // Rajni_21.73
GS40rajnighu:6527: bhavedvasanto madhumādhavābhyāṃ syātāṃ tathā śukraśucī nidāghaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6528: nabhonabhasyau jaladāgamaḥ syād iṣorjakābhyāṃ śaradaṃ vadanti // Rajni_21.74
GS40rajnighu:6530: māsadvikeneti vasantakādyā dhīmadbhir uktā ṛtavaḥ ṣaḍete // Rajni_21.75
GS40rajnighu:6532: puṣpamāsaḥ pikānandaḥ kāntaḥ kāmarasaśca saḥ // Rajni_21.76
GS40rajnighu:6542: pratidinamṛtavaḥ syur ūrdhvam arkodayasamayād daśakena nāḍikānām // Rajni_21.82
